description: Hey guys! Are you looking for a newest parking game. Airport Plane Parking 3D is a super cool real challenging game to play. This time you are not a driver of an ordinary car, bus, truck or train, this time you are a pilot of plane and parking a plane is totally different thing to do. The traffic above and on the ground goes very fast and planes that land need to park on the right gate on time. A real pilot needs to clear the runway as soon as possible. After landing flight control will give you directions to park the plane where you have to park the plane safely without damaging the plane. Pilot needs real skills to park the plane on the ground as he has to face the tortuous arrangement on the runway. So, parking a plane is not a piece of cake it requires a real driving skills. There will be loads of different levels and different planes. It will be a great fun for pilot to park a plane on its destination. Car Bus truck are very easy to park after you played this super cool and challenging game. Parking plane needs a real experience even for the experienced drivers. Different aviation models can be in the way to park at the right place and they all are set in 3D style. In each level you are going get a different challenge as the level increases the game will be progressively more challenging. If you love to drive then you will find it bigger and better to play. It is exciting and full of adventure. Now show your skills to prove yourself a good pilot. What are you waiting for download free Airport Plane Parking – simulator game and enjoy the ride of a plane and feel as a pilot. Features: • 20 Attractive and challenging levels. • 4 different Airplanes to park • It’s a mission for a pilot to watch out for obstacles which makes a labyrinth where an Airplanes needs to get through. • Real life parking • Realistic Controls • Parking will be guided by an arrow throughout in all levels. • Great dynamic Airport Plane Parking – Simulator with different views.

This is the transparent theme pack for the Digital Clock & World Weather widget. Note: This is not a standalone application. You need the latest version of Digital Clock & World Weather widget in order to use these themes. To download the Digital Clock & World Weather widget search the Android Market for 'digital clock weather droid27'. Once you install both applications and place the widget on your home screen, you can select one of the skins available in this package by opening the widget preferences (tap the minutes), tap Appearance settings, then tap Additional skins. Locate the theme pack in the list and tap it to select the desired skin.

description: Play Charades! 100% free and no ads! Features: • Up to 4 teams • Auto-saved games (we got your back) • Adjust each team's difficulty (give your friends a fighting chance) • Pick the categories (movies only? you got it!) • Change the score limit (for shorter or longer games) • Edit the timer duration (increase the challenge!) • Remembers words you've encountered to prevent repeats per game Unlockable Feature: • Add your own custom words! (free) • Keep playing to unlock :] Feedback/Suggestions are encouraged! If you come across any bugs please let me know.. this is my first app so I'm sure they'll be hiding somewhere :]

Splashtop for SECTOR works with SECTOR -based enterprise workspaces, including AT&T Toggle, BlackBerry Secure Work Space, and Deutsche Telekom SAMBA! If you are unsure if you have a SECTOR workspace, or if you do not have a SECTOR workspace and would like to obtain one, please contact your company’s IT administrator. If you are not an enterprise user, please consider Splashtop Enterprise! Splashtop for SECTOR is a simpler, higher performing, and cost-effective alternative to traditional Citrix and VMware VDI. It enables IT departments to deliver corporate apps and desktops (physical and virtual) to tablets, smartphones, PCs, Macs, and thin clients. It supports Microsoft RDS / RemoteApp. Splashtop for SECTOR eliminates the complexity and expense of mobilizing all of your hard-to-access apps -- Zero Coding, Zero Training, Zero Data Leakage, Zero VPN headache, Complete Control, Superior Performance. Top industry adoptions include government, financial, healthcare, and manufacturing with 3D CAD. Over 15 million users enjoy Splashtop: http://www.splashtop.com/enterprise . *** For personal use only please search for Splashtop Personal app *** Splashtop Enterprise delivers: + Fast, cost effective high-performance alternative to VPN, RDP, VNC, Citrix + “Last mile” extension for VDI and RDP environments + On-premise deployment – secure and protect sensitive data + Active Directory (AD) - Integrate with your existing AD for local authentication and authorization + IT remote support solution+ Centralized control - Set user and device access policies, activate/deactivate users and devices, centralized streamer updates , bandwidth throttling + Reporting - View real-time connections and audit trails + Grouping - Allow access to shared pool of physical or virtual desktops + Multi-device support - Supports iPad, iPhone, Android tablets, Android phones, Mac and PCs + Support for other MDMs include Good Technology and OpenPeak (also known as AT&T Toggle) available + Easy to setup, get your team setup and running in an hour How users benefit + Access anytime – Be able to securely access your Windows applications & data on your PC / MAC remotely from any mobile device, any time, any where + Easy to use - Intuitive gestures and menu interface delivers a native application experience including support for multiple displays + High performance - Patent pending streaming technology including 3D graphics, HD video and synchronized audio delivers a responsive and engaging user experience + Connect from anywhere - Intelligent optimization techniques provide reliable connections even when connected over lower bandwidth 3G and 4G connections + Secure connections - With support for SSL/AES 256 bit encryption, network proxies and SSL certificates you can be assured that your sessions are safe + Presentation and annotation capabilities (over .ppt, video, including Flash) that can be controlled via tablet and projected to a group

description: رسائل تهنئة العيد "سأرسل من أريج المسك عطرًا يفوح إلى الأحباب بكل وادي وأنثر بين قافيتي ورودا لأكرم من أحبهم فؤادي يريد الشوق يخبركم بأني اقدركم على رغم البعاد - تقبل الله الطاعات" تطبيق رسائل تهنئة العيد تقدمه لكم موبايلي لرسائل الجوال مجانا حيث تجدون فيه الكثير من رسائل تهنئة العيد المنتقاة يمكنكم إرسالها عبر الإنترنت وإلى آلاف الأرقام دفعة واحدة وبكبسة زر وبأكثر من طريقة. مزايا التطبيق: 1- عشرات رسائل تهنئة العيد . 2- إمكانية الإرسال مجانا من خلال whatsapp و viber و skype وغيرها. 3- مشاركة الرسائل على مواقع فيس بوك وتويتر facebook , Twitter . 4- خانة الرسائل المفضلة لحفظ الرسائل التي تعجبك فيها. 5- إمكانية الإرسال مباشرة من جهازك الجوال دون الحاجة لإعادة الكتابة. 6- إمكانية الإرسال من حسابك على موقع موبايلي Mobily.ws

Journey to the very heart of "Grand Gaia", and unleash your Summoner powers, with Brave Frontier RPG Travel across mysterious continents, fight hordes of monsters, and battle against other teams in the Arena. Thanks to your Summoner powers, collect, fuse and evolve your Units and Heroes that are the core of your army! "You are the ""Chosen"", the champion that the world of ""Grand Gaia"" desperately needed. You have just gone past the gates of Lucius, and have discovered your fledling powers of Summoning. You will need to train hard and explore the regions of Mistral, Morgan, and St. Lamia in order for your units to become powerful Heroes. Only by defeatinig the Evil God Maxwell and his demonic armies, will you ever be able to restore ""Grand Gaia"" to it's former glory. In Brave Frontier RPG: * Summon and create powerful squads with over 200 monsters and heroes to choose from * Activate the unique abilities of each of your heroes (Brave Burst) * Master the elements (Fire, Water, Earth, Lightning, Light and Dark) to better fight your enemies * Collect units of friendly "pixel art" style graphics. * Challenge other players in the PvP Arena, and earn exclusive rewards! * Craft your own equipment and potions * Participate in the events to try win the rarest heroes Brave Frontier is the number 1 game under the classic RPGs category in the Japanese box office Already a fan of Brave Frontier RPG? Come find us on Facebook, or follow us on Twitter to stay up to date with events and news: https://www.facebook.com/BraveFrontierRPG https://twitter.com/BraveFrontierRPG Brave Frontier RPG is a free game, although some elements may require payment. You may deactivate the integrated in-app purchase option through the settings of your smartphone. Brave Frontier RPG is a game developped by Alim and published by gumi Inc. http://gumi-europe.com/en https://gu3.co.jp/en/

description: Do you need a reliable device that accurately presents the tempo for each played song? Do you want to have full control over your song? Are you looking for an accurate and reliable metronome? Best Classic Metronome is perfect for you! Our handy device will become your close friend of every musician who needs a metronome to daily exercise. We prepared a special version of metronome with classic look and realistic pendulum motion. The application is simple and convenient to use. Set the tempo, using the wiight which is located at the pendulum. Features: ♫ Tempo tuning from 36 to 208 BPM ♫ Tempo tuning by using the weight at the pendulum ♫ Runs in background ♫ Automatically turns off when there´s an incoming call If you have comments or feedback on our app, please send email to mobile@netigen.pl Thanks and Enjoy this app !

inTaxi is a reliable and handy taxi service app that allows you to order taxi with just a few taps. No more annoying phone calls and line holding. You tell us when and where you want to go, and we show you a variety of offers accompanied by taxi company rating, trip price, car class and earliest availabity time. The choice is always yours. Our loyalty program is now up and running! You can now collect bonuses for every trip and friend referral. We are currently available in Moscow, Saint-Petersburg Features: - Address suggest - Trip length and time forecast, current traffic - Guaranteed offers during first 30 seconds - Voice notifications on car appointment and serving - Exact information about appointed car and driver - Trip total always corresponds to chosen pricing - Streamlined review system - Loyalty program: bonuses for every trip and friend referral
release_text: - New function - a call to taxi cab company. - Expanding the geography of service. - Bug fixes.

description: Easily find Fonts for Samsung Galaxy S4 and Fonts for Galaxy Note 3 This app will allow you to use the Play Store to search for free fonts compatible with the FlipFont program that is installed on most Samsung Galaxy devices. This app is designed to be used with Samsung Galaxy devices that are using the TouchWiz interface and have the FlipFont program. NOTE: This App is NOT sponsored, endorsed, or affiliated with Monotype Imaging, Inc, the owner of the FlipFont trademark and technology. With this fonts galaxy search application and the FlipFont font changer program on your Samsung Galaxy phone, click on the 'Get fonts online' button to find more fonts free to customize your galaxy device. This application will allow you to use the Play Store instead of the Samsung App Store to find popular and free fonts for Galaxy devices. To change fonts on your Samsung Galaxy device, navigate to the display settings in your device's system settings. In the display settings you can change the font style to any of these 5 new fonts for Android. This app will work on all Galaxy brand phones and will provide an advanced search to find fonts for Samsung Galaxy 3 (S3), fonts for Samsung Galaxy 4 (S4), and fonts for Galaxy Note 3. This app will not work on developer devices, such as the Galaxy Nexus, because it does not have the FlipFont program. Please verify that your phone can change its font and that the font menu contains the button 'Get fonts online'. Look for the font style option in the display or screen display section of your device settings. This android application is not affiliated with FlipFont or Monotype Imaging Inc. All functionality, trademarks and copyrights remain the property of their respective owners.

The free MMO tank battle simulator has come to Android devices! Drive your favorite tanks online right on your mobile device. - 25 legendary mass-produced World War II tanks - Strategic online 7x7 PvP battles - Accurate physics for an atmosphere of realistic movement and battle mechanics - Realistic shell hits and armor penetration. - Historically accurate tank armor, including weak spots - Realistic tank spotting mechanics - Smooth communication between players - Varied battlefields - HD graphics optimized for your mobile device's capabilities - Intuitive touchscreen controls with option to configure tank controls Now get in your tank and call your allies to battle!

Jewels is the #1 Match-3 casual game on Android! This game is a smash hit casual game with satisfying and juicy shining jewels. 깨달음 명상시리즈 1번입니다. 이 명상은 .. 명상을 전혀 모르는 사람도 쉽게 깊은 의식상태에 다다르게 해주는 전반부와 내가 누구인지를 알게 해주는 후반부로 구성되어 있습니다. 나는 누구인가? 무엇이 나인가? 나는 왜 태어났나? 내가 나를 알면 나의 삶은 점점 유쾌한 놀이가 됩니다. 예전에는 산속에서 수십년 수행해도 나를 알기가 매우 어려웠습니다. 그러나 문명이 발달한 것처럼 이제 누구나 마음만 먹으면 나를 깨달을 수 있는 시대가 된 것입니다. 어떤 산에 보물이 묻혀있다는 정보만 가지고 보물을 찾으려들면 평생 그 산을 헤매도 찾기 어렵지만 그 보물의 위치를 잘 아는 사람의 안내를 받으면 아주 짧은 시간에 곧 바로 찾아 낼 수 있습니다. 물론 그 보물에 아직 관심이 없다면 알려줘도 소용이 없겠지만요^^ 진실로 나를 알고자 한다면 꼭 다운받아 끝까지 들어보세요. 내가 나를 알고자하면 반드시 알게 됩니다. 물론 얼마나 절실하냐에 따라 더 많이 더 깊이 알게되겠지요. * 중간에 잠에 빠지는 경우 이어폰을 사용해보거나 주차된 차안이나 공원 벤치에서 들어보는 것을 추천합니다. 쉽게 잠들기 어려운 전철 역사같은 환경도 의외로 좋습니다. 물론 졸음이 오면 잠을 자도 좋습니다. 기차나 비행기등 장거리여행 할 때 들으면 좋습니다. 장시간 비행기타고 해외여행 할 때 사용해보니 잠이 잘오더군요 ㅎㅎㅎ ^^ * 새로 업데이트한 버전이 불편하시면, 네이버 N스토어에서 이전 버전을 다운받으시기 바랍니다. . . . . . . . . . . . .. . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . 심리치유,종교,마음수련 관련된 키워드: 샘아제,무료명상,최면,자기사랑,최면어플,참나, 진아,최면유도문,명상,요가명상,호흡수련,단전호흡,명상어플,깨달음,힐링,불교,반야심경,선문답,기공,기공명상,레드썬,심리치료,심리상담,신경정신,청소년상담,상담어플,자신감,자존감,자기존중감 향상,해외여행 ---- 개발자 연락처 : 032-283-2835 인천시 부평구 굴포로 158 Enlightenment Meditation Series 1. This meditation. Meditation does not know the person at all easy and that'll come in the first half deep states of consciousness I know that consists of the second half of the Who. Who am I? description: Get ready for the seat of your pants wild ride of your life - on a minecart! You know, they called me stupid when I "borrowed" gold from the ol' hag in the forest. They called me mad when I stole the big Cyclop´s gold pouch. They called me crazy when I grabbed that golden tooth from Cthulhu. I wonder what they'll call me when I find the Fat Dragon´s chest? You can call me greedy, I don't care. Are you ready for the ride of your life laddy?! Are you just as greedy? Will you risk your life to get that last gold nugget? Greedy Dwarf features 32 challenging levels that will keep you swearing under your thick dwarfish beard! Features: - 32 beautiful 3d levels - Different modes of play - Dynamic music - Two control schemes
release_text: Thanks for downloading the game guys! - Quick fix for the auto rotation problem.

description: Do you have misaligned crooked teeth? You need those uncomfortable dental braces but you have a dentist fear? Be an ultimate crazy dentist brace doctor and forget your fear with this amazing dental learning game! Use your medical instruments; treat patient’s teeth at the dental clinic to give them perfect teeth. Act like professional dentists, enjoy teeth cleaning and applying oral braces at doctor office. Avoid tooth fillings and tooth extraction. *** FEATURES *** √ Select a patient with bad teeth for dental surgery and application of braces √ Start teeth cleaning and removing fungus with the medical instruments √ Clean away with brush and water √ Suck out the extra water from mouth and tongue √ Before applying dental braces, tooth whitening should be done (teeth stains removal) √ Use an injection and go to the brace screen √ Share it on Facebook for free with other kids You get a cavity and yellow teeth with all the candy you crush at night. So brush your teeth daily before going to bed. Otherwise you might need to visit a brace doctor for treatment, get a tooth extraction done and put on the wire braces. >>> Follow us on Facebook <<< https://www.facebook.com/HammerheadGame >>> Disclaimer <<< This free game contains ads.

American Civil War - Grand strategy of Union versus the Confederacy 1861-1865. You must defeat the Confederate rebellion by occupying their territory, sealing off their commerce, and preventing them invading the Union. Game features: * Grand strategic approach to whole war. * Generals lead you armies: Sherman, Grant, even McClellan... * Launch naval invasions. * Use you Gunboats to capture the Mississippi. * Defend Washington from General Lee * Native Americans - Indians - Confederate allies or enemy to all sides. * Fortifications. * Optional features to make game easier or harder - including foreign intervention! This is not an action game - it is a turn based strategy game for those interested in strategy, history and wargames.
release_text: v4= Improved responses, layout, and a tutorial

description: Download the LateRooms.com hotel booking App and make all your upcoming events and occasions happen, today. Whatever the reason you're going away, find and book thousands of hotels worldwide right from your device. Now featuring our new, App-Exclusive Rates: SEARCH TOP HOTEL DEALS ON THE GO • Up to 50% off at more than 55,000 hotels worldwide • App-Exclusive Rates – special deals just for App users • The UK’s largest range – cosy B&Bs, luxury spas, city centre business hotels, country houses and more… NEED A HOTEL TONIGHT? • Find nearby hotels now – view on a map with a single tap PACKED WITH HELPFUL FEATURES • Save your favourite hotels for easy access • Beautiful maps, handy filters, clever sorting • Over 2 million genuine guest reviews to help you choose QUICK, EASY & SECURE BOOKING • Auto card scanning for easy payment • Saved cards for quicker booking • Book now, pay later* with no booking or cancellation fees** • Price promise for your peace of mind† MY ACCOUNT • Log in to manage all your bookings, all in one place • View, amend or cancel your existing bookings And of course that’s just a snapshot – there are loads more great features available. But there’s only so much bragging you can get away with. So go on, download our super-fast App today. You’ll only ever be a few taps away from making your next moment happen. Make it happen. Make it LateRooms.com. *Advance payment rates may apply from time to time. **If you cancel within the hotel’s cancellation period. Booking conditions are flexible with most hotels accepting cancellation up to 24 hours before arrival without any penalty. To check the cancellation policy for individual hotels please read the cancellation policy page in the hotel details section of the app. †Terms and conditions apply.
release_text: Hotels? The more the merrier. So we're adding thousands more to our already impressive range around the world. Other updates: Improved App-Exclusives Last time we launched App-only hotel deals. This time we've made it even easier to find them. Add to Calendar It's a date. Instantly add confirmed bookings straight to your calendar.

description: Everywhere Clipboard extends Android clipboard function and brings real desktop clipboard experience to you on mobile phone. Imagine a clipboard panel that you can quickly locate, copy, paste, and delete from clipboard history without leaving your current window. Unlike other clipboard apps found in Android Market, Everywhere Clipboard quick panel can be used anywhere in any window instantly and can be hidden at any time too and that makes it superior than any other existing solution. It also reads txt file for copy and paste action too! If you are a heavy email or note taking user, you will find Everywhere Clipboard increase your productivity to next level. Thanks to its desktop like clipboard solution. Features ☆ Instant on, always available clipboard panel ☆ Manage content to copy from files/folders ☆ Built in note editor for quick file creation ☆ Easy to use folder management ☆ Supports both clipboard history based or file based copy ☆ More to come............. Added features in PRO ☆ Unlocked clipboard history limit ☆ Able to create multiple folder for text file management ☆ Ads removal
release_text: V1.2.2 Fixed (1) Add support to non standard screen dimension V1.2.1 Added (1) ICS start on boot support V1.2 Fixed: (1)Crash on SD card removal (1)Crash if default folder is deleted Added: (1) Option for toast notification on copy (2) Confirmation on Clear all clipboard history V1.1 Fixed: (1) Incorrect popup location when trigger side is set to left (2) Removed a trailing linefeed when copy from txt (3) Fixed Pause button trigger area wider than displayed.

description: You need to drill some holes? This app makes it possible! Choose between a hand drill or electric drill to do your work!

Nature Live Wallpaper is a beautiful sight for the sore eyes that will instantly bring serenity to your life. Make your screen the embodiment of the most beautiful nature images you have ever seen. This “Nature Wallpaper” will make your smartphone look mesmerizing and enchanting at the same time. Enjoy the magic of nature! - Perfect live wallpaper for Android™! - Full support for landscape mode Enjoy this free and useful live wallpaper! Installation instructions: Home -> Menu -> Wallpapers -> Live Wallpapers - Optimized Battery Usage. - Compatible with 99% mobile phone devices. - Nature Live Wallpaper fully supports horizontal orientation and looks amazing on tablet devices as well as on phones. This live wallpaper has been tested on latest devices such as Samsung Galaxy S2, Samsung Galaxy S3, Samsung Galaxy S4, Samsung Galaxy S5, Nexus 7,Q Mobile, HTC One and Sony Xperia Z. Please contact us if your device is not supported. Beautiful nature and magical greenery will make you feel relaxed and at peace instantly. Listen to the forest creek or river and experience bliss with these cool backgrounds! The only thing you need to do is to choose among ten gorgeous “Nature Backgrounds” and find your absolute favorite. Decorate your new Samsung Galaxy mobile phone and make it astonishing. Discover a lovely lake at the foot of the mountain, or the mysterious forest Boys and girls, this is a “free download” of surreal beauty you should not miss! New and fresh ”Nature Live Wallpaper” looks so real you will be able to hear how nature sounds like.

A lightweight, no-nonsense sticky notes widget. No permissions required! Resizable, scrollable, and enabled for both your home screen and (on devices running Jelly Bean and KitKat) lock screen. *You may need to restart your device before the widget shows up in your widget list. *Due to Android limitations this app may not be visible when installed on the SD card. Check out Simple Sticky Note Widget Plus if you'd like the ability to change background colors, font sizes, and share note text to other apps!
release_text: 1.5 Update to use up-to-date themes on newer devices 1.4 Rename sticky note widget from "A sticky note" to "Sticky note" 1.3/1.3a Made widgets scrollable!! NOTE: Small behavior change for Ice Cream Sandwich & Honeycomb users: in order to edit a sticky note widget you will need to click on the TEXT of the note. Clicking on the blank space below the note text will no longer invoke the editor. 1.2 Enabled lock screen sticky notes for devices running Jelly Bean 4.2 and up!

description: Tamil Radio is the best, free and personalized radio service that plays the best Tamil news,talk and music you love. You can even customize and create your favorite radio station list. Install and run this app now, it won't disappoint you. Features: There are more than 55 radio stations. You can select your favorite stations and add them in a separate list You can also remove stations from your favorite list Long press any radio station to add to favorite. Also long press to delete any station from the favorite list. High quality music Even a slow internet speed is enough to run the radio station.

description: Dead Bear is a third person shooter zombie game. You play as a teddy bear that will risk its life defending its home. The game currently has a tutorial level along with 15 increasingly difficult levels. Each new level pins you up against hundreds of terrifying zombies that want to see dead bears end. ★ You can play as a guest or create an account rank up through the leader boards. ★ Ranking up unlocks dead bears special abilities that can be used to help dead bear survive. ★ Stock pile your cave with guns, equipment, ammunition, lives, and much more. ★ Visit the item shop to spend your accumulated gold. The game is meant to be played when you're at that boring office or on the toilet. Don't burn yourself out and have fun! Become a fan of Dead Bear on Facebook: http://www.facebook.com/jaszappsdeadbear Please email support@jaszapps.com with any problems and we’ll get back to you shortly

Major patch for the game It should run better on most devices now. 1.03 Bug fix. 1.01 Finishing up the app. It should be ready for release very shortly.

description: This is the Book of dream interpretations (in RUSSIAN language). The Reference is OFFLINE and does not need the internet connection. Database will be downloaded when the application is run first time. We recommend you to use Wi-Fi connection. Это Справочник - Сонник - Толкование снов. Справочник работает в режиме ОФФЛАЙН и не требует интернет-соединения для работы. База данных будет загружена при первом запуске. Используйте wi-fi соединение. При составлении использовались следующие сонники: - Сонник Густава Хиндмана Миллера, - Сонник Мeдиyма миcc Xacce, - Древнерусский сонник, - Сонник Евгения Цветкова, - Сонник Зигмунда Фрейда, - Современный сонник - Эзотерический сонник и другие. Main features: 1. History – every article you ever viewed is stored in history. 2. Favorites – you are able to add articles to favorites list by clicking the “star” icon. 3. Managing History and Favorites lists – you are able edit those lists or clear them. 4. Various Settings – you may change application’s font and theme (choose one of several color themes). 5. Random article of the day widget. To see the widget in the list the application must be installed to phone memory (reference database may be installed anywhere). This app contains advertising.
release_text: Bugfixes. Interface localization to many languaes. Google +1 button. Fix for search field for right-to-left languages.

description: Find out the registered owner of Internet domain names. Enter a domain name and NIC Whois automatically contacts the correct registry and returns the information the registry supplies about the owner. Most registries supply the registered owner, contact names, contact emails, contact telephone numbers and other data. Find out if official sounding sites are owned by who you think they are before you share your data or send money No display advertisements that use up your data plan. Also useful in identifying the sources of spam or fraudulent communications. If you enter an IP number, this app will tell you which company is supplying their Internet connectivity. If a domain name is not registered, this app will allow you to contact the nic.com mobile store to grab it for yourself. Absence of a whois listing does not guarantee a domain name is available. If you follow links, close app (using app manager) to get back to the home page.

Take control of the little chick "Chirpy" and help him to hatch all the eggs in this FREE brain/puzzle game for Android. The rules are simple and the game is challenging and perfect for everyone to challenge their minds, especially kids! Move around with the on-screen buttons and push all the eggs to each little nest to advance through the game. You can use the button at the bottom left of the screen to restart the level. Features: ★New levels every Sunday ★Simple game mechanics. ★Suitable for kids. ★Many levels. Download Hatch the Egg today and help little chick "Chirpy" to hatch all the eggs in this puzzle/brain game inspired by the old favorite Sokoban! Like on facebook: http://www.facebook.com/BlackSheepGames

description: Most addictive Mobile version of 2048 game and almost perfect 2048 number puzzle game for Android! -Game instructions- Swipe to move the tiles, when two tiles with the same number touch, they merge into one. Example: 2+2=4 ... 4+4=8 ... 8+8=16 ... When a 2048 tile is created, the player wins. [Game Features and Advantages] The only game version in Google play which works on almost EVERY android devices starting from 2.2+ Leaderboards for every game mode 2048 Pro/Beginner/Hard Mode Smoothest Android version implementation! Frequent game improvements based on your feedback and comments

Model Solar System is a simple app I use to teach the scale of the solar system to astronomy students. Simply enter the size (in inches) that you wish to use for your "Sun", and the scaled distances and sizes of the planets will be generated. You can then measure it off in your own neighborhood. Alternatively, you can enter the total length you want for your model, and the app will scale the solar system to fit. This lets you lay it out in a classroom, football field, etc. Clicking on the individual planets will show you details of their size, mass, density, orbital period, etc. You may be amazed when you're able to visualize the true distances in our solar system!
release_text: New in version 1.5: - Fixed a bug limiting the metric sun size New in version 1.4: - Added extra details on each planet - Changed it so the numeric keyboard comes up by default - Minor bug fixes New in version 1.3: - Added metric measurements

description: Small apps extension for Sony products Stopwatch is a small application by which you can measure time while doing other things on your device. It has latest and easy to understand UI with some advance features. First try Stopwatch Lite Small App which is free version, to make sure that whether it will work properly in your device or not. FEATURES Start and minimize it to do your other works. You can also close it in running state and on next launch it automatically show you the latest time. * Two separate tabs (Swipe right or left) * Bringing back the old and the best UI * With Circle timer view * Basic Start/Stop or Pause/Resume and Reset functions * New Compact UI with re-sizable window * Advance split lap time (99 laps) * Saves your last run if app is closed in stop state. * Updates time on start up if app was closed previously in running state * Keep screen on when stopwatch is visible (optional) * Share your time via Bluetooth, message, etc. * Layout animations * Unlimited maximum window height * Various settings to customize it according to your need * Support for Xperia™ themes * Translations:- Deutsch, Español, Français, ελληνικά, Italiano, Nederlands, Português, Pусский, Român, हिन्दी, 中文(简体), 日本人 (If there is any mistake then, please report me via e-mail) * Easy to use, small and powerful app ----------------------------- - In case of bugs/issues, please contact me via email before making any review. - Buy this version to support development, more apps will come in future. Xperia™ is a trademark or registered trademark of Sony Mobile Communications Inc.
release_text: v7.4 * New icon & UI improvements * Reset option in settings * Tab indicator * Romanian translations v7.3 * UI improvements (bolder text) * Keep screen on (click on 'eye' icon to turn off) * Reduced minimum width to make it smaller * Bug fixes

description: Manage all your data easily on your phone or tablet without wireless internet or mobile. Customers, Suppliers, Events, Friends, Notes, Products, Prices or any other data. Create databases, tables, add, edit or delete records. It hasn't got ads neither limitations. It has calculated fields. Generate PDF files from results. Records can have files attached (PDF, images, audios or videos). Supports large amounts of information. Supports tables relationships and GPS fields. Searches are easy and very fast. Can read and write barcode and QR codes. Import CSV data from Access, MySQL, Excel, OpenOffice, or any other program that exports to this standard format. It also exports data in CSV format.

"Best Solitaire!! Absolutely the best Solitaire in the world. Have been waiting for this to be ported across to Android. Many thanks and keep the updates coming." This is the official "Solitaire 3D" game by GrassGames for Android devices. Includes over 80 solitaire games, comes with built-in Phone and Tablet (HD) modes, tutorials, cross platform online scores, and much much more. "Great app. So many different games in the full version that I never get bored. No ads, just good clean fun." "I love this best app ever!" "Of all the apps I have downloaded in the past year, this one gets played the most." "This is a really terrific app, with a great variety of games. I love being able to compare scores to other players, and also to see which device they played on. Yes, it can be addictive, but it is a great way to kill time when you are waiting for someone or something." "This is a great game, albeit a little addictive. I love this app, no matter how many others I download I end up playing this version of solitaire." The highly popular and multi-award winning desktop and IOS computer game, Solitaire 3D, is now available for Android phones and tablets. Enjoy over 80 different solitaire games, multiple card decks (including the unique 4 color card deck), a wide range of backgrounds, high scores, statistics, sound effects, 3D animation effects, and much more. With emphasis on ease-of-play and smooth beautiful graphics, Solitaire 3D is the perfect solitaire partner for all.

A colorful polygonal landscape tilts and moves across your home screen. Every scroll or tilt creates a delightful 3D perspective shift. Check out Ember and Gold in the Theme Manager, and play around with some unlocked Shape and Effect settings too.

This lite version includes letters A to H and is fully-featured. Preschool Learning Sounds (a.k.a Kids ABC Phonics) is the second app in our Reading Curriculum Series. It is preceded by Kids ABC Letters and followed by our newest app, Kids ABC Trains. With Kids ABC Phonics, your kids will learn the alphabet letter sounds – guaranteed! Kids ABC Phonics teaches letter sounds and the basics of blending. These skills are further reinforced in our newest app, Kids ABC Trains. Kids ABC Phonics does not teach the next step, which is fluency in actual reading. Developing reading skills is a separate educational goal, which is covered in Kids Learn to Read The game has four wonderfully child-friendly sections. ✔ Learn Letter Sounds. Kids hold and turn a picture-filled letter block and hear the ABC phonics being pronounced. ✔ Build Letter Blocks. Children have fun building phonics recognition skills by making their own ABC blocks. ✔ Pop Letter Bubbles. Kids love to pop bubbles. But don't be fooled. By the time children are done with this game, they will know what letter goes with which sound by heart. ✔ Make words. While putting puzzles together, kids learn the basics of phonics blending. These skills are further exercised and expanded in our Kids Learn to Read app. ★ Hey, how did you take the top spots in the Education section? ✔ Our games are laser focused. For example, the letters game doesn't teach phonics, and the phonics game doesn't teach reading. We keep the games clean and focused but magically inviting and nourishing. ✔ Our games don’t feature fun at the expense of education – or education at the expense of fun. We also know games that are too complicated don’t involve and delight kids.

Теперь 100 шарад! Увлекательные загадки для Вас и Ваших детей. Шарада — разновидность загадки. Шарада представляет собой, в отличии от простой загадки, разбиение слова на слоги таким образом, что каждый слог имеет смысл самостоятельного слова. После чего, как в загадке, даётся описание каждого из этих слов-слогов (например, факт + ура = фактура). Понятие слога в шарадах не совпадает с понятием слога в фонетике. Слог в шараде лишь в частном случае может представлять собой фонетический слог, но может состоять и из нескольких фонетических слогов, а может вообще не содержать гласных. Слоги в шарадах могут быть любой части речи: глаголы, существительные, прилагательные, в отличие от других загадок. Чаще всего шарады представлены в стихах. При этом задуманное слово распадается на односложья. Пример: Мой первый слог — на дереве, Второй мой слог — союз. А в целом я — материя И на костюм гожусь. (сук-но) Если вам нравятся приложения на подобии "100 загадок", "100 ребусов", "100 головоломок", то данная игра не оставит вас равнодушными! В ближайшее время ждите еще больше новых и интересных шарад и загадок! Now 100 charades! Fascinating puzzles for you and your children. Charade - a kind of riddle. Charade is in contrast to a simple puzzle, splitting words into syllables so that each syllable has an independent meaning of the word. After that, as in the puzzle, and a description of each of these words, syllables (eg, the fact cheers + = invoice). The notion of a syllable in charades not coincide with the notion of a syllable in phonetics. Syllable in the charade only in the particular case may be a phonetic syllable, but may also consist of several phonetic syllables, and may contain no vowels. Syllables in charades can be any part of speech: verbs, nouns, adjectives, unlike other puzzles. Most often presented charades in verse. At the same time conceived the word splits into odnoslozhya. Example: My first syllable - in a tree, My second syllable - Union. But in general I - matter And costume'm good. (But bitches) If you like the application on the similarity of "100 puzzles", "100 puzzles", "100 puzzles", this game will not leave you indifferent! In the near future expect even more new and interesting riddles and charades!

description: Introducing End Procrastination Hypnosis - get to work, stop procrastinating and become more productive! Procrastination is the enemy of productivity - and getting work done when there are countless distractions in the way can be difficult. With End Procrastination Hypnosis, you can have the motivation to beat the temptation of procrastination! If you are an avid procrastinator, then look no further than End Procrastination Hypnosis! Our modern Android app lets you take control of every minute - and never let an hour slip you by again. You have things to do but you keep finding yourself doing something completely different? It happens to the best of us, and it’s called procrastination. Our priorities are mixed, our todos are forgotten and our day is ruined - and it’s all because we don’t have the willpower to get to work - End Procrastination Hypnosis changes that. It’s as easy as listening to our background hypnosis for just twenty minutes a day to see changes instantly. You will become better at working and motivating yourself to do more - and the best part is, you will get your work done faster than ever before. The app works through complex hypnosis - teaching your brain the vital skills it needs to overcome procrastination - it’s easy, effortless and simple - just listen. Make tomorrow a day without procrastination - with End Procrastination Hypnosis. - Listen for just twenty minutes each day and get rid of procrastination. - Complex hypnosis in a simple package. - Awaken at End mode to help you wake up if you drift to sleep. - Adjust your experience for the best effect!

To the customers who use an SD card on Android 4.4 and later. ・Due to the specification change of Android 4.4 and later, writing to SD card is restricted by Android. 　A library can be newly created in the location where writing to SD card is allowed by Android 4.4 and later ((sdcard)/Android/data/jp.pioneer.prosv.android.rbm/files). Note: If those who use an SD card on Android 4.3 and earlier update to Android 4.4 and later, track information will not be displayed due to the above-mentioned restriction. If you encounter such a problem, please import the tracks in the Android device or in rekordbox (Mac/Windows) to rekordbox (Android) again. Note: An issue where some Android devices cannot be connected to CDJ using a USB cable if such a device is updated to 4.4 or later has been identified. If you cannot connect CDJ to your mobile device using a USB cable, please try connecting them via Wi-Fi. rekordbox is a music management App for Pioneer DJ products. You can transfer music files from your Mac/Windows to this App to prepare for your DJ performance such as creating playlists, setting cue points, and so on. Changes and settings that have been made on your Android device can be written back to rekordbox on your Mac/Windows for further editing and playback. You can also play music files in the Android version of rekordbox with Pioneer DJ products that support this App. (currently CDJ-2000NXS, CDJ-900NXS, and XDJ-AERO are supported.) Main features : Transferring music files from rekordbox on your Mac/Windows to this App via Wi-Fi. Setting memory cues/loops, hot cues/loops. Analysing and editing beat grids/keys. (Please note that features such as memory cues/loops and hot cues/loops are not included in XDJ-AERO.) Editing comments and rating tracks. Creating and editing playlists. Playing music files in rekordbox with Pioneer DJ products that support this App. (USB and Wi-Fi connection can be used with CDJ-2000NXS and CDJ-900NXS. Wi-Fi connection can be used with XDJ-AERO. A Wi-Fi rooter is required to connect this app to CDJ-2000NXS and CDJ-900NXS via Wi-Fi.) Importing existing music files from your Android device. Please refer to the rekordbox web site at http://www.rekordbox.com for the verified Android devices. We recommend you install the Mac/Windows version of rekordbox (2.0.1 or later) on your computer to use this App more effectively. The Mac/Windows version of rekordbox can be downloaded for free from Pioneer rekordbox web site: http://www.rekordbox.com * Pioneer confirmed the app runs on Nexus 4, Nexus 7 and Nexus 10. Please note that Pioneer does not guarantee that this App works without any issues even if you use the above devices.
release_text: ・Improved the operability and stability of rekordbox.

description: Do you want to know what it is like to clean a princess castle suite for a beautiful princess? Well if you do then you will just love this new princess castle suite cleaning game, so get your cleaning hands ready! See how fast you can beat the clock by cleaning up your princesses' room. If you get stuck you can use up to 5 hints to check to see where something goes if you are unsure. Throw the rubbish away, tidy the closet, straighten the chandelier, and so much more to make your royal suite a fun and clean place to be for your princess. Features: - CLEAN up the mess and throw the rubbish in the royal pink bin. - TIDY up the pillows and chairs and straighten the chandelier - SWEEP the floor clean to make a good impression - RACE the time and see if you can clean the room fast before it runs out - ENJOY cleaning up the mess and challenging yourself - USE the hint button to help see where everything has got to be placed.

The objective of the game is to move all the disks to one of the pegs, moving one disk at a time and never putting a larger disk on top of a smaller one in the fewest number of moves. To solve the puzzle one can drag the top disk of a peg and drop it to another peg. The user can also click the base of a peg to move the top disk up and then click on the base of another peg to drop the disk onto that peg. Different from other towers games, all disks do not have to start on one peg. A non-recursive solution allows some disks to start on one peg and other disks to start on another peg when beginning a new game. Features: • User selects the number of disks (3 to 10) • 3 mode selection to start new game - Normal (all disks start on Origin Peg) - Random arrangement of the disks by computer across the three pegs - Manual arrangement of the disks across the three pegs • Displays the minimum number of moves required to solve and the total number of moves used • Timer shows elapsed time • Next Move button to calculate and execute the best move • Finish button to complete the puzzle in the minimum moves regardless of the current position of the disks • Drag n Drop or Tap Tap to move discs. Makes the app suitable for both Phones and Tablets • Speed of Animation slider allows the user to observe the solution in a fast or slow manner • Sound Effects or Vibration used for game completion and error messaging • Extensive Help Menu available • Uses Standard Gray Code instead of recursion to solve • Contains no ads
release_text: Disks are of different sizes depending on the number of disks selected. This feature allows the disks to use most of the screen which makes the drag-n-drop much easier, especially for younger children.

CODE HERE: https://github.com/projektlp/Android_OCV_Movement_Detection This app uses the BackgroundSubtractorMOG algorithm from OpenCV's android library to identify objects in motion from the camera and draws a red overlay around/over them. The ideal is to have nice contours drawn around the objects that are moving. A slider is also added for the user to adjust the learning rate, which may or may not have any effect on the contours. In order to utilize the app, the latest version of OpenCV Manager (also found on Google Play) must be downloaded and installed correctly. This app has been successfully tested on Android 2.3.4 and Android 4.3. At the moment this can considered an initial tech demo, please feel free to play around with it. The source code for this implementation can also be found in github link below!

ONLY Android app with ALL Philadelphia traffic cams!! Traffic web cams for commuters in Philadelphia, PA, USA ALLOWS you to use favourites! Ready to head home and you want to check the traffic? Live Traffic Philadelphia is the fastest way to get to the traffic web cams that matter to you. Instead of browsing to a web site and working your way through the menus and map graphics to find a web camera just open Live Traffic Philadelphia on your android and go straight to the camera you want with one click. Navigate through the other cameras along your route, in order, with a simple Next button. Should I stay or should I go? The traffic is slowing to a crawl. Is it going to clear quickly or is it time to bail and find a better route? Open Live Traffic Philadelphia, select the nearest camera with one click and then navigate through the web cams along your route to see how far the congestion continues. Cameras are maintained by Pennsylvania Department of Transportation. Individual cameras may be inoperative due to weather conditions or maintenance requirements. If any cameras are missing let me know and I will add them asap :)

L'application gratuite de Metro (Belgique) vous offre tous les jours un aperçu de l’actualité nationale et internationale, des infos sur les tendances incontournables, les déplacements, le travail et le sport, ainsi que tous les événements extraordinaires qui se passent dans le monde. Metro est un journal neutre, rédigé par une rédaction indépendante. Grâce à l'application, vous pouvez télécharger le journal ainsi que parcourir les dernières actualités mises à jour sur notre site web ( http://fr.metrotime.be ). Une fois le journal téléchargé, vous avez également la possibilité de lire votre Metro hors connexion. Tout cela dans une mise en page fluide et facile à lire. L’app vous permet aussi de télécharger les journaux parus lors des 2 dernières semaines. De plus, les informations peuvent être partagées par e-mail, Facebook, Twitter ... ou encore enregistrées dans une liste pour les lire ultérieurement. Grâce au design responsive de l’app, les informations s’adaptent à votre smartphone ou à votre tablette. Vous souhaitez savoir comment utiliser au mieux cette application? Cliquez-ici: http://fr.metrotime.be/app . Description: • Journal gratuit que vous pouvez, une fois téléchargé, lire hors connexion • Actualités nationales et internationales, infos sur les tendances incontournables, les déplacements, le travail et le sport • Updates tout au long de la journée des dernières actualités mises à jour sur notre site web • Design responsive • Temps de téléchargement plus rapide • Meilleure qualité de lecture • Navigation plus rapide à travers le journal • Glissez pour avoir un aperçu des principales rubriques du journal • Sélectionnez un article et lisez-le sous forme de texte confortable/pratique • Partagez des infos via e-mail, Facebook, Twitter… • Archive des journaux des 2 dernières semaines Android: • Enregistrez des articles dans une liste afin de les lire ultérieurement • Agrandir le format d’un article en 1 seul clic • Convertir le journal en une liste d’articles The free app Metro (Belgium) offers a daily overview of the national and international news, information on the essential trends, travel, work and sport, and any extraordinary events that happen in the world. Metro is a neutral newspaper, written by an independent editorial. Through the application you can download the newspaper and browse the latest news updates on our website ( http://fr.metrotime.be ). After downloading the newspaper, you also have the ability to play your Metro offline. All this in a fluid layout and easy to read. The app also allows you to download the papers published in the last 2 weeks. In addition, information can be shared via email, Facebook, Twitter ... or saved in a list for later playback. With responsive design of the app, the information adapt to your smartphone or tablet. Want to know how to best use this application? Click: http://fr.metrotime.be/app . Description: • Free newspaper as you can, once downloaded, read offline • National and international news, info about the inevitable trends, travel, work and sports • Updates throughout the day about the latest news updates on our web site • Responsive Design • Faster download time • Better playback quality • Faster navigation through the newspaper • Drag to preview the main headings of the newspaper • Select an item and read it as a comfortable text / practice • Share information via email, Facebook, Twitter ... • Archive of newspapers the last 2 weeks Android: • Store items in a list to read later • Enlarge the size of an item in 1 click • Convert the newspaper a list of items

When you purchase HIIT AD REMOVER, all ads in "HIIT interval training timer" automatically disappear. Thanks for supporting us by buying this AD REMOVER version of HIIT timer, it really helps us to keep up the good work and bring you great new features regularly ! ************************************************************************************* A simple and efficient timer that will help you during all your workouts. This app has been created to be SIMPLE : it’s simple to set up your workout, it’s simple to use so you can forget about it during your training and just follow the sounds. And when you’re done, you can share your results with your friends on Twitter and Facebook ! First it was developed for HIIT (High Intensity Interval Training) workouts, a famous method to burn fat in a short & intense workout. But our users showed us you can use it every time you need a timer : crossfit, running, cycling, HIIT, Tabata, yoga, stretching, fitness, weightlifting ... and even cooking ! * WHAT’S HIIT ? * High-intensity interval training (HIIT), also called high-intensity intermittent exercise (HIIE) or sprint interval training (SIT), is an enhanced form of interval training, an exercise strategy alternating periods of short intense anaerobic exercise with less-intense recovery periods. HIIT is a form of cardiovascular exercise. Usual HIIT sessions may vary from 4–30 minutes. These short, intense workouts provide improved athletic capacity and condition, improved glucose metabolism, and improved fat burning. This definition comes from wikipedia ( http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/High-intensity_interval_training ) where you can find a lot more informations. It explains some very popular program, like the TABATA. HIIT is also a common practice in Crossfit trainings. * HOW TO USE THE APP ? * You can use it during all trainings with intervals or other timed repetition Basically, this is how it works : on the first screen you will set up your workout phases durations (preparation time, work, rest, rounds and cool down) and you will choose your sound. Then hit “Go !”, work and just follow the whistle ! You can listen to your own music, just make sure you can still hear the sound. At the end of the workout, a new feature allows you to share your workout with your friends on Twitter and Facebook. ** Load preset : you can load one of our existing preset (Fat Loss, Tabata) or one you saved previously ** Save preset : you can save the workout you just set up ** Link to our Facebook page : you can like the app, share your experience with other users, share your workouts, make suggestions for new features, … ** Vibrate mode ** 3 seconds warning click ** Step Counter included in the training screen New features are added regularly, thanks for your feedbacks and your votes in our forum ( http://hiit.uservoice.com/forums/54804-general ) and join us on Facebook ( https://www.facebook.com/pages/Hiit-interval-training-android-app/104610142924377 ) * PHONE PERMISSIONS * Now automatically pause and resume if a phone call arrives. This is why PHONE_STATE permissions are required. The app doesn't have internet access so there's no chance of sniffing numbers.

description: Проведите время с удовольствием и пользой вместе с классической игрой "Составь слова", так же известной как "Слова из слова", "Составление слов из слова" и "Наборщик". Это одна из самых популярных интеллектуальных словесных игр! Правила игры очень просты: дается исходное слово, из букв которого нужно составить другие слова. При этом допускаются только имена существительные единственного числа в именительном падеже (исключая имена собственные). Игроки, добивающиеся лучших результатов в этой игре, отличаются прекрасной эрудицией и развитыми комбинаторными навыками – ведь вам приходится перебирать множество различных буквенных комбинаций. Одним из основных качеств хорошего игрока здесь является умение строить анаграммы – слова, составленные из всех букв заданного слова. Эта игра состоит из уровней, каждый уровень - это новое слово. Составляя слова из слова, вы набираете очки - каждая буква составленного слова, это одно очко. Допустим если вы открыли слово "вокзал", вы получите сразу 6 очков, а открыв слово "кит", всего 3 очка. Набирая достаточное количество очков, вы открываете новые уровни, и тем самым - новые слова! Игра будет постоянно обновляться, и с каждым обновлением будут добавляться новые слова. Если вы любитель таких словесных игр как "Виселица", "Балда", "Словобор", сканвордов, ребусов и прочих головоломок, то эта игра - для вас! В данной игре все слова проверены, и были исключены все нецензурные, неприличные и жаргонные слова, что бы вы могли не опасаться, если играете со своим ребенком. Spend time with pleasure and with the classic game of "Build the words" as well known as the "Word of the word," "Making the words of the word" and "compositor". This is one of the most popular intellectual word games! Game rules are very simple: given the original word, the letters you want to make other words. In this non-singular nouns in the nominative case (excluding proper names). Players who achieve the best results in this game differ fine erudition and developed combinatorial skills - because you have to sort through many different letter combinations. One of the main qualities of a good player here is the ability to construct anagrams - words composed of all the letters of the given word. This game consists of levels, each level - a new word. Composing words of word, you score points - each letter is composed words, this one point. Suppose if you have opened the word "station", once you get 6 points, while opening the word "whale", only 3 points. Gaining enough points, you unlock new levels, and thus - new words! The game will be constantly updated, and with each update will add new words. If you're a fan of word games such as "Hangman", "Balda", "Slovobor" skanvordov, riddles and other puzzles, this game is - for you! In this game all words tested, and were excluded obscene, indecent and slang words that you could not be afraid, if you play with your child.

Download one of the best escape games joy Sokoban Box Moving and develop your mental faculties! It's the best way to improve logic and strategy having fun, go ahead!

Features: - Runs as background service; play sounds as you do other tasks - Play up to 3 sounds simultaneously - Adjust volume on each sound individually - Download higher quality versions of your favorite sounds - Automatically shut off sound at a specific time or after a timer Visual options: - Display a clock on the pillow screen - Change the pillowcase image - Squishable pillow: touch pillow to squish, shake to fluff Ambient sounds included: - Park - Wind in trees - Stream - Waves - Waterfall More sounds which may be downloaded for free: - City - Crashing waves - Crickets - Crowd - Dishwasher - Fire - Heavy rain - Mountain stream - Ocean - Thunderstorm Permissions: - ACCESS_NETWORK_STATE (To check whether a connection is available for downloading sounds) - INTERNET (For downloading new sounds) - WRITE_EXTERNAL_STORAGE (To save downloaded sounds to your SD card) - READ_PHONE_STATE (To stop the sounds from playing when you receive a phone call) Note: the app must be installed on internal storage to ensure stability of the background service. ============================= If you are having issues with the app, please email us before rating so we can try to resolve your problem!

description: Is your screen too bright for reading at night? GSam Screen Dimmer will let you: * Dim your screen below the built-in settings for some devices * Set custom brightness settings, providing quick access to change your screen brightness * Automatically change brightness at certain times of the day (Pro version only) Even on its lowest Brightness setting, many people find that their screen can be too bright for reading in a dark room. GSam Screen Dimmer often lets you dim the screen way past what the built-in brightness setting will allow, giving you a much better night reading experience. You can dim your screen without ever leaving the app you are currently running. Better yet, you can see the content on your screen while you dim - no need to launch into separate screens. NOTE: * Not all devices will let you dim the screen past the default settings. * The Free version contains ads. Upgrade to the Pro version to remove the adds. * This app was designed with e-readers such as the Kindle Fire in mind, however it will function well on all Android devices, including Phones and Tablets. Permission Explanations: * SYSTEM_ALERT_WINDOW: Allows the dimmer to dim the screen below the system settings even when it's not the active foreground app. This is a dangerous setting to allow, however it is required for the screen dimmer. * WRITE_SETTINGS: Allows the dimmer to update the system brightness setting. * INTERNET: Allows the Free version to show Ads. This permission is not included in the Pro version. * RECEIVE_BOOT_COMPLETED: Allows the dimmer to automatically start up whenever you restart your devices. You can control this setting in the preferences.
release_text: 1.11 * Fix custom button setting for locale's that use commas for decimal points. 1.10 * Maintain screen brightness even when screen is locked. * Add option to turn off button key backlight when brightness is set below a user specified percent rather than attempting to dim them (very few devices - if any - support dimming)

description: An easy & quick way to manage your daily finances, Checkbook keeps track of your credit card charges, cash expenditures...etc. With Checkbook application, it can totally replace your paper checkbook. You can create multiple accounts, save recurring transactions, transfer funds, view reports & graphs, export data...etc. You can even search the transaction by crossing your finger on the calendar! All details of the Checkbook are well designed to provide excellent experience. FEATURES *Export in CSV & HTML Formats -Export your transactions by email for use of desktop applications. *Calendar -Show all your monthly transactions as points on the calendar. -Track transactions by tapping a date on the calendar. *Recurring Transactions -Save a transaction to be used repeatedly(daily, weekly, 2 weeks, monthly, tire monthly), without retyping all the details. *Multiple Accounts -Track as many accounts as you need. *Categories -Supports multiple categories with beautiful icons to choose from. *Payee & Note -All details you need to keep track of your transactions are including. *Search -Quickly search for transactions by account name, payee, notes and category. -Search and edit transactions in the same screen. *Transfer -Transfer funds from one account to another. *Reconcile Transactions -Reconcile your transactions by editing cleared/un-cleared status *Reports & Charts -Review all your expense & income by category or account with beautiful graphs and reports. -You can set the time period to daily, weekly, monthly & yearly. *Passcode -Protects your private information. *Currency -Supports multiple currencies. *Elegant, Powerful & User friendly interface If your have any problems or suggestions please send a mail to checkbook.a@appxy.com , you will get the response in a short time. Follow us on Twitter: @Appxy_official Like us on Facebook: Appxy Follow us on Google+: Appxy

Quick. Easy. Elegant. Honeycomb Home allows you to access any function in only 3 seconds. Call friends, text buddies, launch apps, and toggle system features - all in just 3 seconds. With Honeycomb Home you can: - Call or message your father, mother or significant other in just one click, even on the lock screen. - Launch Facebook, Pandora, Instagram and all your other favorite apps easily without endlessly searching through the home screen. - Turn system toggles on/off on the go, (Wi-fi, Bluetooth, GPS etc). - Quickest access to flashlight in the dark, just like using a real flashlight. - Instantly scan QR codes and barcodes, faster than you have ever experienced. - Set alarm clock in one touch - it's never been so easy! - Play all your favorite music instantly, perfect if you are in a hurry. - Get weather updates on the fly. - Customize your own honeycomb home, make it totally unique. All features are FREE! And that's not all! You can also: - Toggle the built-in portable Wifi hotspot, no root required. - Adjust the screen Brightness with bright/dark/auto modes. - Enable/Disable Mobile data settings with just one click. - Change Airplane mode status in the simplest way. - Lock Screen with just one tap on the Honeycomb cell, don’t worry about wearing down the power key. - Switch Sound between Sound, Vibrate and Mute modes. - Toggle Auto-rotate Screen settings on and off quickly and easily. - Switch Auto Sync on/off - very handy to save battery life and data usage. All these functions can be accessed on more than just the home screen - even on the LOCK SCREEN. Compared with other similar apps Honeycomb Home is the: - Quickest: Message or call your favorite contacts in just one click. - Easiest: Launch your favorite apps easily without exiting current app. - Smartest: Honeycomb will automatically shrink into a smallest bar when you are playing games or doing other work so it will never get in the way. - Most convenient: Access all functions anywhere and anytime, even on the lock screen. - Most elegant: Crystal clear honeycomb cells and vivid animation bring you a wonderful experience like you have never seen. - Most personalized: Add your frequently used functions in honeycomb cells and customize your own Honeycomb Home. - Most multifunctional: Change system switches quickly between functions, including Wi-fi, Airplane Mode, Bluetooth, Brightness, GPS, Lock screen, Mobile data etc. When Lock Screen has been activated, Android system does not allow you to uninstall Honeycomb Home in the normal way. If you need to uninstall, there are two ways: 1. Open Honeycomb Home settings, find the "Uninstall" option. 2. Go to "System settings" -> "Security" -> "Device administrators" to find “Honeycomb Home", then deactivate Honeycomb Home.
release_text: - Overall performance improvement. - Fully compatible with Android 5.0 and 5.1. Now on Android 5.0 or 5.1 devices Honeycomb can also automatically fade out to become a slider bar when you are playing games or doing other work so it will never get in the way.

description: It's been proven that with each passing year our brains slow down more and more. Even if you have good memory, there's nothing wrong with a bit of improvement. Exercise your temporal lobe with some brain training; a mixture of 6 challenges: Number Order - You will be presented with a grid of numbers that are placed in a random order. You will only have a short amount of time to study the grid and memorise the position of each number before the grid goes blank. Reveal all the numbers in order numerical order. Pattern Recall - The RED tiles form a pattern. You will have a short amount of time to study the pattern before it disappears. Reveal only the RED tiles. Complete as many levels as possible. Each level, you will have less time to study each pattern. Sequences - Each level you will be presented with an incrementing sequence of numbers. You have to remember the sequence of numbers in order. Each round a new number will be added; repeat the sequence by tapping the numbers. How many numbers can you remember? Missing Letters - You will be presented with a grid of random letters. You will only have a short amount of time to study the grid and memories the position of each letter before the grid goes blank. Reveal all the letters in alphabetical order. Do What I Do - You will be presented with a grid. You have to remember a sequence of flashing tiles, once the sequence has finished you must tap the relevant tiles to copy the sequence. Remember the sequence in order. Seeing Double - Each level you will have to reveal and match a pair of pictures. You will only have a short amount of time to study the grid and memorise the position of each picture before the grid goes blank. Each level, more pairs will be added. Reveal each pair to progress through the levels.

description: ★★★ Google Play selects Accupedo pedometer as 2014 Best 30 Apps at Google Play Store in Japan and Korea. [Dec. 2014] "Accupedo Pedometer Widget made good walking buddies in our last tests." [Washington Post, 10/1/12] "Among cellphone apps the Accupedo pedometer widget for Android phones had the top spot." [LA Times, 12/28/11] Accupedo is an accurate pedometer app that monitors your daily walking on the home screen. With easy to read charts and history logs, monitor your steps, calories burned, distance, and time. As your best walking buddy, Accupedo will motivate you to walk more! Set up your daily goal and step towards a healthier you with Accupedo pedometer. ++++ ATTENTION ++++ Your phone may not compatible with Accupedo. Some phones do not support the G-sensor in SLEEP (STANDBY, when screen is OFF) mode by those phone manufacturers. This is not a defect of this app. Accupedo is a free edition of Accupedo-Pro. An intelligent 3D motion recognition algorithm is embedded to track only walking patterns by filtering and ejecting out non walking activities. Accupedo counts your steps regardless of where you put your phone like your pocket, waist belt, or bag. Be healthy by setting up your daily goal and accurately monitoring your steps with Accupedo. ++++ Features ++++ ● The intelligent algorithm starts tracking after 10 consecutive steps, then stops and restarts automatically as you walk. ● Customizable widget display modes: steps, distance, minutes, calories, and Lap. ● Daily log history: step counts, distance, calories, and walking time. ● Charts: Daily, weekly, monthly, and yearly step counts. ● Power usage mode options for efficient power saving. ● Customized personal settings: sensitivity, metric/english, step distance, body weight, daily goal, etc. ● Concise widget display on Home screen: 2x1, 3x1, and 4x1 ● Edit daily step counts. ● Lap: “odometer” function for short walk. ● Resume/Pause/Reset. ● Database backup: SD-Card and Google Drive. ● Widget skin colors: black, blue, green, orange, pink, transparent. ● Share daily log on the Facebook. ● Email a daily log file. ● Language option: default and English ++++ Installation ++++ ● WATCH YOUTUBE FOR INSTALLATION VIDEO (Type in Accupedo) for more information. - For Android OS 4.0 or higher 1. After downloading, click App icon. You will see Widgets tab on the top. 2. Choose Widget, and search for Accupedo. - For Android OS 2.2 or 2.3 1. After downloading, press and hold your finger on the empty space of the Home screen. (If your Home screen is full of Apps, remove at least two adjacent App because Accupedo needs two App space to install it.) “Add to Home screen” menu will appear with options listing. 2. Select Widgets from the menu, and then select the widget named “Accupedo”. ++++ Notes ++++ ● It performs best when the phone is on your waist belt. ● Step count may not be accurate if you put your phone in loose fit pants due to the random movement your phone makes in the pocket. ● The sensitivity of a phone can be different from others. So, choose a sensitivity level that works best for your phone. ● Help and FAQ are built in the App.

Android devices have a vibration sensor - accelerometer. It is a sensitive sensor that reports the device vibrations. This tool is powerful vibration meter tool. If you want to recommend the alarm feature that may recognize earthquake http://www.facebook.com/pages/Earthquake-Alarm/311308608954778 We will also use this facebook page to keep you informed about the work progress and current activities and plans for the future. This application comes with ABSOLUTELY NO WARRANTY. Notice: There is a problem that occurs on some devices. Some devices may not provide the data when from the vibration sensor when the screen is off. This is an Android error. We are trying to find a good workaround. Send us the information if the application does not work, please Very deep technical information http://code.google.com/p/android/issues/detail?id=3708

My Contacts Backup is the easiest way to backup and restore your contacts all from your phone without needing a computer or synchronization. You can backup all your contacts with a single touch and send yourself as a .vcf attachment via email. All contacts can then easily be restored any time by simply opening .vcf file in your mailbox. Key Features: * Offline Backup. No need to sync to any server. Just email the backup file to yourself. * Your adress book is secure and safe. We don't access or store your contacts. * Easy restore. No need to any app to restore backup file. Just tap on the *.vcf backup file in the Android or iPhone mail client. * Easily transfer contacts between Android or iPhone devices using just email client. * Copy backup file to your computer via USB cable feature. * Set REMINDER to backup regularly (weekly or monthly) * Backup Contacts as VCF (VCard) ---------- IMPORTANT NOTE: After sending backup file (*.vcf) to yourself, please check your inbox if message arrived and contains attachment (backup file). Sometimes email providers block attachments if attachment size is too large. Try with another mail account if possible, to send your backup file. Or copy backup file (on SD card) to your computer via USB cable. ----------

Protect your privacy, hide your location, and bypass site blocks. Orxy is an Orbot alternative that supports devices running the latest Android. Orxy protects network traffic using The Onion Router (Tor) network. Tor encrypts the data and sends it through random points across the world to hide where the connection started. For example, while using Orxy, a website you visit might think you're looking at it from another country. Orxy also lets apps understand .onion addresses, which are special names that point to hidden services within the Tor network, sometimes referred to as the 'Hidden Web,' 'Dark Net,' or 'Deep Web.' Try it out: http://3g2upl4pq6kufc4m.onion To benefit from Orxy, you must configure your apps to use it as a proxy. Orxy provides a local Socks5 proxy on port 6150 (and 9050) and an HTTP proxy on port 8118. Avoid the hassle of configuration and protect apps that have no proxy settings, like YouTube, bitcoin clients, or the Play store, by installing the Orxify plugin ( http://goo.gl/ymr12A ). Orxify automatically manages all app traffic transparently, without requiring special configuration or root access. No configuration prevents mistakes that could potentially leak information. In addition to using Tor to anonymize your traffic, optionally subscribe to our proxy service and hide the Tor traffic from your ISP, which is especially useful if your ISP blocks Tor traffic. Orxy will send the Tor traffic in an encrypted tunnel through one of our proxies, making it appear like an access to a regular HTTPS protected site. Your data is protected from us by Tor, and Tor traffic is hidden from your ISP by the tunnel. Try it free for 7 days, just click 'Hide Tor Traffic' within Orxy. A quick way to get started with the default setup is to install Orweb. Avoid the prompt to install/enable Orbot by changing the proxy settings within Orweb: Navigate to Settings -> Proxy Host and enter 127.0.0.1 as the value. Firefox supports proxy settings by entering about:config in the address bar, search 'proxy', and setting the following: - network.proxy.type = 1 - network.proxy.socks = 127.0.0.1 - network.proxy.socks_port = 6150 - network.proxy.socks_remote_dns to true (click 'toggle') - network.proxy.http = 127.0.0.1 - network.proxy.http_port = 8118 - network.proxy.ssl = 127.0.0.1 - network.proxy.ssl_port = 8118 For the Twitter app: Settings -> Enable HTTP Proxy -> set Proxy Host to localhost and Proxy Port to 8118 Visit http://goo.gl/GHjqgs for more info on Tor, including tips on remaining anonymous and protecting yourself. Tips: - If you log in to a website using your username and password, you are no longer anonymous to that website. - Logging in to sensitive sites while using Orxy, such as online banking or email sites, is not recommended. These sites usually have checks to verify your identity using your common locations. If you suddenly appear as logging in from another country, you may get blocked. You must also be careful to ensure proper HTTPS is used to prevent someone from seeing your password. It's best to simply avoid these sites to be safe. - Google search will sometimes present a CAPTCHA while using Orxy. If it persists, use another anonymous friendly search engine such as http://ddg.gg (or http://3g2upl4pq6kufc4m.onion ) Email any bugs, comments, or questions. Note: Anonimizing traffic can be slow: it may be sent over many hops around the world. The Samsung app com.sec.msc.nts.android.proxy interferes with Orweb, please disable it if you have connectivity problems: Settings->Applications->Application Manager->com.sec.msc.nts.android.proxy -> Turn Off. Follow @orxify for updates: https://twitter.com/orxify This product is produced independently from the Tor® anonymity software and carries no guarantee from The Tor Project about quality, suitability or anything else. Do not use without knowing the inherent risks and limitations of Tor. Use at your own risk.

description: The Wisconsin Army National Guard is made up of approximately 7,700 soldiers including a headquarters staff in Madison and four major commands located throughout 67 Wisconsin communities: the 32nd “Red Arrow” Infantry Brigade Combat Team headquartered at Camp Douglas; 64th Troop Command, Madison; 157th Maneuver Enhancement Brigade, Milwaukee; and the 426th Regiment (RTI) Regional Training Institute, Fort McCoy. The Army National Guard (ARNG) is one of the seven reserve components of the United States armed forces. It is also the organized militia of 54 separate entities: the 50 states, the territories of Guam and the U.S. Virgin Islands, the Commonwealth of Puerto Rico, and the District of Columbia. Administered by the National Guard Bureau (a joint bureau of the departments of the Army and Air Force), the ARNG has both a federal and state mission. The dual mission, a provision of the U.S. Constitution and the U.S. Code of laws, results in each Soldier holding membership in both the National Guard of his or her state and in the U.S. Army. Wisconsin Army National Guard Units (Major Commands): -32nd Infantry Brigade Combat Team -157th Maneuver Enhancement Brigade -64th Troop Command -426th Regiment (RTI)/Wisconsin Military Academy -Heraldry of Joint Force Headquarters Use our app to: - Find a recruiter - Learn about eligibility, careers, & benefits - Watch MSGuard TV - Send in pictures & audio clips - Connect via social media - Check out upcoming events - Post to our community message board - and more!

Speaker Booster is a native app which will increase your overall sound by 15-30% depending on your device. Rather than the rest boosters, Speaker Booster adjusts your Android eQualizer via sophisticated algorithm in order to increase the sound. Simply press the Boost button, sit down and relax and let the app do the work for you. Features: * System - Adjusting the volume level of your system. * Media - Adjusting the volume level of your media. * Notifications - Adjusting the volume level of your notifications. It works for both speakers and headphones. You will also discover a significant difference in your ringer, alarm and voice call level. Disclaimer: This app will NOT damage your speakers. This app doesn't have viruses and will NOT damage your phone! Advertising Policy Disclosure: We love creating apps, and want to keep them free forever. In order to keep our development running, Speaker Booster is ad-supported to generate some revenue. When you click on advertisements delivered by Speaker Booster, you will typically be directed to a third-party’s web page.
