description: This Munich guide is our reliable and easy-to-use travel companion. Find directions with detailed offline maps, in-depth travel content, popular attractions and insider tips with this Munich city guide. Plan and have the perfect trip! Book your hotel and enjoy restaurant reviews and shared user content. Here is why 15+million travelers love Ulmon Offline & City Guides: Didn’t you always want to have an easily portable and compact travel assistant that allows planning your trips to foreign countries and cities upfront? So turn your smartphone or tablet into a digital Munich City Guide and planner leading you through YOUR choices of restaurants, hotels and which attractions to visit. Enjoy recommendations and reviews of other enthusiastic travelers and tourists. Always keep your orientation and find the direction to the next place; completely without roaming and offline. With this Munich offline map and city guide you enjoy a wide variety of advantages: FREE Simply download and try this Munich city guide for free. There is absolutely no risk, and we’re sure you’ll love it! DETAILED MAPS Never get lost and keep your orientation. See your location on the Munich offline map, even without an internet connection. Find streets, attractions, restaurants, hotels, local nightlife and other POIs – and get guided in the walking direction of places you want to see. IN-DEPTH TRAVEL CONTENT Have all the information offline and freely portable. For each destination, access comprehensive and up-to-date information covering thousands of places, attractions, points of interest and many hotel booking options within this Munich travel guide. SEARCH AND DISCOVER Find the best restaurants, shops, attractions, hotels, bars, etc. Search by name, browse by category or discover nearby places using your device’s GPS – even offline and without data roaming. GET TIPS AND RECOMMENDATIONS Find tips and recommendations from locals and tourists. Browse offline in this Munich guide for the most popular attractions, restaurants, shops, hotels, nightlife places, etc. PLAN TRIPS AND CUSTOMIZE MAPS Create lists of places you want to visit. Pin existing places, like your hotel or a recommended restaurant, to the map. Add your own pins to the map. Find and book hotels from within this Munich city guide. OFFLINE ACCESS The Munich Offline Map and the Munich CIty Guide content are fully downloaded and stored on your device. All features, such as address searches and your GPS location also work offline and without data roaming (an internet connection is of course required for initial downloading of data or booking hotels). DATA QUALITY: Map data and POI are provided by OpenStreetMap and are regularly updated by us. To check the level of detail, go to www.openstreetmap.org. The same applies to Wikipedia travel articles. DETAILED CITY COVERAGE Munich the capital of Bavaria in Germany not only hosts the Oktoberfest but also has many interesting places for sightseeing. Using this tourist guide and its Wikipedia articles you will not miss a single attraction! Ulmon, the makers of this guide app, are a small team of enthusiastic travel freaks in Vienna, Austria. We aim to assist tourists around the world with a portable planner, assistant and trip companion for their vacations and explorations. Enjoy your travels. Your Ulmon team! :-)

description: ElectroDroid is a simple and powerful collection of electronics tools and references. This is the free version, which contains ads; you can also buy from the Market the PRO version of the app to support the developer, unlock more features and get rid of the ads. The app includes: • Resistor color code decoder (3-6 bands); • SMD Resistor Code; • Inductor color code decoder; • Ohm’s law calculator; • Reactance/Resonance calculator; • Voltage divider; • Resistors ratio, value/series/parallel; • Capacitor charge calculation; • Operational amplifier; • LED resistor calculator; • Adjustable voltage regulator/LM317 calculator; • Heat dissipation; • Battery Life calculator; • Inductor design tool; • Voltage Drop calculator; • PCB Trace Width calculator; • Simple Filters calculator; • NE555 calculator; • Power Calculator; • Decibel Converter; • Frequency Converter; • Analog-Digital Converter; • Y-Δ Transformation; • Port pin-out (USB, Serial, Parallel, Ethernet, RJ, SCART, DVI, HDMI, S-Video, VGA, VESA, Display Port, FireWire, Jack, RCA, XLR/DMX, ATX Power, PC Molex, EIDE, SATA, PS/2-AT, MIDI/Game port, Apple 30-pin, PDMI, OBD-II, 25-pair phone cable color code, Color Code for Fiber Optic Cables; ISO connector for car audio; Arduino pin-outs); • Resources (Resistivity table; Table of standard resistors and capacitors; Capacitor marking codes; AWG and SWG Wire size; Ampacity Table; Symbols and Abbreviations; Circuit Schematic Symbols; SI Units prefixes; Battery info; Boolean logic gate and algebra Theorems; 7400 info and pinout; ASCII codes, Batteries list, 78xx IC, ChipDB IC pinouts, Switch Information, Decibel Table, PIC ICSP/AVR ISP, SMD Package Size, Radio frequencies); • Full support for EIA resistor series for all calculators; ...and more to come! The app has also support for plugins to expand functionality of the application (e.g. PIC and AVR micro-controllers Database, simulators, parts search). If you like the program, please rate it, and buy the full version to support the development. Electrodroid PRO link: https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=it.android.demi.elettronica.pro For FAQ and full change-log, visit http://electrodroid.it
release_text: Version 4.0.1: • fixed list order, screen rotation and other minor issues; Version 4.0: • Material design; • Added more formulas, increased performance [Pro]; • New Pinouts: Raspberry Pi2, Arduino Nano, JTAG/SWD; • New Resources: ISM Radio frequencues, added mm2 in Ampacity table; • improved RTL support; • translation updates, added Uyghur; • bugs fix;

description: Just like the real thing! A 3D fireworks you've never seen before … now as a Live Wallpaper. A feast for the senses: Marvel and relax. *** 3D fireworks *** - many different types of skyrockets: planet explosion, ring, sphere, double boom, among others - all in different colors and sizes - special big golden rain willow - with realistic colors and spark effects - backdrop of stars (starlit night) - calculations with physics applied - a new experience every time, no prerendered videos *** Just like the real thing! *** The algorithms in this app are based on real physics. app_name: 紫微斗數-算命 八字 紫薇 占卜 運程 開運 2015年運勢
description: 紫微斗數，中國傳統命理學的最重要的支派之壹。它是以人出生的年、月、日、時確定十二宮的位置，構成命盤，結合各宮的星群組合，周易幹支理論，來預測壹個人的命運、吉凶禍福的。 紫微和八字一樣，都是漢族人發明的算命術，發明者相傳爲宋代的陳希夷。紫微斗數在古代被尊稱爲“帝王學”，並在皇宮中設有“欽天監”對其進行研究，能接觸到紫微斗數的人只限于皇族中人或是有皇帝欽點的官員。這也就是爲什麽八字在漢族民間流傳較廣，而紫微斗數卻少爲人知的原因。 紫微斗數就是東方的星座學，紫微命盤對應星盤；占星中有12星座，紫微斗數也有14主星；紫微主星的四大類型（剛烈型、剛中帶柔型、柔中帶剛型、柔和型）與星座四象（火象、土象、風象、水象）較爲相似。但是，紫微斗數需要出生的年、月、日、時四個參數，每差壹個時辰，命盤就完全不同，計算更爲精准。因此，紫微斗數不僅是世界上最早的行爲心理學，也是最爲精准的算命術。 【靈機紫微斗數特點】 1、傳統的紫微命理知識，解說深入淺出，專業解盤無師自通！ 2、精析各命宮的運勢，流日命盤全面預測運程指數，星象吉凶！ 3、傳授各種開運化災秘訣，應變人生起伏，趨吉避凶！ 4、最專業時尚的紫微應用，操作簡易，隨身攜帶，隨時隨地查看未來變動！ 【應用分析內容揭秘】 1、流年運勢詳批，七大方向詳細分析您的流年運程，讓您趨吉避凶，各方面順利發展，每年都有好收穫。 2、婚姻感情分析，瞭解您的婚姻生活狀況，愛情觀，給出在感情方面的建議，並找出適合於您的婚姻物件。 3、財運狀況分析，看出您財運好壞、富有程度，以及金錢的支配使用情況，和賺錢的能力與機會。 4、健康注意分析，看出您的健康狀況如何，身體最容易生病的地方，身體的那一部位要較注意保養。 5、事業發展分析，可看出您是否適合創業，可從事何種職業，與上司相處的互動情況等資訊。 6、大師贈言，告訴您自己的缺點及其所帶來的負面影響，指出最需要注重的問題，並給出正確的應對方法。 更多精彩內容，可以下載應用親身體驗！ 【聯繫我們】 網站： http://m.linghit.com/ Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/linghit 郵箱： customer@linghit.com
release_text: 更新日誌: 1.應廣大用戶要求，開啟2016年的流年運程分析。

description: Kids Heads Up Charades! by Blueique Studios (NOT affiliated with iPhone Heads Up! app) ** NO ADS! NO PESKY IN-APP PURCHASES - FREE UPDATES ** ***Please check device compatibility before purchase by trying the free Celeb Heads Up Charades! app by Blueique Studios*** An AMAZINGLY funny game that will have you and the kids laughing in tears! The concept is simple, guess the word on the card that will sit on your head, from the clues your friends give you BEFORE the timer runs out! Words have been carefully chosen to make it easier for kids to play too now, no need skip movies and characters they are not familiar with. Kids need to be able to read to play game. Your kids can use funny voices, mimic celebrities and moo like a cow - all to make you guess. Awesome highlights: - Tilt the phone forward to bring up a new card - Tilt the phone backwards to pass. - All it takes is one friend to start playing, or play with many AWESOME Categories include: - Kidlet's Fav Idols: Jump for joy as your kids guess their most loved cartoon, TV and movie characters! - Easy Mimic: Have your kids in hysterical laughter as you mimic easy to read words. - Kidlet's Movies: Movies your kids will be familiar with from modern to classic. Laugh as your kids mime popular children's movies! - Simple Animals: Simple animal names simply chosen for kids. Double over in giggles as your kids moo like a cow and other animals! - NEW UPDATE Kidlet's Snacks: Easy food names for kids to describe! Hoot with laughter as your kids try and describe jelly and other food names! Kids parties will never be the same again! Disclaimer I: We are in NO WAY affiliated with the iPhone Heads Up! game that Ellen DeGeneres plays on her show or Hey Hey it's Saturday Celebrity Head game.

description: Loadshedding is annoying!! Be smart enough to plan your time efficiently!! Introducing a smarter way to view and track daily load-shedding schedule in Nepal for all the android smartphones and tablet users. You can now set your loadshedding GROUP, view the schedule along with Power ON/OFF status, remaining COUNTDOWN time, and the NOTIFICATION regarding the upcoming power cut. You can also place the home screen widgets for multiple groups – may be one for your HOME and another for your OFFICE or SHOP. The system also facilitates you to find out the loadshedding group by places through the location search and the custom Google-maps feature Key Features 1. View Schedule offline once downloaded 2. Power ON/OFF status with Remaining Time Countdown 3. Smart Notifications before Power OFF/ON 4. Search loadshedding GROUP by LOCATION 5. Google Maps to find group using GPS 6. Multiple Widgets - For Your Home ,Office , Shop e.t.c 7. New Widget to view ALL 7 Groups Status 8. Schedule in Nepali Language 9. View Schedule with Date/Time in B.S/A.D 10. Forward Schedule through SMS 11. Auto Update of Schedule Changes P.S: The effective schedule is retrieved from the official site of Nepal Electricity Authority. Nepal Loadshedding Schedule is not responsible for any unlisted/deviated power cuts from the effective schedule published here. Schedule Source : http://nea.org.np/loadshedding.html . NEA (Nepal Electricity Authority) Special Thanks To Shankar Uprety ( Hamro Patro) for Nepali Unicode

description: 7-year-old Mathilda lets her helpless goldfish, Yello, taste freedom in the local wild creek. Help Yello to escape Mathilda and navigate the poor fish through a rough adventure in the dangerous river filled with rocks, burning logs and piranhas! Will Yello escape, fall victim to the hazardous environment, to Mathilda’s fish net?? Action packed Endless Runner: √ Steer clear of tons of dangerous hazards by simply tilting to move, swipe up to jump and down to dive √ Lots of awesome power ups, including shield, magnet, rocket and super star √ Collect stars and buy better power ups √ Awesome cartoon animations! √ Show off your score “This game is lots of fun and a sure winner for fans of the endless runner genre.” – AppAdvice “On the surface, what ensues is essentially Temple Run meets Jetpack Joyride…great mixture of tilt controls, swipe controls and level design to make things feel tight and challenging, not gimmicky.” – Gamezebo “It’s competent, funny, and cute…it’s a blast.” – TouchArcade Please note that Chasing Yello is free to play, but you are able to purchase game items with real money. If you want to limit the ability to make in-app purchases, you may create a PIN in the Settings menu from within the Google Play Store. Your use of this application is governed by the Terms of Service available at http://www.dreamfab.com/terms-of-service/ . The sunrise and sunset times for the port selected are also shown.

description: PokéGal+ is anything but a typical dating game. It's a dating sim on the Go!  Alcy's dating sim PokéGal+ is anything but your typical dating sim game. It's a dating sim on the Go! The Android title is packed with over 1,000 scripts and 100 events. See? On the Go! Feel free to leave reviews so we can create the best dating sim experience for everyone!

description: Catch the butterflies before they fly away! This fun math game for kids is an exciting way to learn addition, subtraction, multiplication, and division math facts and to improve math fluency skills. Beautiful butterflies flutter while you quickly solve the math problem before time runs out! After completing a level, catch the butterflies, but watch out for the bees! As you successfully pass levels, the math problems increase in difficulty and new types of butterflies appear. The free version lets you play the first two levels. This math game for kids makes math fun and avoids boring math drills. Mixes game play and beautiful graphics with education! Features: - addition, multiplication, subtraction, division - timed or untimed problem solving - no ads or tracking of user information - after second level user asked yes/no to purchase full version - grades: first grade, second grade, third grade, fourth grade

◆◇Get Animals for Inviting Friends to Play PokoPoko Now! The mega-hit puzzle game Pokopang that racked up 37 million downloads around the world is back in all new style! Get ready for LINE PokoPoko! Each area offers its own unique set of missions with fabulous rewards that keep you coming back for more. - Your Favorite Characters From Pokopang Boni and all your fluff-faced friends from Pokopang are back and hungry for more adventure! Harvest items when they’re ripe for picking and you’re ready to use them in the game! - Diverse Stage Structures PokoPoko offers original stages you won’t find in other games. Pocket Planets is the most comprehensive 3D Solar System Simulator in the Google Play Store. With accurate scale representation of the Sun, Planets, Moons, Asteroids, Dwarfs and detailed information to the celestial objects. Use it as educational software for your kids, or regardless if you are a beginner or advanced astronomer, this App brings you closer to the planets than any telescope. Working great on smartphones and tablets. Discover... ★ the Sun , the bright shining star in the center of our Solar System ★ Mercury , the fastest planet orbiting around our Sun ★ Venus , its greenhouse effect produces a surface temperature that would melt lead ★ Earth , the blue oasis and only place filled with life ★ Mars , inspiration for many SciFi films and books ★ Jupiter , the giant, guardian and protector in our neighborhood ★ Saturn , with rings of unique beauty and elegance ★ Uranus , which rolls over its orbit like a bowling ball ★ Neptune , the outermost recognized planet ★ Pluto , one of a new category of dwarf planets But these are not all objects of this simulator, because so far you do not know Orcus , Varuna , Ceres , Pallas , Haumea and all the other asteroids and dwarf planets. Not to mention Sedna whose orbit is still speculative to science. Nearly 200 objects are included, but not as static images, rather as living objects in a living universe. Enjoy the Solar System in realtime, in the future or past. Bring the cosmos to life with an innovative timeslider . Let time take its course, how fast depends on the scale factor of the timeslider. A wipe with your finger and the simulator comes to life. For a more exiting viewing experience various camera modes are available. Attach the camera to a planet or place it at a fixed location in space and let the celestial bodies pass by, in portrait or landscape mode, whatever you prefer. And that's still not all. A built in encyclopedia gives you useful information about each object of the simulation, extracted from Wikipedia. Don't miss this unique viewing experience, there is no easier way to explore the wonderful world beyond our planet. And if you ever feel "Lost in Space", don't worry, because it's just a simulation. Features: ★ Super smooth UI ★ Nearly 200 simulation objects ★ Simulation of real celestial body distances and dimensions ★ Adjustable simulator time with an innovative timeslider ★ Flexible camera system for a unique viewing experience ★ Portrait and landscape mode ★ Many HD textures, some of original recordings (NASA Voyager, Cassini spacecraft) ★ Many preference options ★ Ephemeris data based on NASA Horizons system ★ Orbit calculations with modified Kepler algorithms ★ Encyclopedia function, the most important information from Wikipedia Please try Pocket Planets Lite before buying this full version to ensure device compatibility. If you have any problems please don't hesitate to contact me via email because this is the only way I can help you, thank you.

Carrier-independent tethering over USB and Bluetooth. EasyTether shares Internet connection from your smartphone with your computer, tablet and router. It supports USB tethering for Windows, Mac OS X, Linux or FreeBSD computers, Android 5.0 / 4.0.3+ tablets and OpenWRT-based routers. It supports Bluetooth tethering for Windows computers and Android 5.0+ / 4.0.3+ tablets. It does not require root access or special tethering plans. If Sprint or another carrier has made the app invisible in Google Play, you can download EasyTether apk from our website http://www.mobile-stream.com/a/easytether-device.apk EasyTether uses only official APIs ensuring your phone's security. Unlike many tethering widgets, EasyTether implements its own tethering mechanism completely from scratch. THE LITE VERSION BLOCKS HTTPS, INSTANT MESSENGERS AND GAME CONSOLE TETHERING. IF YOU WANT FULL FEATURES, PURCHASE THE FULL VERSION. Full app allows https - access to secure sites such as facebook, gmail, online banking etc. Full app supports PS4, Xbox and Wii tethering by means of Internet connection sharing feature on Windows or Mac. Full app is $9.99, one-time fee only. All updates are free for registered users. Product Reviews "EasyTether Pro takes your hand and walks you gently into Tetherland. You'll be tethering with this app for years to come, as long as your carrier still offers unlimited data.While the setup prcoess may be a bit tricky for the least tech savvy, most users will be up and tethering in no time. Tether on my friends. 9.5/10" - Ben Freed, App Rundown "While EasyTether involves a bit more work than rooted tether apps, it is a nice solution for people that can't or don't want to root their phones." - Ed Clark, Androinica "Overall, EasyTether is a great app to have. It is very useful and since it is USB enabled it will not drain your battery. The speed is excellent even though it is coming from a smartphone. I suggest that you go Pro for $9.99 just because it will allow you to access websites that you will probably need to access anyway (HTTPS)." - The Good Find
release_text: Bluetooth support for Windows is now official

description: Wishing you wealth, prosperity and a bright future in the Chinese new year! Celebrate the year of the Chinese New Year with this unique and colorful Money Tree application for Android. Shake your phone, or swipe left-right to shake coins from the Money Tree! The harder you shake, the more coins drop, increasing your good luck and prosperity! Show your friends and family! This full-featured application has: * Background Music * Sound effects for dropping coins * 3D rendered graphics * Flexible settings and calibration

This clock indicates the time by means of LEDs. In particular, the seconds indicator is unique because of the use of 60 LEDs in a ring. There is also a Grandfather Clock built in that can optionally strike every hour. If you have installed an English voice on your Android device then the clock will also provide spoken information! In particular the speaking cooking timer, minutes announcer and the alarm clock are very handy features. The alarm clock can be set to a different time for each day of the week! The Speaking Led clock can be configured to your own taste through the settings menu (icon with three dots). You can also press 'long' on the clock itself to activate the settings window. The possible settings are: - American or European date indication. - Configuration of the Grandfather Clock. - Whether or not to display the Date. - Whether or not to show the Seconds. - English or Dutch language. - The Time announcer at 1, 5, 10, 15, 20, 30 or 60 minutes. - The interval of the built-in Cooking Timer. - The time at which you will be awakened for each day of the week. To change a setting, you should click 'long' on the relevant line in the settings table. Also you can easily revert back to the default settings. The Cooking Timer can be set by clicking on the relevant line until you hear and see the desired interval. To start the timer, you should click 'long' on this line. We wish you much pleasure and usefulness of this software. DSH electronics Leidschendam, The Netherlands www.dsh2000.com

Бесплатная игра о Диком Западе! - СОЗДАЙТЕ свою ферму. Уделяйте ей хотя бы 10 минут в день - и у вас будет идеальная ферма. - ИГРАЙТЕ с друзьями или без друзей! - ВЫРАЩИВАЙТЕ кукурузу и клевер, яблоки и пекан, КОРМИТЕ кур, коров и свиней. - ПОСТРОЙТЕ Летнюю кухню, Гриль и Консервный станок, ИЗУЧИТЕ рецепты настоящих фермеров. - ПРОДАВАЙТЕ товары со своей фермы по самым выгодным ценам. - СОЗДАЙТЕ прииск и добывайте золото и серебро! - СТАНЬТЕ самым богатым и знаменитым фермером на Диком Западе! Особенности: - Уникальная 3D графика - Впервые! Вращение камеры – рассмотрите свою ферму со всех сторон - Выращивайте полезные растения - Кормите милых животных - Стройте оригинальные здания - Только самые интересные рецепты - Готовьте из натуральных продуктов, выращенных на вашей ферме! - Развивайте производство: добывайте дерево, камень, золото и серебро. Free game of the Wild West! - Create your farm. Give it at least 10 minutes a day - and you'll have the perfect farm. - Play with friends or without friends! - Grow corn and clover, apples and pecans, feed chickens, cows and pigs. - Build a summer kitchen, grill and canning machine recipes READ these farmers. - Sell products from his farm at the best prices. - To create mine and mine gold and silver! - Become the richest and most famous farmer in the Wild West! Features: - Unique 3D graphics - For the first time! Rotate the camera - consider your farm from all sides - Grow useful plants - Feed the cute animals - Build the original buildings - Only the most interesting recipes - Prepare of natural products grown on your farm! - Develop production: mining wood, stone, gold and silver.
release_text: Обновления в игре «Дикий Запад: Новые земли» никого не оставят равнодушным. Теперь Вы сможете подписаться на понравившуюся ферму, чтобы еще не раз заглядывать в гости. Точно так же игроки смогут подписываться и на Вас. Интерфейсы многих фабрик стали удобнее и практичнее. Лотерейщик начал двигаться быстрее, его прогулки по ферме больше не будут Вас утомлять. А еще Вы сможете заглядывать на ферму друга, перемещаясь со своего рынка на его рынок. Наслаждайтесь яркой и постоянно развивающейся игрой!

description: - Advanced Placement Art History (AP Art History) is an Advanced Placement Art History course and exam offered by College Board. AP Art History is designed to allow students to examine major forms of artistic expression relevant to a variety of cultures evident in wide variety of periods from present times into the past - Advanced Placement Music Theory (or AP Music Theory, AP Jams, AP Music, or even Music AP) is a course and examination offered in the United States by the College Board as part of the Advanced Placement Program to high school students who wish to earn credit for a college level music theory course. - AP Studio Art is a series of Advanced Placement Courses divided into three different categories: AP Studio Art Drawing, AP Studio Art 2D, and AP Studio Art 3D. In this app, we provide many Questions and Flashcards, They may help you to prepare for 4 types of AP Art Test. Practice them everyday to get high score, Good luck :)

description: Join the colorful characters from Richard Scarry’s acclaimed books as they work together to solve some of Busytown’s toughest mysteries. Presented in a series of full-length interactive adventures called toontales, each Busytown mystery is designed to challenge your child’s deductive reasoning skills in a fun and informative way. Free to install, the Busytown app features multiple full-length toontale episodes, including one that is unlocked and available for you and your child to enjoy in “freeview” mode. Parents can permanently add this and any other Busytown toontale to their device by purchasing it in a gated and secure area of the app. And the best part? Users that stay “tooned-in” will enjoy future freeview releases and toontale episodes! The first truly hybrid app experience, Busytown Mysteries combines educational and entertaining activities with dialogue, stories, animations and interactions. So what are you waiting for? Help Huckle Cat solve the following Busytown mysteries: Toontale 1 – The Strange Ski Tracks Mystery: ***Available in FREEVIEW mode*** Uncover the clues and test your memory to discover who’s been leaving tracks on the Busytown ski slope! *EDUCATIONAL OBJECTIVE: Memory Development and Recall Toontale 2 – The Mystery Present: Use your counting and matching skills to help Huckle solve the mystery behind the misplaced gift. *EDUCATIONAL OBJECTIVE: Number and Color Recognition Toontale 3 – The Missing Pirate Gold: Put your search and discovery powers to the test at Busytown beach and help Huckle unravel the mystery of the missing pirate gold. *EDUCATIONAL OBJECTIVE: Shape and Image Association App Features: - Each toontale includes two educational activities and three sing along karaoke sequences. - An interactive summary that aids with deductive reasoning is included at the end of every toontale. - Rich, responsive animations engage children in playful interactions with the characters. - Learning tools like touch-to-speak technology, character-specific word highlighting and speech bubbles help children grasp pre-reading skills. - Optimized for Tablets and HD Devices
release_text: - Optimized for Tablets and HD Devices - Bug fixes and optimizations

description: Race and jump across hilly, colorful landscapes of forests, deserts, snowy mountains and beautiful meadows. Make sure that you don't run out of gas and don't lose your luggage performing daredevil stunts – the roof of your RV is piled precariously high. Suitcases, bags, the birdcage and your fellow travelers must arrive safely at the holiday resort - else you won't get the full score. Start your craziest family holiday with a turbulent and crazy family journey in Sunny Hillride - even your pet parrot is on board! Tons of rewards await you as you cross hills and valleys. Try not to miss any of the coins and souvenirs lying around. Sunny Hillride is a fun journey with the whole family, filled with adventure, fun and speed! FEATURES: • Manifold colorful landscapes: juicy green meadows, snowy hills, sunny forests and scorching deserts • Different game modes • Groovy jazzy soundtrack • Tons of secret souvenirs • Crazy high jumps let you perform breakneck stunts • Supports Tablets & Smartphones --------------------------------------- *** ...this one's pretty good. We really dig the look and the luggage mechanic, even though both are simple in the grand scheme of things. The campaign angle is neat, too, as it kinda opens up the game for an actual narrative. *** Toucharcade.com *** Sunny Hillride is a funny game by the creators at Headup Games which can especially score due to it's highly easygoing controls *** apps-news.de --------------------------------------- Get connected: www.facebook.com/HeadupGames www.twitter.com/HeadupGames www.headupgames.com Sunny Hillride is for fans of Tiny Wings, Dragon Fly, Hill Climb Racing, Angry Birds, Real Racing, .. --------------------------------------- If havin any issues, please drop us a mail at: support@headupgames.com --------------------------------------- Tired of ads in the game? Get the ad-free version: https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=com.headupgames.sunnyhillrideadfree
release_text: Thanks for your feedback, Hillriders! Current reported Highscore in the Story mode is 778.567 (bazpreet singh), try to beat it and let us know: info@headupgames.com New in Update 1.2: - Performance increasement - Removed unused permission - Fixed minor bugs New in Update 1.1: - Optimized Ingame performance on low-end devices - Fixed minor bugs - Fixed wrong localisation during player-name input Please report all issues and ideas you have to info@headupgames.com

En esta aplicación te ofrecemos una guía completisima con los ejercicios que necesitas para poder adelgazar los abdominales. ¡Baja de peso rapidamente y desde tu casa!. description: Golden egg is all about egg catching which is getting fallen from the top, by the hens and in the down you will find the duck who will be catching the eggs. In the bottom you will find a duck who is catching the eggs and score is increasing by 10. There are five types of eggs if duck catches the white, blue, pink then the life line (green) increases. If bird catches golden egg then the score will increase by 100 and the life line (Green) will increase. Bird catches black egg then the life line will decrease and score will decrease by 20. If duck left the egg and egg touches the ground then life line of bird will decrease. Enjoy downloading by this beautiful game and you won't be bored by playing this. As all of the game lover's will love the graphics and the sound effects provided in it. Once the game gets over then automatically you can enter your name in the scoreboard and you can share in the FACEBOOK and can beat the competitors who are scoring good number of points. ********Please feel free to give us 5 star rating and reviews********

«Большой» — это единственный в Беларуси полноценный городской журнал. «Большой» гармонично сочетает в себе два издательских сегмента: lifestyle magazine & alternative city paper. Первая часть — колонки, интервью и большие материалы — тексты лучших журналистов и фотоистории о самых важных тенденциях, проблемах, процессах, изменениях в жизни города. Вторая часть — рубрики «география», «здоровье», «дети», «путешествия», «еда», «авто», «афиша» — посвящена практической информации для жизни в Минске. «Большой» — это также: Лучшие фотографы Беларуси Лучшие авторы Опытная команда «Большой» — это не гид по городу и не афиша. Это журнал о городе как живой субстанции, о людях и интересах этого города. "Large" - it is the only city in Belarus, full magazine. "Large" combines the two publishing segment: lifestyle magazine & alternative city paper. The first part - columns, interviews and great materials - texts of the best journalists and photo stories about the most important trends, issues, processes, changes in the life of the city. The second part - heading "geography", "health", "children", "travel", "food", "auto", "billboard" - is devoted to practical information for living in Minsk. "Large" - it's also: Best photographers Belarus Top Authors An experienced team   "Big" - is not a guide to the city and not the poster. This journal is about the city as a living substance, and the interests of the people of this city.

For all you aspiring rockstars and music producers out there, Mahalo is here to start you on your way to recording, editing and modifying your own songs with GarageBand. And even though we're convinced this app is the best way to master GarageBand on your desktop computer, we're constantly trying to improve our apps. So if you run into any issues while using this or any of our other apps, please let us know by emailing android@mahalo.com . This app will help you do the following: ✓ Learn to auto tune your voice ✓ Create a song without knowing how to play music ✓ Create a ringtone for free ✓ Use the built-in guitar, piano, synths and drums Through a series of 81 HD video lessons, audio expert Joey Biagas will show you how to setup and use external hardware, make and employ loops, and use Magic GarageBand and Learn to Play features on the desktop version of this Apple software. Joey is an audio engineer with a degree in Audio Recording from California State University Dominguez Hills. He picked up his first guitar at age 16 and has been working on musical projects ever since. He wrote, produced and recorded two solo EPs under his band Setting Sunrise and wants to help you do the same!

Fight again waves of invaders in a pure arcade space shooter. A refresh of the old school arcade space shooters, with invaders made of voxels. Control is ultra simple, just move the spaceship in space with one finger, and auto-fire on the invaders. Collect power-up to obtain new weapons and lives, make your way through asteroid fields and collect power-up that suddenly switches to a 3D space mode. "If you’re a fan of addictive gaming and/or retro titles on Android, be sure to check this awesome game out." -- androidtapp (4.7/5) Features include: - Full free version (with ads) - 24 levels containing more than 140 stages - dozens of different alien invaders including big bosses - 9 different weapons - various gameplay depending on the levels - 3 levels of difficulties - intuitive single-finger control - 3D OpenGL based voxel graphics - original vintage sound effects and electro soundtracks

description: The Haunt is a thrilling new point and tap adventure that is sure to make your toes curl and keep your Android device on edge! This stunningly beautiful and creepily crafted adventure takes you on an escape to a spooky and chilling estate full of curious plot twists and engaging and unique puzzles. Mini-games are scattered throughout the dark and mysterious farm and abandoned house. Ghosts and demons guard the many places of curiosity as you search for the clues and tools to unlock the mystery. As the townfolk's last hope, you are commissioned and charged with the task of ridding the house and farm from its dark and devilish ghouls and closing the ethereal portal hidden within. Many others have tried this but have never been heard from again. Can you put all the pieces together and restore peace to the homestead? Rich and colorful, the photo-real graphics make this one of the most beautiful adventures on the appstore. Challenging puzzles and well hidden clues and objects provide a great deal of depth to the game and makes this a standout in the genre. Start your adventure today and get your creep on in the Haunt. "Its dark, grimy graphics are positively creepy...enough to make you pause for just a second before you snap off the bedroom light." - Gamezebo Features: Stunning Graphics Tons of original puzzles and mini-games Hidden clues, tools and objects Excellent depth and length Engaging storyline Lots of spooks and ghosts Original music score Fun for all ages (spooky without the bloody gore) Visit us at www.furiousApps.com

description: ** WITHOUT ROOT ACCESS: VIEW OR BACKUP ** ** WITH ROOT ACCESS: SAVE CHANGES ** ** EMAIL ME FEEDBACK/QUESTIONS! ** This application makes modifying the build.prop file very simple and quick. Features: **Quickly backup and restore the build.prop file **Easily view and edit (root required) the current build.prop **View a few common build.prop tweaks **Easily share/export the build.prop Android uses the /system/build.prop file to store important device information. The type of information stored here ranges from how the device identifies itself with the Google Play Store to screen pixel density. Many tweaks are available by modify the system values stored in the build.prop in order to allow better or custom performance and layout. Please email me, tweet me or find me on IRC and provide feedback, suggestions and comments. I'm always interested in improving my applications! Thanks for your support!

description: Mit Sparkasse+ haben Sie Ihre Finanzen mobil im Griff – egal, bei wie vielen Sparkassen und Banken Sie wie viele Konten haben. SPARKASSE+ ALLE FINANZEN MOBIL IM GRIFF Mit Sparkasse+ können Sie immer und überall bequem Ihre aktuellen Kontostände einsehen, Überweisungen abschicken und Geldeingänge prüfen. Oder Sie lassen sich zum nächsten Geldautomaten oder zur Sparkassenfiliale lotsen. Nehmen Sie aus der App Kontakt mit Ihrer Sparkasse auf oder lassen Sie verloren gegangene Karten sperren. FUNKTIONEN • Multibankenfähig: Beliebig viele Konten bei nahezu allen Sparkassen und Banken • Diverse Kontoarten: Giro-, Festgeld-, Tagesgeld-, Spar-, Darlehens-, LBS-Bausparkonten, DEKA-Depots • Überweisungen und Daueraufträge ausführen • Im Zahlungsverkehr werden Empfängerdaten basierend auf Ihren bisherigen Umsätzen automatisch vervollständigt • SEPA: Automatisches Abholen von IBAN/BIC, sofern diese an Konten nicht hinterlegt sind • SEPA-Konverter: Wandelt Kontonummer und Bankleitzahl in IBAN und BIC • SEPA-Visitenkarte: Zeigen Sie Ihre SEPA-Kontodaten als QR-Code an und geben Sie diesen z.B. per E-Mail weiter • Anzeige von Depotbeständen und Kreditkartenumsätzen bei Sparkassen (keine DKB) • Geldautomaten und Filialen Ihrer Sparkasse finden • Kontowecker meldet Aktivitäten via Push-Nachricht (Voraussetzung: Google-Konto; Berechtigung: Prüfung, ob ein solches existiert) • Laden Sie Prepaid-Karten diverser Mobilfunkanbieter mit der Funktion „Handy-Laden“ via App auf • Börsennews, Kurse und Devisen (sofern von Ihrem Institut unterstützt) • Karten-Nutzung im Ausland freigeben/sperren • Umsätze grafisch auswerten • Service-Angebote Ihrer Sparkasse wie Mitteilungen, Öffnungszeiten, Terminvereinbarungen VORAUSSETZUNGEN • Prüfen Sie auf www.sparkasse.de/mobile, ob Ihr Institut unterstützt wird. Nicht unterstützt werden u.a. Commerzbank, TARGOBANK, BMW Bank, Volkswagen Bank, Santander Bank, Bank of Scotland • Sie benötigen ein für das Online-Banking (HBCI mit PIN/TAN bzw. FinTS mit PIN/TAN) freigeschaltetes Konto bei einer deutschen Sparkasse oder Bank • Für welche Kontoart Sie Sparkasse+ nutzen können, ist abhängig vom Angebot Ihres Instituts • Unterstützte TAN-Verfahren: iTAN, chipTAN manuell, chipTAN comfort (optisch), smartTAN+, sm@rtTAN optic, Einschrittverfahren, SecureTAN, pushTAN SICHERHEIT • Direkte Kommunikation mit Ihrem Kreditinstitut über geprüfte Schnittstellen • Sicherer Datentransfer nach den deutschen Vorgaben zum Online-Banking • Verschlüsselte Datenspeicherung • App-Zugriff-Schutz durch ein von Ihnen gewähltes Passwort • Autolock-Funktion zur Sperrung der App. Alle Finanzen sind bei Verlust des Geräts maximal gesichert • Der TÜV bestätigt diese höchsten Sicherheitsstandards HINWEISE 1) Es werden nur Bankverbindungen in Deutschland unterstützt 2) Welche Konten tatsächlich unterstützt werden, hängt vom jeweiligen Institut ab 3) Zeitverzögerungen von einem Tag sind bei der Kontoaktualisierung möglich 4) Die PIN ist nicht die persönliche Identifikationsnummer Ihrer EC-Karte. Es ist die PIN, die Sie beim Online-Banking auf der Webseite Ihrer Sparkasse bzw. Bank nutzen 5) Die Funktion „Abo-Laden“ unterstützt folgende Smartphones mit NFC-Chip nicht: Nexus 4, 5, 7, 10; Samsung Galaxy S4 6) Für Support-Anfragen verschicken Sie bitte Ihre Anfrage direkt aus der App, gerne inkl. Sendeprotokoll (Daten sind vor fremdem Zugriff geschützt) 7) Die Nutzung einzelner Funktionen kann Kosten bei Ihrem Kreditinstitut verursachen. Bitte erkundigen Sie sich, ob und in welcher Höhe diese ggf. an Sie weitergereicht werden 8) Aufgrund der enthaltenen Multibankenfähigkeit kann die App Sparkasse+, anders als die App Sparkasse, nicht kostenlos angeboten werden 9) Durch den Kauf und/oder die Verwendung dieser App erkennen Sie die Bedingungen des Endbenutzer-Lizenzvertrages der Star Finanz GmbH uneingeschränkt an. Sie finden diese unter: http://www.starmoney.de/?lizenz-android 10) Weitere Informationen finden Sie unter http://www.sparkasse.de/mobile With savings + you have your finances under control mobile - no matter how many financial institutions and banks as have many accounts. SPARKASSE + ALL FINANCE MOBILE GRIP With savings + you can always and everywhere easily view your current account balances, transfers send and check cash receipts. Or let yourself guide for the nearest ATM or savings bank branch. Take from the App touch with your savings on or let lost lock previous maps. FEATURES • multi-bank capability: Any number of accounts for virtually all financial institutions and banks • Various types of accounts: current accounts, fixed, call money, savings, loan, LBS building society accounts, DEKA depots • Perform transfers and standing orders • In the payment recipient information is automatically completed based on your previous transactions • SEPA: Automatic fetching of IBAN / BIC, unless they are stored on accounts • SEPA Converter: Converts bank account details in IBAN and BIC • SEPA card: Show your SEPA account data as QR Code and enter this example Email continues • Display of on deposit and credit card transactions at financial institutions (no DKB) • Find ATMs and branches of your savings • Account alarm detects activity via push message (Requires Google Account, authorization: Check if one exists) • Charge prepaid cards of various mobile operators using the "mobile shop" via App • Exchange news, rates, foreign exchange (provided by your institute supports) • Card usage abroad enable / disable • Evaluate sales graphically • Service offers your Sparkasse as communications, opening times, appointments CONDITIONS • Check on www.sparkasse.de/mobile whether your institution is supported. Are not supported, inter alia, Commerzbank, TARGOBANK, BMW Bank, Volkswagen Bank, Santander Bank, Bank of Scotland • You need a for online banking (HBCI PIN / TAN or FinTS with PIN / TAN) unlocked account with a German savings bank or bank • What type of account can be used Sparkasse + is, depending on the offer of your institute • Supported TAN procedure: iTAN, chipTAN manually chipTAN comfort (optical), SmartTAN +, sm @ rtTAN optic, one-step methods, SecureTAN, pushTAN SECURITY • Direct Communication with your bank on proven interfaces • Secure data transfer in accordance with German guidelines for online banking • Encrypted data storage • App-access protection by a password chosen by you • Autolock function to block the app. All finances are secured with a maximum loss of the device • The TÜV confirms the highest safety standards INSTRUCTIONS 1) are supported only bank in Germany 2) What accounts are actually supported depends on the institution 3) time delays of one day are possible in the account update 4) The PIN is the personal identification number of your debit card. It is the PIN that you use for online banking on the website of your Sparkasse Bank or 5) The "subscription Laden" does not support the following smartphones with NFC chip: Nexus 4, 5, 7, 10; Samsung Galaxy S4 6) For support requests please send your request directly from the app, like incl. Please inquire about whether and to what extent these if necessary passed on to you 8) Due to the contained Multibank capability allows the app Sparkasse +, unlike the App Sparkasse, not offered for free 9) By buying and / or using this app you accept the terms of the End User License Agreement, the Star Finanz GmbH unconditionally. description: TimeQuad is something more than just a watch or a stopwatch. TimeQuad is a double stopwatch, but also a double timer to count events, as well it is a timer to program certain timings and the most useful support while sport training. Ideal for cooking, running and everything where time is important! Application has 4 modules: 1. Double stopper with the ability to measure and record the results of split times in phone's memory. This mode will allow, for example measuring lap times of playing field circled by twoathletes. 2. Dual counter for counting events in specified time intervals. It can be used to check how many cars and how many trucks have traveled the road in 10 minutes and to convert this amount per hour or day. It can be used to count beats per 8 seconds and convert volume per minute. The results can also be saved in phone's memory. 3. Timer which allows to program certain time, for example: soft-boiled eggs cooking or bakingapple pie. Additional function of notebook enables you to save the full recipe for the mentioned apple pie mentioned, as an example. 4. Training Module allows you to program and play individually any number of training plans.Plans can be created, modified and deleted. A training plan consists of any number of cycles, which in turn consist of: portion of the time needed to prepare for the exercise and a certain amount of repetitions of successive exercise phases and rest. Each cycle may apply to otherexercise, have a different number of repetitions, different exercises and break periods. The last break in the cycle is removed froma training plan. The plan is linked to a text note.

Приложение сети кинотеатров “Монитор”, выпущенное совместно с компанией “Киноход”, позволяет купить билеты во все кинотеатры сети на территории РФ с мобильного телефона: можно сделать это заранее, где бы вы ни находились – за столиком в кафе или на прогулке в парке! Просто выберите фильм, кинотеатр, сеанс и места в зале. Оплатить можно как пластиковой картой, так и со счета мобильного телефона. Без всяких хлопот вы всегда получаете билеты на лучшие места! Appendix cinema network "Monitor", released jointly with the company "Kinohod" allows you to buy tickets to all cinemas in the RF network from the mobile phone, you can do it in advance, no matter where you are - in a café or a walk in the park! Simply select the movie theater, and a place in the session hall. You can pay by card as well as a mobile phone account. Without any trouble you can always get tickets for the best seats!
release_text: — Новый интерфейс в стиле Андроид — Новый раздел с ожидаемыми премьерами ("Скоро в кино") — Улучшена скорость работы и стабильность

description: Fuel monitor, fuel economy calculator and car costs tracker With Car Costs Complete you are able to track all your car expenses easily: fuel costs, insurance, leasing, repairs and all thinkable custom cost types and even revenues. Another main function is to record and calculate the fuel consumption. You can log fuel stops, all types of expenses, repairs and common notes, with the possibility to link photos with the entries. Car Costs Complete is thus a comprehensive car logbook, fuel consumption calculator, cost tracker and car manager. HIGHLIGHTS: =========== ✔ Android 4 design ✔ Optimzed for tablests ✔ Unique cost overview: assign custom cost types to 9 summarizing groups ✔ Easy and flexible recording of refilling, expenses, revenues, repairs and notes ✔ Supports multiple cars with gas (petrol/benzine), diesel or bi-fuel (LPG+gas) engines ✔ DROPBOX SUPPORT (available as addon): data synchronization of multiple Android devices or easy online-backup ✔ You can add notes and PHOTOS to all your records (invoices, spare parts, damages, etc.; take photos directly out of the app or add pictures from gallery) ✔ Find your entries via text search ✔ Payment schedules for periodic expenses (automated entries) ✔ Currency converter (available as addon): 34 currencies, daily updated rates ✔ Extensive, configurable statistics for fuel economy, distance, fuel data and expenses ✔ Monthly, yearly and total amounts of cost types and cost groups, separated for running and total costs ✔ 10 interactive fuel consumption- and cost charts with touch-sensitive data points ✔ Multiple units: miles, kilometers; gallons (US or UK), litres; mpg, km/l, l/100km ✔ Selectable date and decimal number formats ✔ Reminders (time and/or distance intervals) ✔ Light and dark theme ✔ Backup, export and import ✔ Import from/export to iPhone version ✔ Print statistics via GoogleCloudPrint (Android 4.4+) You may want to test the free DEMO before you buy the full version (all data will be transferred from the demo to the full version). DETAILS: ======== Fuel stops/ fuel log: ---------------------- ✔ Partial refueling is supported ✔ Logging of fuel station ✔ Logging of motorway/city/road percentage Expense log: -------------------- ✔ 9 cost groups: fuel, credit/leasing, taxes/charges, assurances, repair/maintenance, cleaning/caring, accessories/tuning, other and even revenues ✔ Payment schedules: yearly, quarterly, monthly or weekly, day/weekday and amount of automated entries are selectable; retrospective entries possible Statistics: ----------- ✔ Fuel economy with tendency, fuel costs separated by fuel sort ✔ Total, monthly and yearly distance with road type percentage ✔ Fuel data: minima, maxima and average of fuel economy, estimated range etc. ✔ Number of fuel stops and average fuel price for each fuel station ✔ Cost types and expense groups: costs per distance unit, costs per month or per and total costs for each item; running and total costs separated Charts: ------- ✔ Charts: fuel economy, estimated range, total monthly costs (all expenses), monthly fuel costs, cost development (costs per usage time), cost structure (expense groups %), odometer reading, fuel price, costs per mile (kilometer), monthly distance traveled ✔ Selectable scaling, option to show zero point ✔ Tap on data points to see numeric values Backup, export and import: -------------------------- ✔ Automated and manual backup to SDCard ✔ Export of fuel logs and payments to SDCard in CSV format ✔ Option to send backup files and exported data per email attachment
release_text: * Print statistics via GoogleCloudPrint (Android 4.4+) * Improved the option "Use last odometer reading" at refueling recording: milage remains unchanged at changing the date, if earlier adjusted manually * Bug fixes

description: Hyperdevbox is proud to introduce "ExZeus2 - free to play "edition featuring the full game, no ads, no items but the old school Arcade Instant Continue token ! ExZeus2, sequel of the acclaimed fast paced 3D Shooting Game "ExZeus", does support external USB controller and has been designed for HD 720P display so.. better enjoyed on BIG screen TV ^^. Are you ready to beat the game ? STORY: 2217 CE. Over one century has passed since the battle against the alien war machines. Earth has returned to peace and the name of Diadora is now nothing more than a dim memory. Not many remember the ExZeus project and the robots who saved the planet from darkness. But a new menace from above was about to break the peace. There was only one way to counter this menace and restore hope: reopen the "ExZeus" project. The 3 former metal warriors who saved our planet were thus fused to give birth to a new powerful model of robot, Minos. ■Features : ・ Amazing 3D graphics and Sound. ・ Impressive super attacks. ・ New elements of gameplay: shoot enemies in the air or fight them on the ground in close combat sequences. ・ Earn experience points based on your skills. ・ Upgrade and customize your own robot. ・ Gyro, Virtual Pad and External USB Controller . ・ Online ranking. ・ Realtime Worldwide Leaderboard. ** IMPORTANT NOTICE PLEASE READ ** - You need a SDCARD with at least 200MB of free space. - You may need WIFI for reaching our servers. - Visit our website and forum at http://www.hyperdevbox.com for more FAQ and information.
release_text: - Improve the use of the BACK key - Fix compatibility issues with Nexus 10

description: ** 신규유저 광속레벨업 지원 이벤트 ** 신규 유저 & 저렙 유저를 위한 대박 지원 이벤트 1! 영웅, 체력, 다이아, 골드, 루비 등 90레벨이 될 때까지 130만원 상당의 아이템 혜택이 팍팍!! 신규 유저 & 저렙 유저를 위한 대박 지원 이벤트 2! 120레벨이 될 때까지!! 훈련소 경험치 10배! 해적소탕 경험치도 10배!! 바로 지금! 120레벨까지 광속으로 레벨업 하세요~! ** 주요 업데이트 ** * 용옥 15레벨, 문장 50레벨 확장 * 8성~10성 도금 스크롤 출시 * 기타 - 행운의 집 상품 리뉴얼 - 정령 일괄소환 레벨 하향(LV50), 90레벨 유저의 정령 일괄소환 시 소환횟수 40회로 상향 - 4성 신수 티아레 추가 * 월 정액 상품 적용 * 펫 시스템 업데이트 - 신규 SSS펫 3종 등장! - 펫을 더욱 강하게! 각성 시스템 추가! * 유적 약탈전 - 손에 땀을쥐게하는 지상, 천계 유적 약탈전! - 약탈당한 길드원의 유적을 보호하라! - 골드, 명성 등 다양한 보상 제공. * 신규맵 천계 등장 - 새로운 지역 천계를 탐험해보세요. - 천계의 탑! 강력한 적과의 전투! - 더더욱 강하게! 신수, 신물 시스템 * 노스트레스 RPG! - 재료 수집 시 더 빠른전투 지원! - 시련의 동굴 1개층을 한번에 클리어! 쾌속돌파 기능 지원! ※ 유료 콘텐츠(아이템) 구매 시 별도의 요금이 부과됩니다. ● 청약 철회 및 구매 대금의 환불 등 - 이용자가 구매한 유료콘텐츠의 경우에는 계약 체결일 또는 유료콘텐츠 이용가능일로부터 7일 이내에 별도의 수수료 없이 청약철회(구매취소)를 할 수 있습니다. 단, 선물 및 이벤트 등 회사나 제3자로부터 무상으로 제공받은 유료콘텐츠, 청약철회 요청 당시 이미 사용하였거나 사용한 것으로 간주되는 유료콘텐츠 등 이에 준하는 특성을 가진 일부 유료콘텐츠에 대하여는 관련 법령에 따라 청약철회(구매취소)가 제한될 수 있습니다. ● 청약 철회에 따른 효과 - 회사는 이용자로부터 재화 등을 반환 받은 경우 3영업일 이내에 대금을 환급합니다 단, 수납확인이 필요한 결제수단의 경우에는 수납확인일로부터 3영업일 이내에 이를 환급하도록 합니다. 이 경우 회사가 환급을 지연한 때에는 그 지연기간에 대하여 관련 법령에서 정한 이율을 곱하여 산정한 지연이자를 지급합니다. ● 미성년자 결제에 대한 조항 - 애플리케이션에서 판매되는 유료콘텐츠를 미성년자가 법정대리인의 동의 없이 결제한 경우, 미성년자 또는 법정대리인은 결제를 취소할 수 있습니다. 단, 미성년자의 유료콘텐츠 결제가 법정대리인으로부터 처분을 허락 받은 재산의 범위 내인 경우 또는 미성년자가 사술 등을 사용하여 성년자로 믿게 한 때에는 취소가 제한됩니다. 유료콘텐츠 구매자가 미성년자인지 여부는 결제가 진행된 단말기 또는 신용카드 등 결제수단의 명의자를 기준으로 판단됩니다. 미성년자 결제취소를 요청하시는 경우 회사의 필요에 따라 미성년자 및 법정대리인을 증명할 수 있는 서류를 제출하여야 합니다. ** 함께하는 재미를 전달하는 모바일 게임 브랜드 위미(weme)와 함께 하세요! ** ** FAQ로 찾아보고, 서로서로 묻고 답하고, 1:1문의로 물어보고! description: Four Pics and one word for you to find.. Simple and addicting game. Tap the images to get help and try to guess answer word. app_name: Đọc báo 247 - Tin tức tổng hợp
description: Đọc báo 247 là một ứng dụng xem tin tức tổng hợp thông tin tiếng Việt hoàn toàn được điều khiển tự động bởi máy tính. Mỗi ngày gần 6500 tin tức từ gần 200 nguồn chính thức của các báo điện tử và trang tin điện tử Việt Nam được Đọc báo 247 tự động tổng hợp, phân loại, phát hiện các bài đăng lại, nhóm các bài viết liên quan và hiển thị theo sở thích đọc tin của từng độc giả. Cách đọc tin trực tuyến của mọi người hiện nay thường là thụ động. Chúng ta vào một (hoặc nhiều) nguồn tin ưa thích, tìm những chuyên mục ưa thích và đọc theo kiểu "có gì đọc nấy". Đọc báo 247 ra đời để làm thay đổi phần nào thói quen đó, giúp cho độc giả Việt Nam có thể chủ động nhiều hơn với tin tức trực tuyến, món ăn tinh thần mỗi ngày. Các ưu điểm nổi bật: - Đọc báo với tốc độ nhanh nhất, tối ưu cho kết nối 3G và Wifi. - Đọc báo Offline (khi không có kết nối) - Tin nóng được tổng hợp và chọn lọc thông minh, cập nhật liên tục suốt 24h tại tất cả các báo điện tử tại VN. - Dễ dàng tùy biến giao diện, thêm các đầu báo yêu thích vào trang chủ - Xem thời tiết và tin tức theo địa phương - Xem tử vi, phong thủy hằng ngày - Xem lịch ca nhạc, lịch phòng trà. - Xem lịch và kết quả worldcup - world cup 2014. - Xem ảnh đẹp (Depvl, Haivl, ảnh thiên nhiên, ảnh động vật, depvd...) - Cập nhật ngay giá dầu, giá vàng, giá cà phê ... và các thông tin thị trường khác... - Bảng giá chứng khoán đang giao dịch - KQXS, Kết quả xổ số cập nhật hằng ngày - Tỷ giá VCB cập nhật hằng ngày. - Chỉ số tài chính: giá vàng thế giới, giá vàng Việt Nam, oil price, gold price, US Dollar Index, Dow Jones, Nasdaq, S&P 500, Hang Seng,... - Cập nhật lịch chiếu phim tại các Rạp tại Việt Nam. - Cập nhật thông tin thời tiết... - Các bảng xếp hạng bóng đá (Premier League, LA Liga, Bundes Liga, Ligue 1, Việt Nam super League...). - Lịch thi đấu và kết quả các giải bóng đá (V League, UEFA, UEFA Europa, FA Cup, Premier League, LA Liga, Bundes Liga, Ligue 1, Việt Nam super League...). - Dễ dàng chia sẻ tin tức lên các mạng xã hội hàng đầu như Facebook, Zing Me.. Đọc báo 247 (Docbao247, docbao, baomoi, docbao247.net) đã ra mắt các phiên bản hỗ trợ đọc báo trên máy tính bảng Android với giao diện cực đẹp, hỗ trợ cả chế độ xoay ngang và cầm dọc, tương thích với mọi máy tính bảng 7" và 10". Read 247 is an application report news Synthetic Vietnamese information entirely automatically controlled by computers. Every day nearly 6,500 news sources from almost 200 official electronic newspapers and websites reported 247 Reading Vietnam is automatically synthesized, categorized, discovered the post, the group of related articles and display reading preferences of individual readers. How to read news online people today are usually passive. We're in one (or more) favorite sources, find and read your favorite categories according to the type of "Nothing to read this." Read the press launch for 247 partial change habits that help readers Vietnam can more proactively with online news, daily spiritual food. The advantages: - Read the report with the fastest speed, optimized for 3G and WiFi connectivity. - Read the report offline (when not connected) - Hot News synthesized and intelligent selection, constantly updated 24 hours in all electronic media in VN. - Easily customizable interface, more detectors favorite homepage - Watch the weather and follow local news - View horoscope, daily feng shui - Watch the music calendar, calendar tea room. - Schedule and results worldcup - 2014 World Cup. - View beautiful images (Depvl, Haivl, nature, animal images, depvd ...) - Update now the price of oil, gold, coffee ... and other market information ... - The stock price is trading - KQXS, lottery results updated daily - Rate VCB updated daily. - Financial ratios: the world gold price, gold prices in Vietnam, oil price, gold price, U.S. Dollar Index, Dow Jones, Nasdaq, S & P 500, Hang Seng, ... - Updated showtimes at theaters in Vietnam. - Updated weather information ... - The ranking football (Premier League, La Liga, Bundes Liga, Ligue 1, Vietnam Super League ...). - Schedule and results for football league (V League, UEFA, UEFA Europa, FA Cup, Premier League, La Liga, Bundes Liga, Ligue 1, Vietnam Super League ...). - Easily share information on leading social networking sites like Facebook, Zing Me .. Newspaper Reading 247 (Docbao247, docbao, Baomoi, docbao247.net) has launched new version supports read newspapers on Android tablets with very nice interface, supports both horizontal and hold mode vertical rotation, compatible with all tablet PC 7 "and 10".
release_text: - Các bảng xếp hạng bóng đá (Premier League, LA Liga, Bundes Liga, Ligue 1, Việt Nam super League...). - Lịch thi đấu và kết quả các giải bóng đá (V League, UEFA, UEFA Europa, FA Cup, Premier League, LA Liga, Bundes Liga, Ligue 1, Việt Nam super League...). - Dễ dàng chia sẻ tin tức lên các mạng xã hội hàng đầu như Facebook, Zing Me..

description: Psychoban brings you a deeper concept in puzzle gaming, drawing from proven classics such as Sokoban to create an unique and immersive experience! - Brain-scrambling puzzles: Psychoban takes you through an entirely new dimension of puzzle-adventure experience, as you must make your way through actual 3D challenges. A non-stop concatenation of challenges, hilarious situations and gorgeous visuals will squeeze you out of any remnants of sanity. - Insanely seamless interface: No virtual key-pads! An unique character control system, absolutely natural to the Android interface, allows for an easy and hands-on playability. You tell Mental Dude what you want him to do, and he does it! - Deranged settings and environments: Make your way through five of the world´s creepiest mental asylums, and become a part of their gruesome, gore-stained history. - Mad quantities of levels Sixty levels of concentrated challenge-packed puzzles will keep you hooked-in to the last second! - Alienating, comedy-driven story Join the adventure of Mental Dude, his quest for freedom, survival… and a grip to reality. - Leaderboards and achievements supported via OpenFeint. - Awesome unlockeables! - Lunacy guaranteed! NOTE: The first 6 puzzles can be played for free. The remainder of the rooms can be purchased from the game. NOTE2: This game requires Android 2.2 or above. The game will not install on previous versions of Android. Supported resolutions: 480 x 320 800 x 480 854 x 480 1024 x 600 Having trouble running the game? Fear not! Before writing a negative review, drop us a mail to support-android@dedalord.com specifying which device and Android version you use and a detailed description of the problem. We will work hard to cover as many devices as possible. Cheers! Follow us on Twitter! (psychoban) Find us on Facebook! (psychoban)

SomaFM's official player for Android, giving you direct access to 20 year-round (plus seasonal holiday) channels of listener-supported, commercial-free, underground/alternative radio. *** By buying this app, you help support SomaFM's commercial-free broadcasts. *** You can view and pick stations by Popularity, Genre or just see your favorites; See the title and artist of the currently playing and last 10 songs played. You can also bookmark favorite songs for purchase on Amazon or emailing to your friends. You can share what you're listening to on Twitter, via email or text message. There's also a section for SomaFM news and happenings. If you're on 3G or WiFi, you have access to our high quality 64k AAC-HE streams which sound amazing and much better than 128k MP3. And our low bandwidth 32k aacPlus streams work on slower cell networks, and still sound as good as 128k MP3 streams in most cases.
release_text: Version 2.2.7 contains Bluetooth control enhancements (Next/Prev buttons change between favorite channels), and general stability improvements. Version 2.2.3 adds support for Qualcomm® AllPlay™ enabled wireless speakers; adds a fix that would cause the app to still use data while playing was stopped. Minor bug fixes and enhancements. Version 2.2.2 fixed streaming issues with Kitkat and certain phones, and other minor bug fixes.

description: What luck am I born with? Will I have wealth luck? What characteristic those people have? What kind of life will I live? Physiognomy tells you the answer for these questions. Style Physiognomy reinterpreted traditional physiognomy from modern perspective for better application of physiognomy knowledge. It also tells you how to change physiognomy you are born with into a better looking one. Let’s discover the secret of our face! Menu 1. Read Physiognomy: Choose an appearance using touch and drag. You can read your physiognomy. 2. Physiognomy stories: You can learn more about physiognomy and interesting physiognomy stories. 3. Inventory: You can save physiognomy you’ve read. 4. App recommendation: You can see apps recommended by Voolean. Instruction and features for physiognomy 1. Choose your gender, write your name, then start. 2. Choose 6 parts of face - eyebrows, eyes, nose, mouth, ears and face shape using drag and touch, then touch “see result” 3. You can see combined image, physiognomy score, and evaluation of each part. 4. If you save the evaluation, you can reread it in the inventory. 5. By saving completed illustration of physiognomy, the image can be used as your profile picture.

The Smurfs' village is in chaos, and it's up to Smurfette to solve the mystery before Gargamel finds their village. Complete puzzles by mixing and matching Smurfy objects and save the Smurfs. ------------------------ What's New • 30 new Smurftastic levels (131 – 160) • 5 new outfits for Smurfette • Bug fixes and lots of performance improvements ------------------------ Features: - Help Smurfette save the village! - Swap puzzle pieces to match three or more Smurfy objects at a time to clear pieces and complete levels - Line up four or more Smurfy objects in a row to unlock powerups - Make your way through 160 Smurf-tacular levels - Use powerful Smurfy boosters featuring your favorite characters to breeze through levels - Sync with Facebook to track your progress against your friends ------------------------ Follow us on Twitter: www.twitter.com/BeelineGames Follow us on Facebook: www.facebook.com/BeelineGames Follow us on Youtube: www.youtube.com/BeelineGames ------------------------ PLEASE NOTE: Smurfette's Magic Match is free to play, but charges real money for additional in-app content. You may lock out the ability to purchase in-app content by adjusting your device’s settings.

description: German - one of the world and international languages. German phrasebook will help tourists in any. This German learning program will be useful for beginners. English-German phrase book contains a lot of German tourists phrases of different subjects. You can learn the basics of the German language. German pronunciation of phrases written in English. Phrases are sorted by category (life situations), which makes it easy to navigate the tourist trips. Learn basic German phrases (necessary for the trip). Take the phrasebook with you and be confident in any situation. Phrasebook is indispensable if you are planning a trip to Germany. Ideal for tourists, businessmen and all those who interested in learning German language! If you are just starting to learn German, the program will help you become familiar with the language, learn some new German words and phrases, and amaze your friends. It is easy to travel, to make reservations at restaurants and cafes to register at hotels, you will be able to meet new people, ask for help if necessary, to resolve problems with the police, successfully make a purchase, and much, much more.

description: Toy Defense 2 is the long-awaited sequel to the multi-million-download tower defense hit Toy Defense! Set in World War 2, this action/strategy game is packed with more td levels, amazing fighting features, a big selection of shooting units for each world, and more intense action than ever. Take part in various missions in a range of theaters of war, from the picturesque beaches and forests of Normandy to the deserts of northern Africa. The most epic battles of WW2 await you! Recruit, upgrade, and manage your troops to create your own powerful army! Put towers into action and defend your base, fight off invading enemies, and develop your own winning strategy! GAME FEATURES: - Classic tower defense gameplay with excellent level design and stunning artwork - Over 200 missions on a variety of World War II maps - Tournament Mode: login with Facebook and compete with your friends - Compete with other commanders in an exciting new game mode – PvP! - Now your Facebook friends can help you in battle and become heroes under your command - Masterful reconstruction of the most decisive battles of WW2 – the Battle of Iwo Jima, Operation Crusader, the Battle of Stalingrad, and Operation Overlord - A set of unique combat units for each world inspired by real weapons and vehicles used in WW2 - Unlockable upgrade tree with multiple improvements for each fighting unit - New amazing power-ups to aid you in battle - Unlimited potential for collecting hero units - A brand new in-game notification center to keep you up to date with special offers, game events, upcoming updates, and much more - No ads! With Toy Defense’s unique spin on military strategy having become a proven success among gamers, the sequel Toy Defense 2 is sure to be a great find for anyone who enjoys tower defense, action, and strategy games. Follow us for the updates! http://www.facebook.com/ToyDefense http://www.Melesta-Games.com http://www.twitter.com/MelestaGames Be sure to check out our other games! ---------------------------------------------- Still undecided? You can always try the free version before buying the full game. ----------------------------------------------
release_text: - An absolutely new and exciting mode – PvP has been added to the game! Compete with other players all over the planet! Become the best commander in your country and in the whole world! - Take advantage of the improved performance and stable gameplay!

description: High Definition 360 Panoramic Camera with a 3d Viewer in a Snap? - take full 360 panoramas instantly and don't miss any beauty around you, - grab the smallest details in night or day with the 4K photo resolution, you will be able to produce up to 40MP panoramic photos, - teleport back to your favorite location and view it using our incredible 3d viewer, share your panorama with friends on Facebook and Twitter for the same 3d viewing experience, - live a mind-blowing VR experience by enabling Google Cardboard mode, - be the first to take a gorgeous panoramic selfie and surprise your friends and loved ones, - discover more than 1.3 Million panoramas shared from all over the world, - never worry about your panorama by using our free and safe online storage, - create a breath-taking panorama with advanced camera controls such as Flash modes and 3 different Exposure settings, - follow other panorama lovers and be notified when they upload new pictures, - edit your panorama description, tags, geolocation and privacy settings, - get embed codes to insert an interactive panorama in your blog. And with in-app purchases: - HD mode brings 4 times more pixels up to 40MP for a full 360 panorama, - external SD Card storage support, - HDR mode is available on high-end devices such as S5, - save individual shots - option to remove the ads. Get all these options at once and save money by getting DMD Panorama Pro version. We listen and help (support@DerManDar.com). We bet you will be impressed, try us! "The easiest-to-use panoramic picture app." - The Wall-Street Journal. "It’s really hard to take a bad panorama." - Macworld. "A 360-degree shot in about 20 seconds." - Business Insider. "I was definitely impressed..." - Techcrunch. ★★★★★"Absolutely fantastic app! I swear there are magical unicorns or elves inside my phone stitching these photos together. It's the only way I can explain it." Frankly speaking, we don't employ magical creatures, but our image processing algorithms analyze data from several components including gyro, compass and accelerometer sensors. Please note: - our app only shoots cylindrical panoramas, - we only stitch the pictures you take with the app, - your panoramas are *not* automatically uploaded unless you explicitly request it. DerManDar means all-around in Lebanese slang. We noticed too many people had a problem spelling it, so we shortened it to DMD. Have you checked our new app: DMD Topic? Create an unforgettable story out of a single picture!
release_text: V4.2.1: we have added a Widget that shows trending panoramas and corrected a significant bug that was generating corrupted images during the export process. V4.2: you can now upvote panoramas and users, follow users, get notifications, gyro mode in viewer, and last but not least VR *Google Cardboard* compatibility (enable it from the app settings). V4.1: new layout that helps interacting with our Social Panoramic Network.

description: Muzei HD Landscapes is an extension for the Muzei live-wallpaper app. Key features: - New beautiful full HD landscape wallpapers every day - Customizable resolution - WiFi-only download mode - Customizable update interval - Switch to next picture manually How to use: - Install Muzei (http://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=net.nurik.roman.muzei) - Open Muzei app - Select "HD Landscape" as your source - Done Nominated as "App of the day" on AndroidGuys.com: http://goo.gl/Z1drLu Hotfix : If you have troubles and the picture does not update, please try to delete app data for this app (settings > apps) and try again. Check my twitter for more information: http://twitter.com/Tobias_Glaeser Note: Settings apply AFTER the next image is loaded. To instantly apply the new rotation-interval, change it in the settings and then invoke a manual image load with the "double arrow icon". Images are downloaded from here: http://wallpaperswide.com/ It can take a while to download the image, due to the high resolution. I do not own any copyright of the provided content. Any copyright is owned by the author of the respective image/content. I have a written permission of the owners of the website that allows me to use their content. Contains ads in settings.
release_text: v1.0.9 Hotfix - fixed a critical bug that caused the downloads to stop v1.0.8 - added Pro version upgrade (http://goo.gl/2Q9Cdp) - minor bugfix - added ads in the settings v1.0.7 - added smarter caching algorithm (requires new permissions) - fixed a bug in the settings - added more detailled settings descriptions - adjusted API level

release_text: "Multiplayer mode" has been implemented! rules: -This is 2on2 battle. When the number of human-players is less than 4, COM-players are placed to make up for the shortage. -Each teams have 2 lives at start. You can reduce the enemy team's life by defeating enemy player: Defeating a human-player reduces 1 life. Defeating a COM-player reduces 0.5 life. When the enemy team's life becomes 0, you win the game! -In this mode, every player-character's upgrade condition is treated as equal.

description: iNotes is an easy notes app for synchronizing your notes of Android to Notes app on Mac/iOS(iphone, ipad) . It is currently applicable to iCloud, Gmail,Yahoo, Aol,163 only. To sync with your email, you need to add your Email account first on the settings, then your notes will be synchronized to your email under the label 'Notes'. Important Instructions: 1. If you sign in iNotes other than iCloud, you must enable your Notes on iOS (Settings>iCloud>Notes), otherwise, the notes will be not synchronized. 2. The password is the same as your email password; 3. If you are not allowed to sign in, it is probably your email account is not applicable to iNotes. Only iCloud, Gmail, Yahoo, Aol, 163 are allowed. 4. If you are using an email account dominated by google, you can click ' Google Apps' to authorize. description: **Carma is under active development, a low market rating doesn't help! Instead use the in-app send feedback button or press the send email button below Keep your eyes on the road, not on your phone with Carma In-Car Voice-Controlled Assistant, the only fully voice-controlled in-car assistant for Android! AT THE TIP OF YOUR FINGERS Hate fumbling for your phone while you drive? Carma is always ready to go. Simply speak it's name, wave your hand, tap the screen, or press the button on your Bluetooth enabled car or headset. All while keeping your eyes on the road. KEEP YOUR PHONE IN YOUR POCKET With auto-activation on bluetooth, you don't even need to take your phone out of your pocket to start up Carma. That means there is no need to remember to start or stop Carma! NO MOUNT, NO SWEAT Unlike other in-car apps, Carma requires no visual or touch input to operate, so a mount is optional. All that is required for Carma to operate properly is a Bluetooth-enabled car or headset! CARMA, KILL ALL HUMANS... Carma has an extensive command list that keeps on growing. Carma can give you directions, play music, call, text, and so much more! And with Tasker integration, you can add any command you like, even killing all humans... if that's what you're into. STAY IN TOUCH Carma will announce calls and read out texts so that you can stay in touch on the road. Running late for a meeting? Let others know where you are by automatically sending your ETA. MODERN Carma uses the latest technologies for Android and offline speech recognition (for Jelly Bean) to ensure that you have the best experience possible. Carma doesn't just listen for commands, it does it's best to figure out if a command sounds like what you said and learns as you use it. 100% FREE We saved the best for last. Carma has no ads, no in-app purchases, and is free to download. So why are you still reading this? Try Carma for safe driving. Learn more at our website: Carma.RSenApps.com By downloading Carma, you agree that Carma, RSenApps, and the developers are in no way liable for any damage or harm caused by, directly or indirectly, the use of this app.

description: Mit der kostenlosen Android Wetter App von wetter.tv bieten wir täglich ein punktgenaue Wettervorhersage , sowie ein Regenradar für jeden Ort in ganz Deutschland und aktuelle Wetterdaten für die ganze Welt . description: Begin your new Turtle Fun Ski career! Measure your skiing skills against other players from all over the world! Turtle Fun Ski is an awesomely fun skiing game with fantastic Internet playing capabilities and a consecutive ranking competition. Features: * Invite friends to join the race * Play against friends or random players on the Internet * In the multi-player mode, your opponents will race on the same random track as you. When both players have finished playing, the one who has gone the furthest wins the round * Win three rounds to win the match * Win matches to increase your total score and climb in the consecutive Internet world ranking competition * Use Internet world rankings to challenge rivals directly Gameplay: * Your turtle will automatically go all the way to full throttle * Touch the screen to rotate left and right * Keep your turtle on the track * Master obstacles and jumps * Try to land without losing speed If you like the game, please rate it – this will support further development! Working can be tedious and boring sometimes, and when you're bored you may want something fun to do. With this dentist slacking game you can have fun while trying to keep it secret without anyone catching you out. Here you can find hidden candies, find hidden dentures, eat cupcakes, clean your teeth, add bling to your teeth, do a puzzle, match cards, tidy your hair, create a text message, as well as clip your fingernails, put teeth back into a mouth, reconstruct tools, pull teeth out, find a candy under cups, and add perfume! With so much slacking fun to be had, why not try your skills at slacking off at the dentist surgery without getting caught today! Features Pick out all the candies from the toothbrushes. Eat all the cupcakes until they are gone. Match the circles and hearts on the teeth to add some bling. Put the tooth puzzle back together so it is whole again. Brush and tidy your hair to make you look more presentable. Match the letters with the texts to create a message. Clip your finger nails so they are short and neat. Put the tools back together ready for any dental surgery. Find the candy under the cups 3 times. Many more funny tricks await you to play!
