description: Keepass2Android is an open source password manager application for Android. It reads and writes .kdbx-files, the database format used by the popular KeePass 2.x Password Safe for Windows and other desktop operating systems. The user interface is based on Keepassdroid (by Brian Pellin), ported from Java to Mono for Android. The backend uses the original KeePass libraries to handle file access to ensure file format compatibility. Main features of the App are * read/write support for .kdbx (KeePass 2.x) files * integrates with nearly every Android browser (see below) * QuickUnlock: Unlock your database once with your full password, re-open it by typing just a few characters (see below) * Access files from the cloud or the web (Dropbox, Google Drive, SkyDrive, FTP, WebDAV). You can use "Keepass2Android Offline" if you don't need this feature. * Integrated Soft-Keyboard: Switch to this keyboard for entering user credentials. This shields you from clipboard based password sniffers (see below) * support for editing entries including additional string fields, file attachments, tags etc. * search dialog with all search options from KeePass 2.x. Required privileges: * Access SD Card * Access Internet (required for accessing files via FTP/WebDav). Install "Keepass2Android Offline" if you don't want to grant this privilege. * Vibrate Bug reports and suggestions: http://keepass2android.codeplex.com/ == Browser integration == If you need to lookup a password for a webpage, go to Menu/Share... and select Keepass2Android. This will * bring up a screen to load/unlock a database if no database is loaded and unlocked * go to the Search Results screen displaying all entries for the currently visited URL - or - * directly offer the Copy Username/Password notifications if exactly one entry matches the currently visited URL == QuickUnlock == You should protect your password database with a strong (i.e. random and LONG) password including upper and lower case as well as numbers and special characters. Typing such a password on a mobile phone every time you unlock your database is time-consuming and error-prone. The KP2A solution is QuickUnlock: * Use a strong password for your database * Load your database and type the strong password once. Enable QuickUnlock. * The application is locked after the time specified in the settings * If you want to re-open your database, you can type just a few characters (by default, the last 3 characters of your password) to unlock quickly and easily! * If the wrong QuickUnlock key is entered, the database is locked and the full password is required to re-open. Is this safe? First: it allows you to use a really strong password, this increases safety in case someone gets your database file. Second: If you loose your phone and someone tries to open the password database, the attacker has exactly one chance to make use of QuickUnlock. When using 3 characters and assuming 70 characters in the set of possible characters, the attacker has a 0.0003% chance of opening the file. If this sounds still too much for you, choose 4 or more characters in the settings. QuickUnlock requires an icon in the notification area. This is because Android would kill Keepass2Android too often without this icon. It does not require battery power. == Keepass2Android Keyboard == A German research team has demonstrated that clipboard-based access of credentials as used by most Android password managers is not safe: Every app on your phone can register for changes of the clipboard and thus be notified when you copy your passwords from the password manager to your clipboard. In order to protect against this kind of attack, you should use the Keepass2Android keyboard: When you select an entry, a notification will appear in the notification bar. This notification lets you switch to the KP2A keyboard. ON this keyboard, click the KP2A symbol to "type" your credentials. Click the keyboard key to switch back to your favorite keyboard.
release_text: 0.9.7b: bug fixes and translation updates 0.9.7: write support for Keepass 1 (kdb) databases (beta!) better switching back to previous keyboard (also works on non-rooted devices) support for KeeChallenge with variable length challenges prevent taking screenshots from QuickUnlock and password screens reverse sort order for Sort by Modification Date (now descending) bug fixes

FEATURES ✓ Dictionary with over 667,000 offline entries (premium), over 83,000 for free. ✓ Phrasebook with 20 categories such as Conversation, Asking Directions and Making Friends. ✓ Conjugations of 6,419 verbs (premium), 1,559 for free. ✓ Online Phrase Translator (premium), free alternative in settings. ✓ Single index search for fast lookup. ✓ Enhancements for tablets. ✓ Multiple-choice vocabulary quizzes. ✓ Lookup History. ✓ Email dictionary translations. ✓ Dictionary entries include translations, usage examples, part of speech & gender for Spanish nouns. ✓ Updated regularly by our team of linguists. ✓ Online lookup for additional words (premium). ✓ Text-to-speech pronunciation. ✓ Language is living. Only VidaLingua allows you to add words, notes and images to the dictionary! Comments & questions are welcome. info@vidalingua.com VidaLingua, bringing language apps to life! © http://vidalingua.com

*** AD-FREE PRO VERSION *** - No ads - Additional features like logging to sdcard and advanced network traffic stats This utility allows you to monitor a various system info in "always on top" floating window (overlay mode). Available features: - CPU Usage meter - Free RAM meter - CPU Frequency indicator - 2g/3g/Wi-Fi Traffic meter - Battery Level - Battery Temperature - Battery Current (mA) - Wi-Fi Signal Level - I/O Activity - Time/Date indicator - GSM Cell Signal Level (Samsung Galaxy S2 and Galaxy Note are not supported due to firmware bug!) - Number of fixed GPS satellites - SD Card free space - Most resource-intensive processes - Task Killer - Audio VU and visual equalizer - CPU temp on some devices Also there is nice real time graph on background. Press Show Panel button to enable dashboard. You can drag floating window over the screen or double tap to open settings. See video and screen-shots for details. This application allows you to: - Easy diagnostic problem processes that consume resources excessively. - With Cool Tool you can monitor full-screen applications (games, video players, browsers). - Monitor your Internet traffic without closing the browser window. - Make your battery level always visible, with accurate percentage scale. - Monitor how good your CPU governor switches between CPU frequencies in idle/stresses Tips: Customize the appearance of the panel using color picker dialogs. Also you can adjust transparency and size of the panel in Sliders section. Tons of gauges could drain your battery very quickly. Uncheck the features that you do not need. Btw, Cool Tool went to sleep and do not draw anything when your display turns off. It is for power save. ps: If you want to help me localize app into your native language, let me know. Read FAQ for more details: http://deviantstudio-software.blogspot.com/2013/12/cool-tool-faq.html Please note! GSM signal strength is not supported on Samsung Galaxy S2 and Galaxy Note due to firmware bug! Required permissions: RECEIVE_BOOT_COMPLETED - Run on Startup feature SYSTEM_ALERT_WINDOW "Stay On Top" feature INTERNET & ACCESS_NETWORK_STATE - Ad banner ACCESS_WIFI_STATE - WiFi Signal determine VIBRATE - haptic feedback KILL_BACKGROUND_PROCESSES & RESTART_PACKAGES - Task Killer CHANGE_NETWORK_STATE - GSM Signal feature ACCESS_FINE_LOCATION - Num Of GPS Sats feature WRITE_EXTERNAL_STORAGE - Backup settings to sdcard MODIFY_AUDIO_SETTINGS & RECORD_AUDIO - equalizer & VU READ_PHONE_STATE - some phone models required this permission for cell signal reading.

“I haven't had a class with the professor. I found him via an app. Not studying this intense in 20+yrs I found him to amazingly helpful. I'm studying to be a RN in Australia.” -From RateMyProfessor.com ( http://www.ratemyprofessors.com/ShowRatings.jsp?tid=1589133 ) “OK -- you just saved my life.... I had read the text on this process 5 times and was so confused and frustrated that my heart rate was going up....(LOL). However, after watching your 3-part tutorial, I COMPLETELY GET IT......... THANK-YOU so much... Your descriptions are simple, and I love the tips on how to remember things and also how to deduce the answers on the "test" that you showed. Can't say enough..... you took me from "ready-for-tears" to "ready-for-cheers."” -From YouTube ( https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=OnwPQxKvwVE ) Cardiac Blood Flow is my second app created in teaching Anatomy & Physiology (Endocrine was the first). This is the first app in a future series of Cardiac apps that I am creating. Future Cardiac apps include: The Cardiac Cycle, Cardiac Action Potentials, ECG and more! I designed this app to simulate a SHORT, yet INFORMATIVE, online course for your own PERSONAL use on the go, WITHOUT WiFi needed! The introduction video shows you how to use the app when you first launch it. Start off with the first VIDEO of 11 videos. The videos are short (under 5 minutes) and since they are stored on your device you can scroll backwards or forwards as you like. I use mnemonics and HELPFUL TECHNIQUES to memorize the material, not just for exams, but to truly UNDERSTAND the material. After a short video lesson, watch another short video with 2 – 3 questions on the previous lesson. After reading the question, pause the video and try to solve the question, then resume the video to see me WALK YOU THROUGH how to solve the problem! Move onto the FLASH CARDS that are organized by video numbers! If the 24 flash card questions and 14 video questions are not enough, then you have 20 more multiple choice QUIZ questions to attempt for a total of 58 QUESTIONS ON BLOOD FLOW! Each multiple choice question is followed by EXPLANATIONS to your right or wrong answer! After a video you can access the NOTES section to go over the high yield points of the video. The notes are also great review quickly before an exam with screen shots of helpful diagrams from the videos! In the MORE section you can read more about me, contact me and link to my online website. Be sure to STAY CONNECTED through my YouTube, Facebook and Twitter sites that can also be accessed in this section! https://www.youtube.com/user/ProfRoofs https://www.facebook.com/ProfessorRoofsAandP https://twitter.com/ProfRoofs Currently I am in medical school and I understand that being a student is a time in life where we have little money and little time. Many people are also working and raising families. Even if you are just a student without those responsibilities, I am sure you would enjoy more time to enjoy the rest of life! That is why I am on a mission to create cheap and AFFORDABLE learning tools that MINIMIZE the amount of time needed to study yet are very INFORMATIVE and break things down. I take the textbook material and break it down into short videos with helpful learning techniques. I want to SIMPLIFY LIFE so you have time to ENJOY THE FINER MOMENTS OF LIFE. This app is for ANYONE interested to know how blood flows through the heart! From high school, to college, to nursing, to medical school, to other health professions and also the common day person who wants to LEARN MORE ABOUT THE HEART so when they go to the doctor they know what is going on! Please rate this app and send me your comments and suggestions. Always looking to provide top quality education! All the best with your endeavors!

Med Politikens app kan du læse din avis på din Android-telefon og -tablet. Politiken e-avisen på er Politiken, som du kender den - en fuldstændig kopi af dagens avis, og endda med flere fordele: •Tilgængelig alle ugens dage allerede fra kl. 23.00 dansk tid. •Tilgængelig uanset hvor i verden du er. •Altid den seneste udgave. Er du allerede Politiken abonnent er avisen gratis ellers er den billigere. HVORFOR e-avisen? Du får adgang til avisen lige meget, hvor du er i verden. Det tager kun et øjeblik at downloade dagens avis. SØG i avisen: Du kan søge efter bestemte ord og sætninger i avisen. ER du abonnent: Er du allerede abonnent på Politiken, har du adgang til e-avisen på samme dage, som du får avisen normalt. Er du på ferie kan du også læse e-avisen, hvis du har valgt at donere din avis i stedet for at sætte den på pause. Du skal bare bruge dit abonnementsnummer. Abonnementsnummeret kan du finde på dit Pluskort eller på din regning. SPAR penge: Når du køber e-avisen i abonnement, koster avisen kun godt otte kroner om dagen. LØSSALG (download af én avis): DKK 19,00 SPAR tid: Du sparer tid ved at købe online. e-avisen er aldrig længere væk end din mobiltelefon eller tablet og er aldrig udsolgt. FØR alle andre: e-avisen er det tidligste eksemplar af Politiken, du kan få. Vi er på gaden med næste dags udgave allerede kl. 23.00, og vi fortsætter med at opdatere avisen lige indtil den sidste udgave har forladt redaktionen. ARKIV Du kan læse Politiken e-avisen helt tilbage til den første udgave af den trykte avis fra 1884. HVAD er forskellen på e-avisen, Politiken på papir og Politiken.dk? e-avisen er den elektroniske udgave af Politiken, som du kender den. Det er altså præcis den samme avis, som den trykte version, eneste forskel er, at du læser den på din telefon eller tablet i stedet for papir. Politiken.dk derimod, har sin egen selvstændige redaktion, og bringer sine egne nyheder døgnet rundt. Bemærk at e-avisen virker på telefoner med Android version 2.1 eller nyere og tablets med Android 3.0 eller nyere With Politiken app you can read your newspaper on your Android phone and tablet.   Politiken e-newspaper on the politics, as you know it - a complete copy of today's newspaper, and even with several advantages:   • Available seven days a week already from pm. 23.00 Danish time. • Accessible wherever in the world you are. • Always the latest version. Are you already Politiken newspaper subscriber is free otherwise it is cheaper.   WHY e-newspaper? You get access to the newspaper no matter where you are in the world. It only takes a minute to download the day's newspaper.   SEARCH in the newspaper: You can search for specific words and phrases in the newspaper.   ARE you subscriber: If you are already a subscriber to Politiken, you have access to e-newspaper on the same day that you get the newspaper normal. Are you on vacation, you can also read e-newspaper, if you have chosen to donate your newspaper instead of pause. Just use your subscription number. Subscription number you can find on your Plus card or on your bill.   SAVE MONEY: When you buy e-newspaper subscription, costing the newspaper only just over eight dollars a day.   COUNTLINES (download of one newspaper): £ 19.00   SAVE Time: You save time by buying online. e-newspaper is never farther away than your mobile phone or tablet and is never sold out.   BEFORE all others: e-newspaper is the earliest copy of Politiken, you can get. We are on the street with the next day's edition already at. 23:00, and we continue to update the newspaper right up until the last edition have left the editors. ARCHIVES You can read Politiken e-newspaper dating back to the first edition of the printed newspaper in 1884.   WHAT is the difference between e-newspaper Politiken on paper and Politiken.dk? e-newspaper is the electronic edition of Politiken, as you know it. So it is exactly the same newspaper as the printed version, only difference is that you read it on your phone or tablet instead of paper. Politiken.dk other hand, has its own independent editorial and brings its own news around the clock. Note that e-paper works on phones with Android version 2.1 or later and tablets with Android 3.0 or later

description: Rat Ball Maze is a simple and compelling game where your goal is to eat candy without getting rat electrocute cats. To move Rat Ball is necessary to use the accelerometer (orienting the device in the direction you want to go Rat Ball). The candy reinforced give you more energy and make cats fearful and edible. Each cat eaten by a extra bonus points. You have three lives left and infinite levels of play. The map created is random and different each time!

Nouveau service d’encaissement pratique, performant et mobile, Dilizi s’adresse aux commerçants, artisans, professions libérales, associations et prestataires de services en mobilité. Véritable outil de caisse, sûr, simple et moderne, il répond également au besoin exprimé par les consommateurs qui souhaitent payer par carte bancaire en toutes circonstances (à domicile, sur un marché, …). Qu’est-ce que Dilizi en pratique ? Dilizi est un ensemble de services d’encaissement mobiles composé d’un lecteur de carte bancaire qui se connecte à un smartphone ou à une tablette et d’une application à télécharger [1] incluant les outils suivants : • Un catalogue produits personnalisable • La gestion des encaissements : historique, tri par vendeurs • Un tableau de bord : données consolidées graphiques • Un module de gestion de la relation client Quels sont les bénéfices pour l’utilisateur ? Dilizi est d’un usage simple, rapide et sa souscription est dématérialisée : le client s’enregistre en ligne auprès de la Banque Populaire ou de la Caisse d’Epargne. L’enregistrement peut, bien sûr, être effectué en agence, au choix du client. Dès réception du lecteur, sous deux ou trois jours, le client télécharge l’application gratuite et la mise en service est immédiate. Le matériel est sécurisé. Il est compatible avec la plupart des smartphones du marché. La tarification est claire, sans abonnement, sans engagement de durée. Le prix du lecteur est de 99 € HT et le service d’encaissement facturé 2 % HT par transaction. Il n’y a aucun minimum de facturation. A l’issue du paiement, le consommateur peut recevoir, immédiatement, son ticket de carte bancaire par SMS ou email. dilizi est un service proposé par les banques du Groupe BPCE, 2ème groupe bancaire français : Banque Populaire, Caisse d’Epargne … New collection service convenient, efficient and mobile Dilizi is aimed at traders, artisans, professionals, associations and service mobility. Real tool box, safe, simple and modern, it also responds to the need expressed by consumers wishing to pay by credit card at all times (at home, in a market ...). What Dilizi in practice? Dilizi is a set of mobile collection services consisting of a credit card reader that connects to a smartphone or a tablet and an application to download [1] including the following tools: • A customizable product catalog • The cash management history, sort by sellers • A dashboard: Consolidated graphical data • A module for customer relationship management What are the benefits for the user? Dilizi is a quick, easy usage and subscription cloud: the customer registers online with the Banque Populaire and Caisse d'Epargne. The recording can, of course, be done by agency, the customer's choice. Upon receipt of the reader, as two or three days, the client downloads the free application and commissioning is straightforward. The material is secure. It is compatible with most smartphones on the market. Pricing is clear, no subscription, no time commitment. The price of the drive is € 99 and the cashing service charged 2% tax per transaction. There is no minimum charge. After the payment, the consumer can receive immediately a ticket credit card by SMS or email.   dilizi is offered by banks Groupe BPCE, the second French banking group services: Banque Populaire, Caisse d'Epargne ...

Write your SMS and your notes on your Sony SmartWatch 2 with this application. Write faster with predictive text T9. Predictive text is currently available for these languages : -English -French -German -Spanish -Italian -Dutch -Polish -Portuguese -Romanian -Norwegian -Swedish -Czech If your language isn't currently available, you can write without predictive text. Add your own words to use in predictive text. You can create and edit your notes on your SmartWatch or on your phone. INSTRUCTIONS : SWIPE TOP : write in lowercase or uppercase. When predictive text is enabled, click on the text in top to choose a suggested word or add a word. SWIPE LEFT or RIGHT : display digits or symbols. LONG TAP on the text in top to show preview and add a new note or send a SMS. Click on menu key to display your notes. LONG TAP on a key to write the character in the bottom right. When you choose a recipient : Write the beginning of his name or the beginning of his phone number, click on top to select contact or numero. You can add other recipients of your message. This application is only compatible with Sony SmartWatch 2. Smart Connect extension for SmartWatch 2

Perfeito" (Very good, tells time visibility humidity, events happen in vain Rio de Janeiro. Perfect) Hong Kong (Chinese: 香港) is a special administrative region (SAR) of the People's Republic of China (PRC). It is situated on China's south coast and, enclosed by the Pearl River Delta and South China Sea it is known for its expansive skyline and deep natural harbour. With a land mass of 1,104 km2 (426 sq mi) and a population of seven million people, Hong Kong is one of the most densely populated areas in the world.[10] Hong Kong's population is 95 percent ethnic Chinese and 5 percent from other groups Hong Kong's Han Chinese majority originate mainly from the cities of Guangzhou and Taishan in the neighbouring Guangdong province Hong Kong became a colony of the British Empire after the First Opium War (1839–42). Originally confined to Hong Kong Island, the colony's boundaries were extended in stages to the Kowloon Peninsula in 1860 and then the New Territories in 1898. It was occupied by Japan during the Pacific War, after which the British resumed control until 1997, when China resumed sovereignty The region espoused minimum government intervention under the ethos of positive non-interventionism during the colonial era.[15] The time period greatly influenced the current culture of Hong Kong, often described as "East meets West and the educational system, which used to loosely follow the system in England until reforms implemented in 2009 (wikipedia.org)

description: One of the fastest 3D racing game of the Play Store - For high skilled drivers only ! "The slow speed actually felt too fast for me!" - "More tracks please" - "YEEES I just earn a bronze medal !" All is about timing in this extreme 3D racing game ! Nervous Pingoos are precise space racing bots that love extreme speed. Take the control of theses racers and make the best time ever. This is your goal . No bonus, No enemy, Time attack, that's all. Beat your friends, beat the world ! Caution : At extreme speed the awesome engine of bots can make the pingoo fly. Keep the control ! And brake sometimes ;) A very simple and fun gameplay → Do NOT hit a wall → Do NOT take f***ing a cactus → Improve every moves to keep precious milliseconds → Get all checkpoint and make the perfect race track Key features : ☆ 3 tracks with different driving challenge to masterize ☆ 3 Engine speeds - 150CC is really fast and nervous !!! ☆ Stunning 3D graphics in immersive mode ☆ A global leaderboard : compare your score to other drivers ☆ A sort of space Podracer game with extremely fast pingoos ! Cool no ? Contact and support : I am an indie developper and you can follow my works here : → Facebook : https://www.facebook.com/games.Just4Fun → Twitter : https://twitter.com/mobileJust4Fun → Google+ : https://plus.google.com/+Just4funMobi → Mail : mobile.just4fun@gmail.com Warning : Don't like extreme speed ? Do not get this racing game :-)

description: Chakra Frequencies PRO is about Enjoying a blend of custom music and visualizations for each Chakra, without the need of WiFi or G3 Internet. There are also RAW Hz frequencies for the 7 chakras. They go in 30 second doses so you dont overload your brain! You can also loop them. The Chakra Frequencies App is designed to give people an app that has ALL the Solfeggio Frequencies into one app instead of a pile of them in the Google Play Store. This app is intended for seasoned Spiritualists & Pagans, if your not familiar with Chakras or Chakra Frequencies, please research them. WARNINGS: You need to plugin the headphones or plug the phone/tablet into Stereo speakers, but make sure you always, ALWAYS turn OFF the equalizer so their is no distortion. If you leave the equalizer on make sure you tune it properly so you don't hurt your ears. This goes for your phone/tablet as well, so never use these frequencies if your equalizer is on, to check: Go to your sound settings or multimedia settings and turn off all sound enhancement options that may cause distortion. IMPORTANT PERFORMANCE NOTES: *Recommended hardware requirements to run without lag: 1+ GHz CPU, 512-1+ GIG RAM - Check to see if you meet these first before purchasing. IF YOUR ON A TABLET, PLEASE BUY THE HD version ONLY. If for some reason your phone cannot load a particular visual at all, then a get a refund & buy the HD version, it will solve any video issues IF their is any. Updates will add alot of new features!!! Technical Support Email for any bugs: support@bookofshadowsandlight.com Spiritualists ENJOY!

description: You really can take it with you. Sedona has 100+ trails. They cover forests, streams and red rock grandeur so you’ll need a guide. Sedona Hiking can be that guide. We supply trail descriptions, directions to the trail head, points of interest and the ability to follow your progress in real time with your GPS. Following the trails has never been easier. Now you can concentrate on enjoying the beauty of Sedona and not map reading or deciphering stacks of rocks. Load the Trail information into your Android device and “Take a Hike”! The trail maps and points of interest are preloaded so you don’t need cell service. Visit and explore www.SedonaHikingApp.com for trail listings and hike highlights with pictures from the trails. Here’s how it works: After you decide on the trails you’d like to experience you download the trails onto your device (with a network connection) and select them as you do the hike. Everything you need is in each hike package. 1. Highlights and features of the selected hiking trail. 2. Length and difficulty rating of the trail. 3. A detailed description of the trail and what you’ll encounter and experience on the hike. 4. Directions to the trail head or Google directions and map if you so desire and have network connection. 5. A trail map on screen that allows you to follow your progress and see your location in real time via GPS so you can be confident you’re on the trail. 6. There are trail markers for intersections to watch for and pictures of what is ahead on the trail so you don’t miss out on sights that might be slightly off the trail. We have 100 trails, that's 360 miles of Sedona beauty! This really is hiking for everyone. What's New in Version 2.6+ • Better maps with more detail and topo graphics. The old maps are obsolete and you will be prompted one time to remove them. Don’t upgrade if you are on the trail right now, or have a sentimental attachment to the old hike files. :) • We’re given the downloading of Hikes to the Android operating system. This should make for more reliable downloading. • New Sedona Weather page. Poke the smiling sun on the main screen! • Hike ratings and Vortex sites marked in the download screen. * Be sure to watch the quick tutorial video before heading for the trail! Now accessible from App About screen. ** Don't forget to enable GPS and select "Turn My Location ON" in the Hike Screen!

Continue Write a review Submit Review My review Review from Reviews Helpfulness Newest Rating Helpfulness All Versions All Versions Latest Version Write a review Edit Review 4.5 15 total 5 10 4 4 3 0 2 0 1 1 Odi Frepol Winner app Great app design, intuitive features, a must have for hikers who like smartphones. This app sets the standard for hiking apps. Would love to see this app include maps for Prescott and other Arizona locations especially because of all the additional features that other mapping apps do not have. Greg Kowalchuk Love this app Simple and informative Grego Sanguinetti Works great and is helpful, uses common hike names Some books and webpages like to obscure the names of the hikes to get you to buy before you find out where and what the hikes are. The website compliments the app and the app works without any network access, which is critical. The combination of this app and a topo map really helped make our Sedona hiking vacation a success. Lisa Hoag Great app This is the app you want! Following trails is easy with this genius app. It makes hiking in Sedona so much more enjoyable because you don't have to use a paper map. All the trail information is on my phone so it's easy to take with us. The trail descriptions and points of interest are not too wordy, they are 'just right' which allows you to concentrate on the beauty of Sedona. I mean, that's why you are hiking....to enjoy the beauty! Good job with this app. Highly recommend this one! Arlene Westphal Awesome App! This was fun to have a green dot tell me where I was on the trail. The key point information is very helpful for staying on the trail. No more wondering which way to go! My husband and I enjoyed the photos and looking for the same scenes along the way. We found the maps very precise and on target with the real trail. We had no idea there were so many trails to explore. This is so much more convenient than a hiking book, and cheaper! What a great resource we have found that will inspire me to go back and hike some more! Thank you! Ryan Purcell Great resource My family recently hit the trails and used this app to easily navigate the Sedona paths. We had never visited the area before and found this to be an excellent resour e. User reviews Odi Frepol 18 February 2015 Winner app Great app design, intuitive features, a must have for hikers who like smartphones. This app sets the standard for hiking apps. Would love to see this app include maps for Prescott and other Arizona locations especially because of all the additional features that other mapping apps do not have. The website compliments the app and the app works without any network access, which is critical. The combination of this app and a topo map really helped make our Sedona hiking vacation a success. I mean, that's why you are hiking....to enjoy the beauty! Good job with this app. Highly recommend this one! Full Review Arlene Westphal 19 April 2013 Awesome App! This was fun to have a green dot tell me where I was on the trail. The key point information is very helpful for staying on the trail. No more wondering which way to go! My husband and I enjoyed the photos and looking for the same scenes along the way. We found the maps very precise and on target with the real trail. We had no idea there were so many trails to explore. This is so much more convenient than a hiking book, and cheaper! What a great resource we have found that will inspire me to go back and hike some more! Thank you! We had never visited the area before and found this to be an excellent resour e. Full Review Glenn Clayton 13 April 2013 A great trail tool This is an indispensable app for experienced and inexperienced hikers alike. I have personally hiked over a dozen trails around Sedona, and even though I am a seasoned hiker, I have had trouble trail - finding on many of these trails. Some of the issues include out of date trail books, poor trail signage, and unmarked trail intersections. This app keeps you right on the trail eliminating wasted time and much angst. This is the best $4.99 any Sedona hiker could ever spend!! Full Review A Google User 18 November 2012 Just purchased Great pictures and descriptions. Look forward to using this on the trails. Have you seen a lot of anime but really do you know all about it? Can you remember the title only listening a little fragment of their opening? Show how much you know about anime through two modes of play: - Normal game: You have to guess each of the 120 anime series just listening to a little bit of his opening. Write the title of the series and discover your knowledge. - Rounds game: A music fragment, four options and time is running out! Touch the correct answer quickly to get the most number of points before time runs out. With this version you get: - 55 more anime openings, a total of 120 anime! And more soon!. Can you guess them all? - Hints! A little help to resolve the hard ones! - 2 game modes, Normal game and Rounds game. Now you must be the fastest! - No ADs - Future updates with more anime and endings! If you like don't forget rate with 5 stars! Keywords: anime, manga, cartoons, television, TV, music, tune, test, questions, questionnaire, series, contests, rounds

description: Welcome to the crazy world of monster truck racing! Race through different stages and levels, upgrading your trucks and purchasing new ones as you go. Smash things. Lots of things. Earn money for smashing obstacles, which you can then spend on upgrades. Collect nitro pickups to build up your boost. The more you collect the better your boost.. do you use nitro straight away or hold on to it for better reward?

Fun and addictive Jewels Blitz Gold game! It is easy and fun, but also quite challenging. Get ready for non-stop Jewels Blitz Gold action! Meet the most entertaining, brain teasing and addictive version of the match-3 game! Jewels Blitz Gold - packed with beautiful interface, timing mode and endless mode gameplay with global leaderboard. Jewels Blitz Gold is free game in the genres of puzzle, arcade or casual which will present you lots of pleasant hours and unforgettable impressions. ------------------------------- HOW TO PLAY: - Tap three or more jewels of the same color. - For endless mode: Clear the jewels as more as you can and meet the target for each level. More bonuses with more jewels of each tap. So, try to clear all jewels at the same time, you will get the biggest bonus. - For time mode: You have 60 seconds to clear the jewels as fast as possible. The more jewels are cleared at the same time, the higher score you’ll get. - For crush mode: You have to clear the block as fast as you can to reach to the next level. You'll get time bonus after reach the next level. Try to survival as long as you can in this mode and earn the score as more as you can. Let's see how far you can go! ------------------------------- FEATURES: - Three Game Modes: Time, Endless and Crush. - 5 identical jewels. - Special jewels to clear all the same jewel color. - Game center integration. - Smooth animation. - We 're listening to you. - Nice sound and music. - Auto save game so that you can continue whenever you want. - Beautiful graphics. ------------------------------- If you love match-3 games & diamonds & jewels games, you must try Jewels Blitz Gold! Have fun and enjoy the game. - PLEASE NOTE: This game is free now and forever. We have added banner ads from Admob to earn some cents. Please understand this. Thanks for your supporting. - OUR CONTACT for Jewels Blitz Gold To help us to meet your expectations about this jewels game, please send your feedback to: blue.mansion.co@gmail.com Best wishes to you.
release_text: Hope you will like Jewels Blitz Gold, otherwise please leave a comment so we can continue improving game! v1.23 - Crash fixed. v1.15 -> v1.22 - Performance optimize. - UI Improvement. - Add more bricks for crush mode. - Bug fixes. v1.12 -> v1.14 - UI Improvement. - Add new mode crush. - Bug fixes. v1.11 - Change target score each level for mode endless. v1.7 -> v1.10 - Bug fixes. - UI Improvement. v1.3 - Add more game items. - Bug fixes. v1.2 - Bug fixes.

description: Create a list of all your favorite norwegian names for you baby. This app is currently only available in swedish, I will make some effort to translate it into norwegian soon. If you feel like helping out with the translation, please contact me at babynamesno@beansys.com . There is a free version with swedish names available which can be used as a demo of this app. Are you about to become a parent? A lot has to be done and bought, and finally a name for the new born must be selected. This app contains all (or at least almost all) norwegian names. You can easily search through the list of names and mark your favorites. Your final list of favorite names can be sent via mail to yourself or to someone close to you to continue the discussions together. Boys names are shown in blue, girls names in pink and names that can be used for both boys and girls are shown in green. Good luck with your search for a name for your child, and don't forget that whichever name you finally select will be perfect for your child! Contact Please, do not heistate to contact us using the email address below if you have any suggestions for improvements, questions, etc. Credits The small family on the icon was made by David Castillo Dominici / FreeDigitalPhotos.net ( http://www.freedigitalphotos.net/images/view_photog.php?photogid=3062 ) Names has been fetched from norskenavn.no.
release_text: 2.4.2 Added new names. 2.4.0 Added fast scroll feature on name list. 2.3.0 First norwegian version. Currently only available in swedish language (with norwegian names), but I'm planning on translating it soon.

description: Hunting Call improves your skill to bring in birds, waterfowl, deer, predators, elk and much more. Go hunting? Get Hunting Call before you leave. Bird: Bob White Quail, California Quail, Crow, Owl, Pheasant, Turkey | assembly, 2 syllable, 3 syllable, cluck, cutting, purr, gobble, kee kee ... Elk: elk cow, elk calf, elk bull | bark, talk, grunt, bellow... Predator / varmint: bobcat, coyote, fox, wolf, Raccoon | distress, change bark, chatter howl, greeting howl, locator, talk, squeak Specialties:Jack Rabbit, Javelina, hog, squirrel, cottontail, javelina Currently there are over 80 high quality calls and increasing...

description: Get ready to challenge your piloting skills in this realistic glider flight sim. How long can you stay airborne? How high can you reach? Fly both historical and modern gliders across 6 amazing landscapes. Offers both joystick and tilt controls with adjustable sensitivity. Realistic flight simulation that's 100% FREE! Never before has flying been so realistic & fun on mobile! Enjoy the challenge of staying in flight using updrafts and the amazing gliders in this free mobile flight sim. Featuring music by http://MatthewPablo.com HOW TO PLAY: Fly as far and high as you can! Use the Updrafts around the level to regain altitude and speed. The on screen joystick, or tilt controls(switch in Options or the Pause menu), to control the aircraft. On screen buttons can be tapped to control throttle, gear, brake, camera, and camera reset. You can reset your airplane in the pause menu. FEATURES: *Realistic flight sim for mobile! *Working controls, flaps, and surfaces! *2 unpowered modern and classical gliders, fly though history! *4 Cameras to choose from(cockpit, orbit, dynamic, tower). *6 beautiful landscapes to fly across and explore. FOLLOW US: *Like on Facebook - http://facebook.com/DMTSource *Follow on Twitter - https://twitter.com/@DMTSource *Follow on Google+ - http://google.com/+Dmtsource If you have any suggestions or comments please contact us, we hope to hear from you! DMT Source, LLC is an Orlando, FL USA, based developer. Making mobile flight simulators for Android.

description: Real Lungs Doctor Surgery Game is super and the full-time educational game for kids small doctor. In this game, doctor is required to go through the proper medical and Procedures Perform the lung surgery in order to cure bacterial infection or any problem of Their Patients related to lungs. Lungs Surgery Doctor Real Game is a first-hand experience realistic surgery Which will broaden your kid's brain and Let Them enjoy the role of the professional lungs doctor. With the help of medical Equipped machinery, Patients will go through all stages of lungs treatment in surgery room. This game Doctor Is Completely Different from other games like brain doctor doctor, eye doctor little, ankle doctor, skin doctor, nail doctor, heart doctor, throat doctor, doctor braces, little ear doctor, doctor leg, stomach and nose doctor doctor. With the use of realistic surgical equipments, doctor will check the body temperature, heartbeat, and blood pressure of the patient. After Completing the basic health check-up, the doctor will check respiratory system and lungs going to the perform surgery by removing Harmful germs and scar from the patient's lungs in the surgery room. So stop being tired of other doctors and start game Experiencing the coolest and virtual clinic of Lungs Surgeon. Lungs Surgery Doctor Real Game is the best surgical logbook game Which is completed dissimilar from other games like heart surgery surgery, plastic surgery, Virtual Knee Surgery, brain surgery, stomach and arm surgery. This is the free app for your little kids girls and boys Doctor Who wants to make little Their dream comes true. How to play √ Call your patient from the waiting area √ Perform the routine health check; Which May include body temperature, ECG, blood pressure, pulse rate and heartbeats √ Now cut the patient's skin with the help of laser to see inside the lungs organs for surgery √ Remove the dust, bacteria germ & Thoroughly √ Get the scars and pimples removed with an injection √ With an air pump machine replace the lungs carefull √ Make them workable by filling in the blood √ Stitch or sew the skin √ After sewing, call the next patient   Game features √ Educational game √ Educational game fun √ Variety of Machinery Equipped √ Virtual Lungs Treatment √ Easy and Addictive Kids play √ Fast Downloading √ High Quality Sound Effects If you love playing games medical Then start downloading to experience this awesome game informative and Become a professional surgeon lungs. Your little doctor love to experience the virtual surgical world.

description: Important: PLEASE READ THIS ENTIRE DESCRIPTION BEFORE PURCHASING! description: Boring class? Frequently meeting? Want a simple game to relax for a while? Smash Jewels is your choice! In stead of switch jewels to make 3 or more jewels with same color together, you just tap jewels to destroy them in this game. When there are 3 or more jewels with same color in a row, they will burst and you get scores. It is simple and fun, you will feel comfortable when you continue destroying jewels, maybe you can not stop playing. Just have a try! The Christian custom to light a candle for the health is very ancient. The tradition to burn a candle before the icon for the person who you are wishing health, prosperity and love exists from the earliest times. With the help of this widget you will be able to light a candle for the health of people you love and place it anywhere on the screen of your phone. Particularities: - Nice, realistic animation; - Easy to use; - Possibility to light several candles for several people. Attention: If the application doesn’t appear in the list of widgets immediately after installation, move it from the external memory card into the phone memory. It isn’t a bug of the application it’s a bug of some Android versions. God bless you and your nearest and dearest!

*** Nice Weather, the weather, simply. *** Nice Weather is a weather application that provides simple and clean forecasts for the next 5 days! This application has been designed to be simple and enjoyable, while giving access to accurate weather information. Check out the evolution of the weather along the day by sliding your finger on the temperature graph! Wind speed and precipitation are also updated. Features: - Weather forecast for 5 days with 3 hours intervals - Display of the wind speed, temperature and precipitation - Two interactive graphics to visualize the evolution of temperature and precipitation - Single color by forecast - Automatic update of data - Information available in different units - Offline access to the forecast Pro features (about 2 $ US / year to contribute) - Widgets - Multi-cities - More frequent updates Thanks to Martin Šindler (cs), 王克震 (zh), Piotr Ciastko (pl) and Maurits Hulzinga (nl), Andrey Raygorodskiy (ru) for the translations! And thanks to all people who help me to continue! Follow me on Twitter @aurel_hubert

Baby Classical is an music appreciation app that sets out to familiarize children with some of Mozart's liveliest and most playful pieces, in a fun and interactive way. A great and effective application for a child's music and brain development. Features highlight: - Contains 5 songs by Mozart for young minds stimulation and inspiration. - Colorful and animated backgrounds. - Slide or tap with your fingers on screen to simulate piano playing. - Tap on any one of the 8 animal icons and to perform along with the songs. - Edit and create your own playlist. - Set timer for app to close automatically. Songs included in Baby Classical: 1. Die Zauberflote (The Magic Flute), K. 620: Der Vogelfanger bin ich ja (arr. for 2 flutes) 2. Piano Sonata No. 16 in C major, K. 545, "Sonata facile": II. Andante 3. Die Zauberflote (The Magic Flute), K. 620: Bei Mannern, welche Liebe fuhlen (arr. for flute, oboe and piano) 4. Divertimento in D major, K. 136, "Salzburg Symphony No. 1": II. Andante 5. String Quartet No. 23 in F major, K. 590, "Prussian No. 3": II. Andante

The Rue La La app for Android is the quickest, easiest way to shop Rue La La from anywhere. Shop the most-wanted brands every day at up to 70% off. Bring your favorite shopping experience on-the-go with the award winning Rue La La app. New Boutiques launch every day at 11AM ET, featuring the best brands in apparel, shoes, accessories, beauty, home goods, travel and more. Our most popular items sell out very quickly, but with the app, you will never miss a can’t-live-without-it bag or the perfect gift again. Plus, 30 Days of Free Shipping are yours on the app after you make a first purchase. Consider your chilly-weather style in the bag – or in this case, in your hand. Not a Rue La La Member? No problem. It’s free and you can join quickly right from the app. Take it for a spin, we know you’ll love it. If you have questions, just contact mobile@ruelala.com and we’d be happy to help make your experience better. Here are some of the best features on our Rue La La app for Android: + Buy with Google to speed through checkout and avoid re-typing your shipping and payment information. + Get exclusive access to app user only sales. (Note: Make sure you have app notifications turned on you don’t miss a beat.) + Free Shipping for 30 days after you make your first purchase on the apps. The gift that keeps on giving. + Easily view your order history. + Check out in just 2 taps. + Stay logged in so you can get to the Boutiques faster. + Get gift inspiration. + Add upcoming Boutiques to your device calendar so you don’t miss out (app-only feature). + Filter Boutiques to shop by category, brand, color, and size. + Sort Boutiques to shop by best sellers and price. + Add a product to your bag on one device and your cart stays with you across all of your devices. + See what’s selling with our ‘What’s Hot’ feature. + Be a good friend, tell them about those sought-after boots with your friends via Pinterest, Facebook, Twitter, email or SMS. They’ll thank you for it. + Track your order and Manage your Account info on the run from the Rue La La app for Android. For more information, please visit www.ruelala.com/mobile Have a question? Email mobilehelp@ruelala.com or contact a Rue La La Concierge at 1-888-992-LALA (5252).
release_text: + Updated the order history experience. You can now see images of the items in your order. + Will now send an app notification reminder when items in your cart are about to expire so you never miss out on your favorite items. + You can now see your recently viewed products on your order confirmation page. (As if you needed us to make it easier to shop.) + Easier sign in with domain autofill (ex. @gmail.com) + Tons of other performance improvements and bug fixes. We didn’t think you’d miss them.

description: Ham Radio Tools is a simple program that is to assist ham radio operators. Ham Radio Tools comes complete with a contact log and handy calculators and tables that will assist beginning ham operators and even the pros. with Ham Radio Tools you can: -look up callsign information! -find current GPS location information -save each contact to a log database stored on the phone -review and edit each log entry -search for keywords in different fields of the log entry -calculate a simple quarter and half wave antenna length -calculate the wavelength of a frequency -many more *** Now includes band limits for All Amateur Licenses *** *** Calculators for Yagi, Dipole, J-pole, and Vertical antennas *** *** Callsign Lookup is now included!!! *** Callsign database is pulled from FCC website and updated daily! Callsign lookup works for U.S. callsigns ONLY. Results include address, current and previous license updates, date of any updates, type and class of license, and even includes a link to the FCC database for even more details. Address can be mapped on Google Maps by tapping on the address. The contact log allows you to store information about a completed contact including date, time started, time ended, frequency, mode, station, location, signal reports, and an area for general comments about the contact. A must for field day and general book keeping. Data and start time are filled in when starting the log to save time. End time can even be filled in automatically upon saving the log entry. The contact log also comes with a handy search feature for quickly locating that one of a kind long distance contact you like to brag about. The search is focused on fields chosen by the user. If you want to search for a specific call sign select station as the search location and enter the call sign in the search box. Search keywords are CASE SENSITIVE meaning capital or lowercase letter DO matter. A summary of the band limits for each class are included. Always refer to the official ARRL Band Plan when in doubt. Some simple formulas and calculators are included for quick reference in the field and includes: Yagi, Dipole, J-Pole, Vertical antennas, and wavelength calculator.
release_text: 1.1.14 -updated band plans -small update to importing contact logs

The most exciting new way to figure out who's paying for lunch, who's taking the trash out, or pretty much anything else! Instead of involving the waiter for one single moment of drama, the new Credit Card Roulette Android app lets you stretch out the drama over the course of the entire meal. Just start the randomizer and root against yourself until the check falls, hit stop, and whoever's atop the leaderboard pays. Or run a timed game or set a finish line. Play with the frequency and max hit settings to customize your experience. The Credit Card Roulette app is the best way to add excitement and randomness to everything in your life! And please, if you have any suggestions or issues, feel free to email me.

The cpu often over shoots the table on kickoffs but it never lands on the hands. description: This app tells you how to create your own beautiful Mermaid. It includes every step of how to crochet your own Mermaid (These are sometimes called Amigurumi.) This project is fun and simple to make. They will be great for you to give as presents, or as something unique to brighten up your own home. The app contains full instructions plus plenty of photos. It also contains tick boxes for every step, so you can record where you are up to. No more losing count of how many rows you've done! Also included is a list of the materials and tools that you need for each project, with a picture. As well as the steps for these design, there's also general crochet help included: * As glossary to explain any crochet terms. * Videos for six of the common techniques. * A guide to tools needed for crochet. The app doesn't have any annoying adverts. There's a gallery page to see the other patterns available. There is an option in the app the keep the screen on while you're using it. This allows you to keep your phone at your side to remind you of where you're up to. If you use this option then plugging in the phone's power will keep it on indefinitely. Download it now! (The app also can "install to SD card." If you need space on your phone's memory then this means it doesn't take up any space internally. It doesn't affect how the app works at all.)

description: Taskkiller Pro helps increase your phone battery life, speed up your phone, and manage all your applications. It kills tasks when the screen turns off, sets up black lists, does batch uninstalls, moves apps to the SD card, and tracks memory usage. Android phones keep unused running programs in memory. Using multiple applications in a session can cause the phones RAM to be overloaded. Overloaded RAM consumes battery and slows down the phone performances. Taskkiller Pro ends unused tasks kept in memory, thus speeding up your phone and extend its battery life. You can setup Taskkiller Pro to end unused tasks when the phone screen turns off by using the KILL ON PAUSE functionality. You can also setup TaskKiller Pro to end unused tasks at a given rate by using the AUTO KILL functionality. The AUTO KILL functionality can be active only when the phone is asleep or when the phone screen is on. The combination of the AUTO KILL and the KILL ON PAUSE functions are very effective in saving the battery life. Foreground activities can be excluded from the kill process in order not to stop a work in progress. Tasks can also be ended manually from the application or by using the Taskkiller widget. A combination of four black lists allows a fine configuration of a task managed by Taskkiller. The SYSTEM black list includes every application that TaskKiller will never end. The SYSTEM black list includes by default any application that was bundled with the phone. The AUTO KILL black list includes the applications that shouldn't be killed at a given rate. The KILL ON PAUSE black list includes the applications that shouldn't be killed when the phone screen is turned off. With apps such as MP3 players and GPS trackers, it's a good idea to use the KILL ON PAUSE and the AUTO KILL blacklists as you don't want these applications to be killed while running as a background service. The uninstaller tool is designed to help you uninstall one or more applications from the phone. It displays the list of installed applications with the location (SD or not), size and setup date. You just have to select the applications you want to remove and click on the REMOVE button to uninstall them all very fast. The move 2 SD tool is designed to help you change the setup location of the phone applications. The tool is only available for Android 2.2 and above. Select applications that can be moved to SD and click on the MOVE 2 SD button to move selected applications to the SD card. You can also move applications from the SD card to the phone internal memory. A notification will help you to know when an installed application can be moved to the SD card.
release_text: - No more forced status bar notification - No more popup on launch - Shrinked size (20% less) - Only support Android 2.2+ - Remove "Ignore foreground" option (useless in Android 2.2+) - Fixed black list configuration - Optimized code - Quick access link - Battery usage (pro version only)

description: Ever needed to balance a chemical equation but couldn't do it by hand? This chemical equation balancing application will balance all types of equations in a fraction of a second. Just type the equation in, making elements capitalized and compounds separated by a "+" sign and an "=" sign to show the other side, along with the products. Touch "Balance" and your equation will be balanced in an instant! This application includes added support for inserting parentheses for polyatomic ions and brackets for charges in oxidation/reduction reactions. For an equation containing polyatomic ions, if there is only one molecule of the ion, such as in H(NO3), DO NOT insert the parentheses, and instead input HNO3. For a redox equation, make sure that every compound has a bracket with a charge, even if a compound has no charge. For a positive charge, for example, input [2], for a negative charge, [-2], and for a charge of 0, [0]. DO NOT INPUT [+2]. Sample Equations: C6H12O6 + O2 = CO2 + H2O H2 + O2 = H2O AgI + Pb(NO3)2 = AgNO3 + PbI2 Ca(OH)2 + (NH4)3PO4 = Ca3(PO4)2 + NH4OH Cr2O7[-2] + H[1] + Fe[2] = Cr[3] + H2O + Fe[3] Cu[0] + Ag[1] = Cu[2] + Ag[0] This application operates offline, without the use of the Internet, by solely using mathematical algorithms to find coefficients of compounds. If you encounter any issues with the application, feel free to contact me via email ( upasnarayan@gmail.com ). I am always open to suggestions that will improve the quality of this application. Otherwise, happy balancing! NOTE: Please read the "Help" section under the menu on the application for additional and detailed instructions. This application does not solve equations. It only balances complete equations with compounds on both sides. Invalid equations entered will cause errors to be thrown.

Use this app to prepare for Medical Billing and Coding Certification exams. Includes more than 700 multiple-choice questions and flashcards, and a glossary of terms and definitions. Learning Modules: Module 1: Medical Acronyms Module 2: Physician Coding Module 3: Billing and Coding Fundamentals Module 4: Surgery Module 5: Medical Conditions & Diseases Module 6: Anatomy Module 7: Medicines and Drugs Module 8: Radiology Module 9: Pathology Module 10: Anesthesiology Module 11: Hospital Management Module 12: Lab Tests and Results Module 13: My Custom Learning Module - Create your own flashcards, multiple-choice and glossary - Send multiple-choice quiz questions to friends - Post score for global ranking - Keep up to date with latest news and articles with the Medical Billing news feed. Prepare for the following national certification exams such as the American Medical Billing Association (AMBA) CMRS exam, American Academy of Professional Coder's (AAPC) Certified Professional Coder's (CPC or CPC-H) board exam, and the American Health Information Management Association's (CCS or CCS-P) board exam. Become a Certified Medical Reimbursement Specialist (CMRS). keywords: medical coding, medical billing training, medical billing school, medical billing specialist, medical billing coding, medical bills
release_text: -Make your own quiz, flashcards and glossary -Graphics now scale for phones and tablets -Fixed errors with correct/incorrect answers -Improved interface

app_name: Map My Tracks Cycling Run Walk
description: Make every cycling, running, walking or outdoor activity count. Track your cycling, running, walking, hiking using Map My Tracks OutFront sports tracker. Map My Tracks OutFront turns your phone into a high performance all-sport performance GPS computer that's amazingly easy, fun and motivating to use on bike rides, runs or walks as well as other outdoor pursuits like sailing, skiing, orienteering. TRACK ALL YOUR CYCLING, RUNNING & WALKING WITH GPS ✔ Measure your performance and track your speed, pace, heart rate, calories burned, duration, elevation gain/loss and much more for each activity you do. ✔ Follow the progress of friends and family during their training or in event they attend. ✔ Share your activities on Facebook and Twitter including auto tweets when starting and stopping activities. ✔ Connect to a Pebble Watch to monitor speed, pace, distance direct on the watch face. ✔ Follow friends, comment on their performance and help keep them motivated. ✔ Easily sync activities to MapMyTracks.com where your online Training Room keeps a log of your activities and lets you better understand your training, keep motivated and improve your performance. ✔ Customise and organise your activities with notes, comments, tags and titles. ✔ Discover new nearby routes from the the Map My Tracks world-wide community. MAP MY TRACKS OUTFRONT PRO Get even more from Map My Tracks OutFront and go Pro. • Track live so friends and family can follow your progress online. • Get detailed charts to fully understand your performance. • Don't get distracted, go ad free. • Activate sensors (compatible with the Zephyr HxM Bluetooth sensors). These Pro features are available through in-app purchases. FEEDBACK If you're enjoying Map My Tracks please leave us a good review on Google Play. If not, please send your feedback to support@mapmytracks.com and lets us fix it before you write a review.

app_name: Who Wants To Be A Millionaire
description: Is This Your Final Answer? Play Who Wants To Be A Millionaire With Your Friends! Based on the exciting and unpredictable “shuffle” format of randomized questions seen on the hit TV game show, you can now enjoy the Millionaire experience with friends and other Millionaire fans across North America. Compete against your friends to correctly answer multiple choice trivia questions from various categories, with the ability to use one of the famous lifelines: Double Dip, Ask the Audience or Jump The Question. If you beat your friend, you will get access the Final Round for a chance to answer the Million dollar question! You'll even have the chance to select your theme. Get bonus points by answering multiple questions in a row or by answering questions as fast as you can! You can even get a special reward by completing the Millionaire collections. Who Wants To Be A Millionaire & Friends features: • Ability to compete against friends or Millionaire fans across North America • Thousands of Questions and hundreds of categories taken directly from the TV Show. • Amazing true-to-tv show visual and sound effects • Access to Popular Lifelines: Double Dip, Ask The Audience, Jump The Question Enjoy this classic gameshow with a social twist for Free! Your Final Answer Is: Play Now!
release_text: Who Wants To Be A Millionaire & Friends’ first update this year brings Facebook permissions up to date.

Siddha Medicine (" சித்த மருத்துவம்" or " தமிழ் மருத்துவம் " in Tamil) is usually considered as the oldest medical system known to mankind. Contemporary Tamil literature holds that the system of Siddha medicine originated in Southern India, in the state of Tamil Nadu, as part of the trio Indian medicines - ayurveda, siddha and unani. Siddha is reported to have surfaced more than 10,000 years ago. நோய் என்பது ஒரு நாட்டின் தட்ப வெப்ப நிலை மற்றும் ,அந்நாட்டின் கலாசாரம் பண்பாடு இவைகளை ஒட்டியே அந்நாட்டில் வாழும் மனிதர்களுக்கு தொடக்கமாக உள்ளது நமது இந்திய பண்பாட்டுக்கு உகந்த முறையில் மக்களின் உடலில் கோளாறுகள் உருவாகிறது,அதை சரி செய்ய பல்லாயிரம் ஆண்டுகளுக்கு முன்னால் இந்திய மருத்துவ அறிஞர்கள் சித்தர்கள் மருத்துவ முறைகளை கையாண்டு அனுபூதியான அவர்கள் தனக்கு பின்னால் தாஙகள் கையாண்ட முறைகளை எதிர்கால சந்ததிக்கு கொடுத்தும் ஏடுகளின் மூலமும்,நூல்களின் மூலமும்,குரு பாரம்பரியம்,குடும்ப பாரம்பரியம், மருத்துவ முறைகளை விட்டு சென்றார்கள்.கால வேகம் அரசியல் மாற்றம்,இனபாகுபாடு,இவைகளின் தாக்குதலால், மேற்கண்ட முறை பல வகையாக சிதறின. சுமார் நாநூறு ஆண்டுகளுக்கு முன்னால் அந்நிய தேசத்தவர்கள் கையில் நமது தேசம் உட்பட்டது,அவர்களுடைய மருத்துவ முறைகளும் உள்ளே புகுத்தப்பட்டது அந்நிய தேசத்தவர்களின் மருத்துவ முறைகள் விஞ்ஞானிகளால் உருவாக்கப்பட்டது. நமது தேசத்தவர்களின் மருத்துவ முறைகள் மெய்ஞானிகளால் உருவாக்கப்பட்டது.விஞ்ஞானம் என்பது விநாடிக்கு,விநாடி மற்றம் அடையக்கூடியது,மெய்ஞானம் ஆதியை உணர்ந்து என்றும் மாறாத நிலைத்த தன்மை உடையது. அவர்களின் நவீன மருத்துவ முறைகளில் நமது பாரம்பரிய மருத்துவ முறைகள் புறக்கணிக்கப்பட்டன. சித்தர்களின் காலத்திற்க்குப்பின் சித்த வைத்தியத்தை தொடர்ந்து கையாண்டவர்களில் சிலர் சுய நல மிக்கவர்களால் தன்வசம் உள்ள மருத்துவ முறைகளை மறைக்க துவங்கினார்கள் இப்படி பல்வேறு அற்புத செய்முறைகள் மறைந்தே போயின. அனைத்து மாற்று மருத்துவ முறைகளும் சித்த மருத்துவத்தின் அடிப்படியிலிருந்து தான் உருவானது. இன்றைய காலகட்டத்தில் ஆயுர்வேதம் என்று கூறப்படும் மருத்துவமானது ஆயுள் வேதம் என்ற சொல்லின் மருவிய வார்த்தை. இந்த ஆயுள் வேதமானது இராவணன் அவர்களால் இந்த உலகிற்கு மனித குலத்தின் ஆயுளை கூட்டி வாழ்வதருக்கு கொடுக்கப்பட்ட ஒரு கொடை.

-------------------------------------- - niconico -------------------------------------- "Niconico" is one of the largest video based services in Japan. It is comprised of additional services (ex: Niconico Douga and Nicono Live) that allow users to communicate with one another via comments while viewing content. These services act to facilitate a sense of shared watching experience among viewers. - Niconico Douga Niconico Douga is a service that allows users to add comments to videos played on the website or inside apps. This service adds a layer of fun and excitement that you can’t get by simply watching videos. Niconico Douga includes a wide range of video categories. Here are some examples: * Tried singing: videos used for Karaoke * Tried Dancing: videos used for recording user dance sessions * Tried Making: videos used for creating cuisines and crafts Niconico Douga also includes video categories for games, anime, animals and much more. In addition, its category and overall rankings allow you to find your favorite videos quick and easy. - Niconico Live Niconico Live is a live streaming internet service where users can watch and broadcast live programs and post and view comments all in real time. Niconico Live includes a variety of programs from official live shows and channels about music, games, young stars, and politics to broadcasts streamed directly by Niconico users. With over 5000 programs playing simultaneously, users can comment on any program they want in real time. - Our most popular services Our company is committed to events (Chokaigi, Cho Party, Niconico Town Council, Niconico Cultural Festival, and more) that really allow us to interact with our niconico users throughout Japan. -------------------------------------- - Important -------------------------------------- - Android OS 4.0 and later required. -------------------------------------- - This app use access to -------------------------------------- - "Identity" for Sending Push Notifications. - "Location" for improving communication quality. - "Camera / Microphone" for broadcasting live. - "Device ID & call information" for stopping reproductionduring play in background when incoming call. They will only be used for the above purposes.
release_text: Jun 25, 2015 [NEW!!] * Fixed issues that cause the layout to break under certain conditions. May 28, 2015 * Added a transitioning button to the applicable audio playback app “NicoBox” on the video viewing screen. * Fixed minor issues. Apr 21, 2015 * Fixed minor issues.

Вас всегда интересовало значение линий на Ваших ладонях или на ладонях друзей и близких? С помощью этого приложения Вы сможете легко и быстро научиться основам хиромантии и узнать, что скрывается за линиями на ладонях. Приложение позволяет поэтапно изучить все основные линии, рассматриваемые в рамках хиромантии, а также понять их значение. Первое упоминание о хиромантии относится к 2000 году до н. э. Хиромантия – это греческое слово, переводится как гадание или предсказание по руке. В средние века хиромантия считалась наукой, и сегодня интерес к хиромантии так же не угас. У каждого человека своя судьба, которая зашифрована на ладони в виде линий. Ричард Вебстер считает, что умение читать человеческую судьбу по ладони – это всего лишь знания, опыт и логическое мышление, а не какие-нибудь потусторонние явления. Хиромантия является развивающейся наукой, доступной для тех, кто умеет думать и анализировать. Гадание по руке не требует знаний в медицине и каких-либо других науках, поэтому ею можно заниматься всем желающим. You always wondered value lines on your palms or on the palms of friends and loved ones? With this application you can easily and quickly learn the basics of palmistry and find out what lies behind the lines on the palms. The application allows you to explore all the major stages lines considered under palmistry, and to understand their meaning. The first mention of palmistry refers to 2000 BC. e. Palmistry - is a Greek word translated as fortune-telling or divination by hand. In the Middle Ages, palmistry was considered a science, and today the interest in palmistry is also not waned. Each man has his own destiny, which is encoded in the form of the palm lines. Richard Webster believes that the ability to read human destiny by hand - it's just the knowledge, experience and logical thinking, and not some other-worldly phenomenon. Palmistry is an emerging science that is available to those who know how to think and analyze. Guessing on the arm does not require knowledge in medicine and any other applications, so it can deal with all comers.

Sky lanterns, also known as Kongming Lantern or Chinese lanterns are airborne paper lanterns that are best known as a tradition found in some Asian cultures* This amazing 3DLive-Wallpaper brings you these beautiful lanterns to your Android device. It is sensitive to finger movement and will rotate when switching between the homescreens. Enjoy the scenery with a nice sunset background. This is just perfect for christmas and new years eve. In the settings you can customize: - Count of lanterns - Type of lantern - Background - Wind speed - Radius - Camera distance - Spreading of the sky lanterns. - Camera rotation Expect more backgrounds and different lantern skins in the future. Known Bugs: Nexus 10 and some other devices: background image flips orientation randomly. (We are currently investigating this) *Wikipedia.com
release_text: NEW features: - added preconfigured presets for a quick theme selection - added 2 brand new lanterns: heart + android - added an additional background "space"

description: “This is a beautifully designed app that’s full of information, activities and games…Encyclopedia Britannica Kids Volcanoes provides wonderful content in a friendly and educational presentation. The app definitely lives up to the Encyclopedia Britannica name.” – The iPhone Mom (www.iphonemom.com) Volcanoes are an awesome display of the Earth’s power. Explore them interactively with this new app and learn about the world’s major volcanoes and their eruptions, lava, plate tectonics, and much more. Learn and play at the same time through a variety of games like Memory Match, Jigsaw Puzzles, and the Magic Square among others. Learning has never been more fun with this interactive and educational app that is based on school curriculum. Learning about Volcanoes has never been more fun with this quick, interactive and educational app based on the school curriculum. And as it’s from Britannica you can be sure it’s appropriate and safe for the whole family. Ideal for homework help, the app features: Exclusive Encyclopædia Britannica curriculum-based written specifically for ages 8-12. Coverage of the topic includes: The Erupting Earth Lava and Magma Types of Volcano Birth of an Island Plate Tectonics Eruptions Decade Volcanoes (featuring 16 of the world’s deadliest volcanoes) Then the fun starts: •Interactive Map – With this amazing tool you can locate where you are anywhere in the world and see how near you are to the most powerful volcanoes. Want to see your favourite volcano? It’s easy with our map tool, use the zoom feature to see right into the craters. •Jigsaw Puzzles, created from amazing graphics of volcanoes. Break apart the puzzle and have some fun by shaking your device and then sliding the pieces back into place to complete the puzzle - it’s not as easy as it looks! •Scramble images of volcanoes in The Magic Square game by shaking your device. Challenge yourself by re-arranging the squares to unscramble the image. •Brush off - brush off the lava, soot and dust from the eruption of Vesuvius to reveal an object in the city of Pompeii and then try to guess what it is – how many can you answer correctly? •Test your knowledge on volcanoes with the Quiz feature - how much have you learned? But hurry: you must answer quickly as the quiz is timed! •Test your memory with the popular Memory Match game and match up the pairs! Why not discover more about volcanoes and link to Britannica’s online services – Britannica Online for Kids or Britannica Online - to continue your discoveries. Try it today!!

Play Sudoku for free all day long! With this premium digital sudoku version, you will get to play your favorite puzzle game for free. With 4 different modes available and 3 difficulty levels offered, you will be able to challenge and entertain yourself for hours. If you are not familiar with Sudoku, the game is a number based logic game that will provide brain training at the same time. The objective is to fill a 9×9 grid with digits so that each column, each row, and each of the nine 3×3 sub-grids contains all of the digits from 1 to 9. The game is packed with various features such as being able to show mistakes or the available numbers. The game was also designed to make it your own with customizable fonts and colors The game is tablet ready Will you be able to clinch all the achievements ?

With this application you can calculate commissions selling your products on eBay, as well as fees for receiving payments through PayPal. A single application that integrates both functions and can be used to calculate the separate commissions or for the same sale. It is important to read the information section to learn how the application works. There are two ways to use this application and which are detailed below: a) It can be used to calculate commissions Ebay for sale made, whether in auction or purchase, getting the commission to pay Ebay and the difference obtained for the amount entered. And you can also get commissions PayPal payments received and the difference to the amount entered. All this is performed separately in each section. b) And if you want to get the Ebay and Paypal fees for the same sale was to follow the steps listed in the information section of the application, and which are detailed below: 1) Enter section amounting Ebay and calculate final sale. 2) Insert in section PayPal the total, ie the final sales amount plus shipping. 3) Enter in the Summary section and press Calculate button to get the Ebay and Paypal fees for that sale disaggregated and total fees and profits from the sale. This application is based on the information provided by Ebay and PayPal.

Enhanced version of Network Places Lite. If you have the demand for Android connecting to a computer, for example, viewing photos or watching movies, you will find that it is suitable for this App! SMB (Samba/CIFS) client for Android devices. It allows connecting to shared folders hosted on Windows or Samba servers over Wifi. It allows managing several connections with authentication. It comes with both a device file browser and a SMB file browser. It provides download support for files and folders. You can rename, delete, and view media files. Browse and transfer intents are available for third party applications. Root access is not needed. The advanced video player is also embedded to help to play video in your phone and it is totally free！ The video player supports all the most popular video formats without any conversion. Its smart core technology auto detects video formats, subtitles and makes it much easier for you to enjoy smoother, better quality videos. But it might block some features if AD can't successfully load. Some Custom ROM will redirect ad links, please check your / etc / hosts file to prevent blocking ads. Features: Connect to Windows share folder. Upload and download files through samba protocol. Shortcuts and Bookmarks management. Enhanced Image Viewer. Online media playing via Samba Online document reading via Samba Full features Media player(Innocomm Player Plugin) free to download. Remote Desktop(RDP) Advantages Online media playing via Samba Online document reading via Samba Full features Media player(Innocomm Player Plugin) free to download. Enhanced Image viewer. MX Player Compatible TV Mode We're looking for translators in many more languages. The implementation is in progress,any suggestion is welcome! http://www.facebook.com/NetworkPlacesLiteInnocomm http://www.mobile01.com/topicdetail.php?f=423&t=3504302&p=1#45603161 How to Add a Shared Folder in Windows 7 http://www.wikihow.com/Add-a-Shared-Folder-in-Windows-7 Author: Mori Lin. description: Happy Spring! New Spring Themed Puzzles… Nature Comes Alive! Over 160 Million Players Worldwide! Available in 13 Languages UNLEASH YOUR INNER GOD AND CREATE A UNIVERSE In this addictive, ALL ages, puzzle game mix and match different combinations of fire, earth, wind and air to create an entire universe! As you create each element watch your world come alive as each element animates on your planet. The new “Planet” mode offers a new challenging way to create a universe of your dreams. Of course the universe was not created in a day. You’ll have to work your up from a simple microorganism to create animals, tools, storms and even build armies before you have what it takes to build the universe! But beware, the power of creation may have unintended consequences, inventing the wheel might just trigger a zombie plague… Don’t worry, you are not alone on this cosmic journey! Every time you successfully create a new item you’ll be rewarded with the wit and wisdom of some of the greatest philosophers and comedians of all time. Unleash your inner god with Doodle God™! NEW GAMEPLAY FEATURES ✔ Now available in 13 languages: English, Dutch, French, Spain, Italian, Russian, Japanese, Chinese, Korean, Portuguese, Swedish, Polish & German. ✔ NEW Visual “Planet” Mode allows players to see their planet come alive as you play. ✔ NEW “Mission” Mode offers new challenging puzzles ✔New Artifacts Mode: Collect ancient artifacts like Stonehenge created by amazing triple reactions. ✔ Mold fire, wind, earth and air to create the Universe. ✔ Create 300+ advanced items and concepts. ✔ Intuitive one-click game play encourages thoughtful, creative play  ✔ Hundreds of interesting, funny and thought-provoking quotes and sayings. ✔ New “Puzzle” mode. Create locomotives, sky scrappers and more ✔ New “Quests” mode.
